title: Amazon Business: B2B Shopping
description:
Amazon Business is your one-stop shop for all your business shopping needs. Shop, buy, track, & manage your business purchases from anywhere at any time. Save money while shopping by leveraging Amazon Business' B2B store and wholesale prices. Our extensive business supply warehouse & mobile e-commerce solution makes products, deals, & solutions available for businesses. Keep things organized by separating your personal shopping & business purchases with Amazon Business.

Save time & energy by leveraging our various administrative & shopping tools. Our integration with 3rd party partners such as Intuit Quickbooks makes tracking, managing & analyzing your business purchases & spending easy! Our three-way match feature can be easily accessed in the Amazon Business mobile app & enables you to scan a package with your camera & mark it as received. 

Wholesale Business Shopping anywhere at any time

‚Ä¢	Our B2B store and vast selection offers products, business-only pricing, & solutions for every type of business
‚Ä¢	B2B Wholesale Store: Enjoy wholesale prices & save money on your business purchases
‚Ä¢	Shop, buy, track, & manage all your business purchases from our store anywhere at any time
‚Ä¢	Sign into the Amazon Business mobile app using your Amazon Business account for volume discounts on the business products you shop for
‚Ä¢	Shopping has never been easier! Shop faster with curated item lists
‚Ä¢	Custom Online Shopping: Set delivery preferences & get fast, convenient shipping to meet your operational needs
 
Track, Manage & Analyze

‚Ä¢	Three-Way Match: Scan a package using your phone's camera to mark it as received to keep your business shopping & purchases organized
‚Ä¢	Sign into the Amazon Business mobile app using your Amazon Business Prime account to access powerful spending management tools & dashboards, as well as Guided Buying which allows you to create polices to prefer or block the type of products your teams can buy
‚Ä¢	Efficient Online Shopping: Manage & invite other team members to join your business account to keep things organized and convenient!
‚Ä¢	Download invoices for purchases, approve staff purchases, & make the purchases you need on our wholesale business store while adhering to organizational policies
‚Ä¢	Apply professional credentials to buy specialty items or apply your tax exemptions to eligible purchases with Amazon Tax Exemption Program 
 
Integrated Partners

‚Ä¢	Amazon Business can be integrated with various partners to help save you time & money
‚Ä¢	Integration with Intuit Quickbooks helps you track and manage your purchases & finances

Something for Everyone

‚Ä¢	Amazon Business works with and has solutions for any business! From small & big companies to solopreneurs!
‚Ä¢	Our tools, dashboards, and deals help save teachers & schools time & money
‚Ä¢	Our non-profit-focused solutions can help your non-profit save time & money
‚Ä¢	Sign into your Amazon Business Prime account to access to tools & dashboards to make your business spending more efficient
 
For the best experience, you'll be asked to enable the functions below:

Camera: Find products by scanning the cover or its barcode, can barcodes to mark an order as received using Three-way match, and add pictures to product reviews
Microphone: Access your microphone to use your voice to search and interact with your Assistant
Location: Discover local offers and select addresses quickly
Account: Share products with your colleagues through social networks
Storage: Store your preferences so features can load and run faster on the device

For the best experience, you'll be asked to enable the functions below:

scraped_reviews.content: Amazon isn't the company it was a year ago. Terrible customer service now. The app is all junky now and difficult to use. My account was closed due to suspicious activity after providing them with sensitive information that I feel was intrusive. Provided bank statements, debit card, and photo id and they still closed my account! Temu is cheaper and their shipping time is just as good as Amazon. Ebay is also another great option! Will not use Amazon EVER again after this experience!

The majority of items aren't really discounted at all from regular Prime, but they list a "higher" price and show a "discount" that is normally the same price as regular Prime. I have encountered a few instances where Business is cheaper, anywhere from a penny to a few bucks, BUT I've also encountered many items that are MORE expensive on Business than regular. Always check BOTH accounts to get the best price. I kinda feel like this is a bit of a scam making us think we'll save money.

No Delivery Notifications & Horrible Order Search I'm not getting Delivery Notifications despite having them turned on (and full background activity on), leaving packages vulnerable to theft (the consumer app works fine). The past orders search defaults to search the last 30 days, even with word search! And you can only do word search for 1 year at a time, so it takes forever to find past orders. The consumer app word search looks at the entire account's history, and this one should too!

Please change the Orders section back to its previous format. It no longer shows the current status of the order, if it was delivered/enroute, and doesn't show invoice details with amounts paid, including shipping and tax. It also doesn't have the option to start a refund/exchange from the order unless you connect to customer service via a bot, to a rep, to the seller to get it replaced. Hopefully this will be fixed soon in the next update.

Great app for Amazon Business accounts. Would be 5 starts except that, by default, "on" is the setting for the app to not only give you great notifications for orders and shipping and very useful stuff, but also *advertisements* for sales or products. THAT got turned off real quick, and it's buried in the apps settings making it more difficult to get to than if you could manage it as "notification types" within android...

It doesn't make sense that I can't view po numbers on orders in the amazon business app. When our account has multiple users and I want to see what an order was placed for, I have to go to a desktop mode website. When I click an order to see order details in the app or mobile page, the po isn't included in the order details. This seems basic. Come on Amazon.

Don't bother putting your items on here. They block customers from reviewing items with no real reason given and then give them the runaround. 2 weeks I was trying on my main account to get it fixed, multiple agents saying it would be. Then told today the only department that can fix it can only be contacted through email, yet 2 weeks and no response from them. They don't care about their sellers getting reviews. They sabotage by blocking reviews.

The original version of this app that I downloaded in 2021 was great.. but unfortunately after the more recent updates it's completely useless. I cannot access my account functions or see previous orders. I have to log on to a PC to get things done üò≠ why couldn't they just leave it alone? It worked perfectly fine before they called themselves updating it üëéüèæ

Absolutely horrible with deliveries and accuracy. I've had to cancel or return more orders for my business than with any other company combined. they cost me $700 by losing parts that were scheduled for delivery today. eBay has been delivering earlier than advertised almost every time. We're deleting our Amazon accounts, business and personal, and using eBay from now on. Save yourself the trouble, these idiots went downhill fast and they're circling the drain. Btw, still waiting on the refunds.

buggy, hangs up, wont let you view anything past first 2 photos unless you want to uninstall and re-install every time you want to use the app. it worked great up till 11/2025. since has been worthless. Fix the app or I'll spend my money elsewhere.

they weed out bad reviews for damaged and defective products. i bought diesal glowplugs and spent the day putting them in. they didnt work. it was a cheap (made in certain country) product for 1/10 the price of good ones. my fault for trusting it. however, I wanted to leave a helpful review for anyone else who's skeptical about buying. Amazon doesn't allow you to talk about that. all these (certain country) apps are shady, society would do well to avoid them and buy from the eagle country

There is no way to contact customer support. Not that there really is any support because az doesn't care. They are too big to care. So when delivery drivers don't do their job, there is no way to hold them accountable.
The best place to order anything! I'm not able to drive bc of a disability. And Amazon Prime is a lifesaver for me. I order everything from Amazon. They are my go-to.
there is a problem with the app I can't view photos after 2 pics while viewing products . In the normal amazon app that I have not the business one , there is no issues it's with Amazon business
Please fix the app. can't scroll past 2 photos on any 1 item for over a week now. photos never load.
The app is not working properly, since the last update when you scroll to the 3rd picture+ it keeps trying to load with no pictures, also the description of items does not show anymore.

perfect for handicap people. But would love it anyway. Can find things that you cannot find elsewhere without a lot of searching or driving. Reduced return places - now very time consuming and lots of driving. THAT I DO NOT LIKE.
Cannot see my orders on my tablet! It won't scroll down to see orders. It always stops at 1 page, even if I set to display whole year. Extremely frustrating! Forces me to use browser on tablet!
Unfortunately when you do your amazon returns and there are a lot of them..... It will not let you return it half the time without having to reopen multiple times...
it's to hard to make a payment on either of my Amazon accounts I can't find where to make a payment and when I think I found it it's not the right spot very irritating

Is Amazon corrupt?? The app works fine. The reason for 2 stars is because of this... I purchased two 2-packs of an electronic item. All four items had multiple, identical issues. I left a detailed, factual review, as I am now. Then I returned the product. I was contacted by the seller, asking me to take down the review, and offering me payment in return. I reported this to Amazon, and after several days received a response. This response informed me that my review would not be visible to others.

The "return items" option has disappeared from the mobile app. I had to process the return from a computer browser window. I'm not sure what happened, it was there just the other day. Cleared app cache, uni stalled and reinstalled, its also gone from my husband's phone so it appears to be an app issue, not just my phone.

The ai generated "customers say" info cards are probably gonna be the reason I just go back to physical stores. Let me just scroll and click on an item. I can't scroll past 2 things without a info card. Also, images quit loading past the second product image. I was already on the fence, but I think it's that time.

Today and often I'm just irritated! Please take me to the regular account to sign in. every time I want to log in it just says log into ur business account or create a business account. what if I don't want that. there needs to be a clear tab that takes u ti the regular Amazon prime log in. So tired of wanting to buy something but ur prompts don't have options to. ot sign into a business account to. please change this most irritating and confusing issue. I don't want a business account!!

Amazon Review Ban ‚Äì No Response Amazon suddenly removed all my reviews and banned me from posting new ones, claiming "unusual activity." I have always followed their guidelines, yet after multiple calls and emails, I‚Äôve received no resolution or response. Customer service keeps saying they will escalate, but nothing happens. Amazon needs to fix its broken review system and actually address customer concerns. I am deeply saddened by their lack of care and concern with even getting back to me.
anybody else also struggling with Amazon? live chat support doesn't work, menus don't load properly, eBay works better
Amazon not very helpful. I switched phones and somehow I lost my personal account and my Prime Membership

All good till you need to contact Amazon! Absolutely useless app for ANY issues with purchases! They give a list of the last 5 items but if the item was the 6th or 7th or so on, the button for "help with anything else" doesn't work and THERE'S NO WAY TO ENGAGE WITH AMAZON AS BUYER! At least not through the app which is ABSOLUTELY rubbish because that's where you really need the support. I think this whole "once you buy you're on your own" approach is not a glitch, it is by design!
a total joke. can't use. doesn't work. keep getting a stupid dog picture that says ooooops something is wrong. a complete and total waste of my time.
Junk and customer service sucks. app full screen covers my time and system indicators, probably to keep in the app by not letting u look at the time.
what's wrong with the apps recently take a long time to loading the photos or not even loading at all...
It is something nice to have this. There is so much stuff to pick from. I could shop all day.
I can't rate this app low enough! The app will only load the first 2 pictures for an item. This makes it very difficult to research products. The devs don't seem to care.
Awesome, Amazing, Superb, Really Traffic And Very Useful.
the regular app seems more reliable. this app blanks out the top bar of my screen so I can't see the time or notifications etc. been like this for months with updates that haven't resolved the issue.
I want to give it five stars but for some reason it doesn't want to play every review video. it only plays the first one and the rest of them it'll play the sound but the video is blacked out.
It's ridiculous this new feature, when I'm scrolling through items and it opens up an item that you don't even want to open, it's very annoying
Good service.Anytime I need help someone's available somewhere. I get. The product that I need.

I have app notifications on, but I get none, especially when it is to do with orders, particularly when they have been dispatched, out for delivery, etc. I have to either keep checking the app or website to see if my purchases have been dispatched or not, and when they are out for delivery. Notifications worked prior to the latest update, if it ain't broke, don't fix it. It is also crashing spontaneously, that needs to be fixed.
Great discounts with the same great Amazon experience.

it is great for buying. i use a few other apps first. I go to depending on cost and availability. I do like that I can get shipped faster then Etsy. I don't prefer it for my sales yet. I can generally find most of what i need to create for my small business or anything I want to do. I save money with prime and quick delivery. I just have not chosen for selling because other apps have content creation. it isn't as appealing yet as I am a very small business that makes to order handmade
one of the best vendors for small businesses üëè fast and reliable products to keep you ahead of your competitors

It's impossible to switch back to your personal account. Doesn't matter if you have two separate apps. Now the Amazon shopping app only displays Amazon business (even when I delete this app, personal shopping app is now suddenly the business app). There is also absolutely no way to switch back. Have to delete the app then start again. Absolute garbe. It's missing the very simple feature called "switch accounts". Obviously still months later no answer from anyone. You suck.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thank you for getting in touch. We are always looking to improve the experience for our users, and really appreciate the feedback. If there is anything specific we can look into, please email us at feedback-amazonbusiness-app@amazon.com. Looking forward to hearing from you.

scraped_reviews.content: I've only had the app for 2 weeks. So far every order I've placed(4 as of posting) there's been some type of problem with the delivery. 1st one said was delivered but wasn't. The replacement for that item also never got delivered. Said an attempt was made but couldn't deliver. Today same thing happened again with a different order. When I order the exact same things on Amazon prime I don't have these issues. If you really enjoy headaches and not receiving your orders, this app is for you.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello. Thank you for getting in touch, and we apologize for your difficult experience. Could you please provide more information via email at feedback-amazonbusiness-app@amazon.com so that we can assist you with your problem? Looking forward to hearing from you.

scraped_reviews.content: I lost access to my business email and talked to the support service they can't do reserve emails either.

I really love that so much my favorite Amazon prime shopping list is very easy for me to do it and depend any amount of the price between food and clothes and appliances is fine with me no problem üòÅüëèüèæüëèüèæ‚ù§Ô∏è I can use it with gift cards and either way my debit card too but one thing I don't have time for supermarket store is too expensive that cost too much money over high inflation price and traiffs wasn't easy all I do is much better Amazon prime than supermarket store that smart choice !

Amazon has been good to me in the past but what's going on with this shipping and tracking, I get a email saying it's will be at my house today, but the app say it has not been shipped Amazon is becoming a company I can't trust. they have taken my money. Going to the store shopping for what I want and need is better then feeling ripped off. Come on some at the company fix the system so I can go back to having nothing but good to say.
sucks so hard, just like Amazon in general. find the same prices and free shipping elsewhere without a subscription fee
won't show pictures on the previews for items
Easy to navigate for shopping but difficult for profile updates or customer support.

title: OK: Social Network
descriptionHTML:
Odnoklassniki is a social network with millions of users around the world. In OK you can call friends, livestream, send stickers and gifts, find new friends in groups and share moments. Have fun listening to music, watching videos and playing games!

HOBBIES
‚Äî Cooking, DIY, gardening, traveling, fishing, fashion, cars and pets - find all the most interesting things about your hobby in OK;
‚Äî Watch thousands of videos about your favorite topic;
‚Äî Haven‚Äôt found your hobby? Use the search bar, OK has millions of interesting posts.

MOMENTS
‚Äî Share your moments! Post photos and videos that will disappear after 24 hours;
‚Äî Use frames, stickers and animated texts to make your moments look even better;
‚Äî Add any links to the moments.

COMMUNICATION
‚Äî Free audio and video calls with up to 100 participants;
‚Äî Congratulate friends and family, choose postcards and gifts for any holiday;

GROUPS
‚Äî From cooking to fishing! Join communities of interest or create your own group;
‚Äî Millions of proven tips from users for all occasions;
‚Äî Find jokes and entertainment in OK groups.

SERVICES and APPS
‚Äî Weather, TV program and Horoscope - find your favorite app;
‚Äî Public services and mobile payments to make your life easier;
‚Äî Business profiles with statistics, an advertising account and virtual telephony.

MUSIC
‚Äî A huge collection of songs, from new releases to favorite hits;
‚Äî Add songs to playlists or share it in the status on your page;
‚Äî Subscribe to Music to listen to songs in the background and download songs to the OK app.

VIDEO
‚Äî Watch concerts, popular shows and TV series;
‚Äî Sports broadcasts to cheer for your favorite teams;
‚Äî Live broadcasts to tell the world about yourself!

EASY REGISTRATION AND LOGIN
‚Äî Simple and fast registration;
‚Äî You can use other social networks to sign in;
‚Äî Lost access to your profile? It's easy to recover it via phone, email, or even face and gesture recognition.

Contact OK Support Team for any feedback: https://ok.ru/help. We will be glad to help you!
summary: Find friends in communities and groups, watch videos and films, share moments.

scraped_reviews.content: Having problems with the website, not the app. The email they provide in the reviews doesn't work, I get an automated email saying they don't accept emails. The translation is confusing. Edit: like I said, I receive an automated email saying my message didn't go through for some reason. I tried twice, same thing. Is there another email address or something I should write in the subject, for it to through? I appreciate you responding on here. Don't know how many times I can edit this text.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Our support only has one email. You could try to message us from different email address, it might help us understand the issue a bit better. And what exact reply do you get? It would be great if you could tell us more about it.

scraped_reviews.content: Update: It looked like the cast option came back, so I updated the app, and then the cast option was gone again üò≠ Old Review: Since I updated this app, I'm no longer able to cast videos. There's no cast option. I would pay a membership fee for a cast option. Please bring it back üò≠
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you! Your feedback has been sent to the team.

scraped_reviews.content: This used to be the best app I had on my phone. Unfortunately I can't say that anymore and I am truly disappointed. For the longest time now there is no chromecast button to be found. I do not understand where it has gone and why after so many updates this still hasn't been fixed and brought back. Can this please be fixed in the next update so I can use this app again?
Absolutely LOVE this social app, I can finally find more Russian songs and love to listen especially the Russian local FM Stations!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your appreciation and wish you all the best!

scraped_reviews.content: I wish that Ok would stop blocking my videos. I don't care if I was copyright.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are sorry that your videos have been blocked. Please read the rules: https://ok.ru/regulations. It's possible that you're violating one of them.

scraped_reviews.content: It's very intrusive. it's always pushing something on you, it's used to be really good app

UPDATE....STILL NO CHROMECAST. After promising now for a year they will bring it back....nothing! So this app is practically useless. Until they bring back tye ability to cast 4o your tv don't bother with this app. It's pointless. BRING BACK CHROMECAST!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Please contact us via email at mobileapp@ok.ru and we will do our best to assist you. Our customer service is available in both English and Russian.

scraped_reviews.content: The app it's ok i can't complain but the tech support is horrible guys. If you god damn account was lost and you do not have any photos the tech support goes like " we are sorry we can't help with nothing , any request will be not considered by us" They don't care about the community. I'm literally sitting for a week to provide all of my information for my lost account and at the last I only see that . " Huh we can't help , do not make requests. Have a great day" Thanks guys . Pathetic
some time videos are not playing very well
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for telling us! We're sorry you're experiencing this issue. To help us resolve it quickly, please write to the following email address: mobileapp@odnoklassniki.ru. Our support team will do their best to investigate and assist you!

scraped_reviews.content: The wifi is very laggy and I can't log in like even tho my WiFi is good but it said wifi is jot connected like what is wrong.Please fix it.But still 5 star.Just fix the problem that I said.Not angry.Thank u:)

Hi! I love this app and all your efforts to make it this great, but I suggest you a feature that I would love: the sneak peek for watching videos. I only can do that from a laptop, but it doesn't work on the phone. I would be great if you could add that The feature is usually called swipe to seek and let's you see what scene is coming up. YouTube has it and also VK. I think OK had it for a while though. But I'd love to see it in the next update.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Could you please describe your idea in more detail?

scraped_reviews.content: App shows no internet. Please fix this issue
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please update the app to the latest version and clear the cache. If the problem persists, please write to us via the Help section.

scraped_reviews.content: I do enjoy that I can find practically anything I want to watch in the world this channel. I enjoy that I can interact with people from all over the world in a slightly different way than I can do on Facebook and/or "theother" tube. My one wish would be that I could find my history, if it's there under some settings setting then I am unaware of it. I also can't figure out how to make playlist.. Other than that I am so happy I accidentally found OK!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for reaching out! We are always happy to help you. So that we could help you in the best way, please specify what history you want to find and what playlist you want to create. OK.ru Customer Support Team

scraped_reviews.content: If you're a follower of card video games and also do not mind some approach, Euchre Card Video game is a fun and addictive video game to play. The game board is simple, with a conventional format of 8 cards arranged in four rows and 4 columns. The item of the video game is to play all of your cards, build mixes, as well as rating points by taking away your challenger's cards. The game is hectic, and there's a great deal of strategy involved in trying to defeat your opponent. The best component i

this is a pretty cool app. The porn kind of freaks me out, not sure how well you monitor it and I'm really paranoid that I'll accidentally click on something that's illegalüò£. It isn't the most user-friendly, but some of it's features make it worth the extra effort. Advanced filtering options would be GREAT (e.g. searching for movies in English, etc.)...and maybe a way to organize or even filter my bookmarks. Even still, totally worth it. Ty
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thank you for your feedback and for sharing your ideas. We have forwarded them to our developers. If you have any other ideas how to help our website to become better, please contact us. OK.ru Customer Support Team

scraped_reviews.content: Used to be a good app, but if you'll experience a situation with no access to your phone you'll find out how underdeveloped this app is. They started to demand copies of your ID or a photo near the screen to compare if that's really the user the account belongs to. What about profiles without a photo? 2 step verification has to have an option to have an alternative or an option to be switched off. Also they don't know apparently about user's right to listen to purchased and uploaded music.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello! It's possible to restore access to a profile even if it doesn't have any pictures. You just have to tell us your login and phone number or email indicated in said profile.
Not sure we understand what's wrong with music in our app. Can you explain your issue with it in more details? OK customer support team

scraped_reviews.content: I really enjoy Odnoklassniki. It is refined and works properly all of the time. People are friendly and caring on it. And if you interest in a certain thing such as bowling, you can find groups as well as individuals who are invested into the same exact thing. I've found the app incredibly enjoyable, and would definitely recommend it to anyone who has connections with Russians or plans to visit Russia. Most if not all the text is in Russian, so some Russian would be beneficial.

Sure, so I don't understand Russian but some of the content is interesting. That's not why I downloaded it. I can watch seemingly any movie I want and I do mean just about any. From the classics all the way to modern, foreign, Old Disney, cult, obscure...you name it and they got it. You can also watch episodes from just about any tv series, music concerts and music videos that are not on YT. I just downloaded the video downloader that goes with it and I can store content on my phone.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for reaching out! If you have any questions or remarks about our app, feel free to contact us. We're always happy to help you. OK.ru customer support team

scraped_reviews.content: I stumbled upon this app accidentally, and although it is in Russian, I still have truly been enjoying the videos. Thankfully, they have been downloaded in several languages, including English. I am only giving four stars however, because as far as I can tell, I have no option to translate the contents of the app into English. Then I would definitely give it five stars!
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello! Please note that OK.ru app is also available in English. Changing the language of your app is easy. To do that, open in the left sidebar menu ‚ÄúSettings‚Äù (–ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏), click ‚ÄúProfile settings‚Äù (–ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏ –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–∏–ª—è) and then choose ‚ÄúChange language‚Äù (–°–º–µ–Ω–∏—Ç—å —è–∑—ã–∫). Now select the language you need. 
OK.ru Customer Support Team

scraped_reviews.content: I discovered this social media app last year when I was searching for a movie online. Found it and fell in love with the site. If you're a movie lover like me and love the fact that copyright laws and ad bull**** don't hinder your watching, this is the app for you. title: Albert: Budgeting and Banking
description:
THE ALL-IN-ONE MONEY APP
Budget, save, spend, and invest. All in one incredibly powerful app. Get 24/7 identity monitoring, earn on your savings, and ask Genius anything. Subscription required. Try 30 days before you‚Äôre charged.

ONLINE BANKING
Get paid up to 2 days early with direct deposit. Earn cash back at select stores. Albert is not a bank. See more below.

BUDGETING AND PERSONAL FINANCE MANAGEMENT
Get a monthly budget, track expenses, and customize your spending plan. See all your accounts in one place and track recurring bills. We‚Äôll help find subscriptions you don‚Äôt use and negotiate to lower your bills.

AUTOMATIC SAVING AND INVESTING
Smart money automatically transfers money to help you save and invest. Open a high yield savings account to earn competitive Annual Percentage Yield (APY) on your deposits, over 9x the national average. Invest in stocks, ETFs, and managed portfolios. See more below.

PROTECT YOUR MONEY
24/7 monitoring on your accounts, credit, and identity. Get real-time alerts when we detect potential fraud. Plus, track your credit score.

DISCLOSURES
Albert is not a bank. Banking services provided by Sutton Bank and Stride Bank, Members FDIC. Albert Savings accounts are held for your benefit at FDIC-insured banks, including Wells Fargo, N.A.¬†The Albert Mastercard¬Æ debit card is issued by Sutton Bank and Stride Bank, pursuant to a license by Mastercard. Mastercard and the circles design are registered trademarks of Mastercard International Incorporated. Funds in Albert Cash are held in a pooled account at Sutton Bank and Stride Bank. Funds in Savings accounts are held at Wells Fargo, N.A. Cash and Savings account funds are eligible for up to $250,000 in FDIC insurance on a pass-through basis. Your FDIC insurance is subject to specific conditions being satisfied.

Albert plans range from $14.99-$39.99. Auto-renews until canceled or your Albert account is closed. Cancel in the app. See Terms for more.

Albert Genius is an AI financial assistant and can make mistakes. Information or recommendations by Genius are provided ‚Äúas is‚Äù and may be inaccurate.

Instant Advances are available to you at Albert‚Äôs discretion. Limits range from $25-$1,000, subject to eligibility. Not all customers will qualify and few qualify for $1,000. Transfer fees may apply.

Instant Loans are issued by FinWise Bank, Member FDIC, or Albert, under licenses in Utah and Florida. Loans start at $1,000, and are subject to eligibility and credit review. Terms apply.

Early access to direct deposit funds may vary depending on payer‚Äôs deposit timing.

Cash back subject to terms. 

For High Yield Savings accounts, interest rates are variable and subject to change at any time. These rates are current as of 8/7/25. There is no minimum balance requirement. Genius is required to access High Yield Savings. Fees to use Albert may reduce the earnings on your account.

Brokerage services provided by Albert Securities, member FINRA/SIPC. Investment advisory services provided by Albert Investments. Investing accounts are not FDIC insured or bank guaranteed. Investing involves the risk of loss. Investing content provided by Albert Genius are research tools, not recommendations. More info at albrt.co/disclosures.

Credit score calculated on the VantageScore 3.0 model. Your VantageScore 3.0 from Experian¬Æ indicates your credit risk level and is not used by all lenders, so don't be surprised if your lender uses a score that's different from your VantageScore 3.0.

The Identity Theft Insurance is underwritten and administered by American Bankers Insurance Company of Florida, an Assurant company. Refer to the actual policies for terms, conditions, and exclusions of coverage. Coverage may not be available in all jurisdictions. Review the Summary of Benefits at albrt.co/id-ins.

Address: 440 N Barranca Ave #3801, Covina, CA 91723
No customer support available at this address. Visit www.albert.com for help.

scraped_reviews.content: This is probably the worst instant cash app I've used. Way too invasive restrictive. Minimal amounts, and have to pay it back in a week, even though I get paid every two. Kind of defeats the purpose. You can change the pay back date, but only after you've drawn, and only if you call their number. They also monitor your bank account, and draw small amounts whenever they want. You can't turn that off if you have an instant amount due. Try MoneyLion or Tilt.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey Sarah - I‚Äôm Emma, a senior support specialist, and I‚Äôd like to help answer any questions you may have about our Instant feature. If you‚Äôre up for it, please email me at support+emma.c@albert.com so I can help. Thank you. ‚ÄìEmma

I will be filing chargebacks if my account gets charged again.

title: Gardenscapes
description:
Welcome to Gardenscapes, the first game from the Playrix Scapes‚Ñ¢ series! Make match-3 combinations and bring coziness and beauty to every corner of your garden.

Solve fun puzzles, restore and explore new areas of the garden, and meet new friends in every chapter of the exciting storyline. Austin the butler is ready to welcome you to a world of incredible adventures!

Game Features:
‚óè Gameplay loved by millions of players! Make match-3 combinations and decorate your garden while enjoying an entertaining story!
‚óè Over 16,000 captivating levels with explosive power-ups, useful boosters, and cool elements.
‚óè Exciting events! Embark on fascinating Expeditions, compete against other players in different challenges, and win awesome prizes!
‚óè One-of-a-kind garden areas with unique layouts, from fountain ensembles to island landscapes.
‚óè Loads of fun characters: meet Austin's friends and neighbors!
‚óè Adorable pets that will become your faithful companions!

Play with your Facebook friends, or make new friends in the game community!

Gardenscapes is free to play, but some in-game items can be purchased for real money. 

A Wi-Fi or internet connection is not required to play.
 *An internet connection is required to access competitions and additional features.

Do you like Gardenscapes? Follow us!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Gardenscapes
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/gardenscapes_mobile/

Need to report an issue or ask a question? Contact Player Support through the game by going to Settings > Help and Support. If you can't access the game, use the web chat by clicking the chat icon in the lower right corner of our website: https://playrix.helpshift.com/hc/en/5-gardenscapes/

Terms of Use: https://playrix.com/terms/index_en.html

Privacy Policy: https://playrix.com/privacy/index_en.html

summary: Create your own garden and solve match-3 puzzles in this redesign game!

scraped_reviews.content: Fun, until it's impossible to beat levels without spending coins. I also play Homescapes, and the best part about that game vs. this game, is when there's a level that is impossibly hard, and you keep trying to beat the level over and over, eventually the level gets easier to help you beat it. Gardenscapes does NOT do this. I have played the same level over 20 times, using all the power ups, and only spending coins on several life refills, and still can't beat the levels. Not fun.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi,

Thanks for sharing your experience! We‚Äôre reviewing level difficulty and progression to keep the game challenging but still enjoyable. Your feedback is very helpful.

scraped_reviews.content: I used to play this game a lot. Once I realized how much money & time I was wasting on it, I decided to uninstall it. Then Fetch offered a ton of points for playing it, so I reinstalled it. Big mistake. It's a shame this game is such a money grab, bc it's a great game, otherwise. But like others have said, you'll reach levels that are impossible to beat. Coins are expensive & the amount you earn per level is ridiculously low. I have no choice but to quit playing again. GREEDY, GREEDY, GREEDY!
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Kay,

Thanks for the honest feedback. We are glad you enjoy the game, and sorry to hear the progression and coin balance felt frustrating. Your input helps shape future updates.

scraped_reviews.content: Downgraded from 5 stars to 1. I've been playing this game from its launch, 8 years ago. Just as I was thinking their unannounced changes couldn't get any worse, they did. You now only receive 10 coins (plus a few more if you have any moves or boosters left) to complete a level - down from 50! For those who have never played, to buy just 5 extra moves to complete a level costs 900 coins! It was already extremely difficult. Playrix, you are losing many long-term players. I guess you don't care
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello Ros,

We've implemented some changes across various aspects of the game, including rewards. In addition to these adjustments, we also regularly update bonuses and rewardsüéâ

scraped_reviews.content: I used to love Gardenscapes, but it‚Äôs become a money grab. You now earn only 12‚Äì30 coins per level, down from 80, which makes progress slow unless you spend real money. The season pass is no longer worth it. Once you finish, you just get coins and have to wait until the season ends to claim them no more rewards. As a long-time player, it‚Äôs disappointing to see the game go this route. Sadly, I‚Äôm done playing.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Brittani,

Thanks for your feedback and for being a loyal player. We're sorry to hear you're disappointed with the recent changes. Your input is important and we truly appreciate the time you‚Äôve spent with Gardenscapes and hope you‚Äôll consider returning in the future.

scraped_reviews.content: I'm a long time player on level 15k+. I've enjoyed it for years and spent money on it. But they've really ruined the game now. Prices on everything have been raised, boosts have been made worse, and there are only expedition events now. It's all about forcing players to spend more money constantly and giving players less and less for their money. It's not at all enjoyable anymore.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello James,

We put in a lot of effort every day to enhance the game's enjoyment. Recently, we've made some changes across various aspects of the game, including the rewards. In addition to adjusting prices, we regularly update bonuses and rewards as wellüòä

scraped_reviews.content: If I could give it zero I would. I completed 600+ levels and then couldn't complete a single level on the first try. I uninstalled after being unable to beat a level for 4 straight days. I reinstalled to leave this review. You get on average 15 coins and 5 enegy per level, unless they're "super hard" then you can get around 100. It cost 900 coins to "play on" if you don't beat the level on the first try and it only goes up from there. It cost 20 or 30 energy on average to break one item.

like all the other reviews I have to agree that they have made the game virtually impossible to move on unless you spend money to buy coins, once you purchase and win the round, you lose the next game and it just repeats itself. When you finally get the power booster it gives you the purple extremely hard game and takes it right away. I think I'll uninstall and play a game that I can actually enjoy playing without costing a fortune. Save your money! It's too bad bcuz it used to be a great game.

I have played since 3/2017, oh how it has changed. I used to love playing rewards were good, I didn't mind spending a little here and there for game extras. Now the levels are so difficult even the easy levels. Every other one is hard, super hard or a pink level that you fail 95% of the time. And you lose all your bonuses! Rewards are a joke decreasing every month. Playing and never winning, errors in the game such as five in a roll = bomb that you never get. Greed shame on you!

I have played this game for years, and have beaten every level thats available so far. I however have become so frustrated with the game. There is a "super rainbow blast" in the game, which is super helpful. But lately when I switch to another app in the middle of a level, either to change my music, etc, the game closes and I lose this power up. It feels incredibly unfair and makes me frustrated enough to write this review. This needs to be fixed. As a longtime player it is ruining my experience

Agreeing with many recent reviews. This game is a money grab. Many levels are impossible to beat without buying extra moves. You either have to drop money into it or play the side game A LOT to gather enough couns to pass the level. 900 coins for only 5 moves unless you waste hours of time losing a level to finally be able to purchase more than 5 moves, going up to 35. It's sad it is such a money grab game, because otherwise it is enjoyable. The storyline & side quest content is cute & fun.

I have played for years, but am now going to unistall. We now get so few points for winning, they are charging ridiculous amounts for things and making it so hard to do anything. All of that is bad, but when I started noticing at the end of each game that I wasn't getting all the points. When you only get 10 points for winning, any extra explosions at the end are needed. The trouble is those points are often not being counted. 2 points here, 8 points there. I feel screwed over!

Been playing this game for 2 yrs, your match game really bites the big one. When you use 80 lives, 900 to get 35 more moves and still cant pass the level really makes it that you don't know how to make it fun. Also the super power ball get taken away at the challenge level, after 2 weeks of getting it. About ready to delete this dreadful chore.

Recently discovered $61 UNAUTHORIZED purchases from this app!!! I didn't receive anything for the money fraudulently charged! Be sure to remove any payment method from your Google Play acct to avoid UNAUTHORIZED charges! The last update has a serious flaw that takes your in-game coins but does not deliver the extra moves you paid for. GS "customer service" first claimed they couldn't verify that an error had occurred & wouldn't restore the coins. Now claim they verified no error occurred. LIARS!

This is a great game for my anxiety and stress, it keeps me thinking about my next move to win and not about what's bothering me. For me the levels are easy, and you can beat them all without buying in-app stuff, you just have to plan your moves for the best outcome. Here's a tip.... when beating a level try to go after only the sets that will finish your goal, don't just pick a set because it's there, unless it's 5 or more to make bombs, but again make sure your bombs will land where you need

I downloaded this game because of fetch, but I won't be playing it much longer. All they want is for you to spend money with few rewards and benefits . When you win a level, you barely get any coins, and everything requires an least 900 coins min like getting just 5 extra moves. When you do pass a level, you might get only 30 coins. Not to mention only 5 energy. nope, compared to other games ive played. Im sorry to say, but just not worth it.

This game used to be good. However, as the levels become higher, there is no more mini games and just tons of impossible levels to beat. It is basically hard and super hard levels back to back. Plus, these levels require power ups to even win as they have unrealistic goals and the generator works against you. Gardenscapes also partakes in false advertisement. Their ads are not what the game truly is, the game is primarily just a match 3 pay to win game. The ads is not what the game truly is.

The game is fine, but if you have an issue, support is nonexistent. I placed 2nd in an event, and I guess the game bugged out because it closed the event without awarding me anything. No chest, no increase in the number of power ups that I should have gotten, and now the event is no longer accessible. "Support" is just a series of FAQ prompts and bad AI loops. There's no way to actually report an issue.

My son and I have been playing this game for years as part of our nighttime routine. The latest update is terrible. they've removed the best "free" rewards that you get from completing levels (like 15 min unlimited lives) and replaced them with stupid card collections. We spend money on the garden pass because of those rewards. We probably won't anymore though. Seems like another app is getting a bit predatory. Sad

Absolutely beautiful graphic content and a very fun story line I enjoy very much. Also, it's enjoyable to be able to chose how I want to design my garden with up to three choices on various items throughout the game. It does have a few too many side quests that take a long time to complete which gets a bit annoying, but do give a change of scenery and are quite creative. The matching part of the game aren't really that hard but what is difficult about it is the lack of moves and coins given.

I blame FETCH for this game. They offered a ton of points which holds true. Although I do enjoy this game, you get bare minimum tries to complete the games. You WILL spend money. The creators need to fix this. Its almost impossible to complete one match game and the 5 lives go fast. You need to offer more moves per game. Its almost impossible. I play a lot of matching games and they offer more moves depending on the difficulty. Please fix this!

I've been playing since it first came out! Used to be a great game until it wasn't any more. As others have said it's a money grab. I especially liked the comment by one user "you only get like 10 coins and a few more. Need to get more coins for completing a puzzle." And what do the developers do, make it harder. Right on track to keep getting negative reviews and less downloads.

Gardenscapes has been my go-to game for years. The one thing, despite all of the unexpected changes that I could count on, was the soothing music. I turned off the sound effects so that I could enjoy the music. The new music is too much like Royal Match. Please bring back the original music. There's been too many negative changes lately, including beating levels, only to earn very few coins, and levels becoming almost impossible to beat. The original fans miss the original game.

lots of effort for small rewards. absolutely ridiculous to go through 4 rounds of 30 min unlimited lives (at different times), then 4 rounds of donated lives, use boosters more than once and still unable to pass a level. Its absurd effort for a small amount of coins but will cost 900 coins to continue a level. Absolutely ridiculous costs for anything in the game. The expeditions are just as terrible. You can barely get a couple of items before you run out of energy. So not worth the time.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate your feedback about the effort-to-reward balance in the game. It's important to us that players feel rewarded for their time. If you have specific suggestions, we'd love to hear them! Thank you for sharing your thoughts with us.

scraped_reviews.content: It's so challenging I want to quit. After playing the same level for the past 3 days, 3+ hours total...trying to decipher if I want to quit again for few weeks. If you don't play for a while and come back, they give you free boosts to help you pass. I purchased the ticket pass for rewards but don't buy them as you will never get all the rewards without putting more money into it. Conclusion: play once every few weeks and when you run out of boosts, come back in another few weeks =)

pure greed! I've been playing this game for 6 years. a completed level got u at least 50 coins then it developers dropped it down to 30 now you barely get 20 The garden pass used to be $4.99 now it's $9.99 and you get way less. they have changed the power of they don't have the same range as the old ones. it's now even harder to finish a level because they want you to pay for everything. I'm going to uninstall this game I thought I would complete it but the greed is just ridiculous.

Greedier and Greedier The developers of this game have gotten so insanely greedy. They have consistently leaned harder into the pay to play model over the years by making it harder to pass levels without spending money. Many, even "easy" levels, are not even possible without using all boosters, power ups and thousands in coins. All the while, they have drastically reduced the amount of custom options for building your gardenscape. They want to take away the carrot and make us pay even more.

I do think this is one of the best mindless puzzle games- it's challenging but not too much and the reward is decorating something lovely. I will say that I really despise the newer trend of these "adventure" events over the old events. The old events where you could earn different varients to decorate with is what made me want to spend money, not this dreadful monotonous hack and slash mystery nonsense. It makes me not want to play it anymore if I'm honest. Bring back the decoration events!!!

Not surprised this is a top grossing game, but for all the wrong reasons. High pressure to buy things. Game quickly gets stupid frustrating. You have to win rounds to build your garden, but you have to do all the chores listed, including things like cracking the code on a useless old suitcase and washing the butler's fine wear. As the game progresses, you get a point where it's almost impossible to win a round without boosters, and difficult to win even with boosters, since the puzzles start out with so few available moves, that you're forced to use your boosters at the start when they can't do much good. So you blow through them quickly. Some game play gives you an automatic booster for ther next round, with no option to save for later. And I swear it has bugs it the play. I've done moves that should have freed up pieces, but didn't. Annoying game.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! We're terribly sorry to hear about your experience. Could you please contact our Support team to report the levels that caused you trouble? We'll be sure to check and fix or adjust them, if possible. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: The game is outstanding... BUT there is no way to log out of this game. That really sucks. Even when you use the log out of Google/facebook features you don't log out of the game. I have to go to the task manager to stop the game. That is horrible. Edit: Ok there has been a game update. Now if you hit Shift and Tab a menu opens that allows you to exit the game without having to go to the Task Manager. That's better but it would be even better if there was just a button to exit and save.

It's great. I love the game play. I feel it needs more options for decorating, and longer to build the "rooms" Some levels are very challenging and force you to either wait and collect daily bonuses and stockpile, or you have to make a purchase. Also If anyone plays homescapes like I do, it makes it damn near impossible to be able to be engaged in both the games when you run specials on them simultaneously.* Edit; I had reviewed this long ago, yet it constantly solicits a review.

I used to love this game. I understand its supposed to be challenging but damn. I'm on level 2300 and have been for over a week. A person gets tired of playing when you cant move forward.. so I'm uninstalling cause I'm tired of trying. Get no help from support. I think if someone has been on a level for that amount of time help them. But I'm done. I have games I can play and get thru

I actually played the game, and it isn't so bad. But I would really like to report FALSE ADVERTISING. At first, the ads were pretty accurate for this game, but over time, it got to the point that it would be the player pressing certain items to help the people. Also, in said ad, THOSE PEOPLE ARE LITERALLY IN ANTARTICA. And I thought this was GARDENscapes, not "People Lost in Antartica-scapes".

Beware. This game like any game has the possibility to glitch and freeze. This happened to me when making a purchase of a $15.99 package. The charge went through to my bank account but I didn't receive any items from the package. I have sent 4 emails with one response and no resolution. I won't be playing this game anymore because it's impossible to get through certain levels unless u have boosters to start. Boosters that typically have to be bought. Thanks for ignoring me playrix.

Just as eveyone says, its advertising is deceptive. Your not solving a puzzle to figure out a life or death scenario or to gain an item. Your just solving puzzles, that's it.... oh yes your going to be tempted to spend $ to pass levels, the levels go from easy, to hard, then extreme. I played for a little off and on but I'm over waiting for it to go as advertised disappointed.

Whoever is working on advertising the game, needs to stop and play the game. The ads are COMPLETELY 100% DIFFERENT than the actual gameplay. You've officially fallen under the category of clickbait and you oughtta be ashamed of it. Gardenscape is such a fun game on its own. It doesn't need false advertisement. If you're reading this review and wondering if you should download it, it depends if you've played the false advertisement beforehand. if you have, don't bother.

I've been playing this game for a long time and used to find it fun and relaxing. The levels have become increasingly difficult to beat unless you're willing to spend $$ on power boosts, etc. You'll get a couple of easier levels and then back-to-back hard levels followed by super hard levels. This has led to me to play less ans less and to lose interest. I no longer find it relaxing and enjoyable. It's becoming more and more frustrating. Ready to uninstall and go back to Lily's Garden.

I don't usually leave reviews, but I was so disappointed. Firstly, it's NOTHING like the game that was advertised. I wanted to be able to figure out how to "fix" plumbing, electrical, etc. What I got instead was another version of candy crush but with a storyline. It's not a bad game, it's just nothing what I expected when advertised while playing my other games. And not to mention level 8 is impossible to beat.

Game keeps crashing after update. Lost money on items used during games, as the game crashed in middle of play. I spend too much money each month, to lose funds due to developer error. Other games start back where left off, so nothing is lost.... NOT this one! In addition, I just want to rebuild garden and buildings. Tired of being forced to complete task unrelated to actual garden rebuild, i.e. tea with visitors and things with dog. Needs more of a garden feel with more flowers and trees!

Game is not at all like it was advertised. I spent a lot of money to be able to advance. I was past level 1000 and spent money to buy coins (Again) and the level kept shutting down because of multiple "gas cans" exploding. There was no way to get them all at once and spent 900 coins for 5 more moves, 1200 coins for a few more moves, then 2000 coins for a few more moves. It kept happening. Finally I uninstalled this game and really wish I'd done it much much sooner.

Irritated! I guess there a whole new genre of click bate going around where all the games have ads unrelated to the storyline or game play now. I like match games, but they have gotten repetitive, there are tons of them offering only slight differences like the main character and items to match. Clearly people are intrigued by the ads promise of something new and different...Yet instead of creating a game that delivers as advertised, or add that puzzle addition to the game, you bait and switch.

So an updated review. I really enjoyed this game in the beginning even though the ads were misleading. I however, dont enjoy the fact that in order to pass levels you have to use boosters which you have to purchase, let's be honest this is slow paced game. I also feel that games are rigged. For those claiming to be on high levels without spending real money I call BS. It also takes forever to progress to a new section.

Overall the game is fun to play... The reason for only 2 starts is the log in time takes 2 to 3 minutes! And to get any rewards for completing garden takes forever too, you have to try to fast forward through the repetitious captions & after playing this game for as long as I have it gets VERY old! Which I believe the mass of the garden is part of the reason for the extended log in time. If they could speed those two processes up I would give it five stars. Unfortunately that won't happen üëéüëé

Enjoy playing and it is addictive. But don't like the forced updates. Have completed levels and received unlimited lives only to have a forced update start. On several occasions. Once the update is completed, you start with 5 lives. I have lost 30 min, 1 hr, even 2 hours of unlimited lives due to forced updates. A player should be allowed to choose when to update and continue playing. Also, 2 characters gave an extra life each, but i had full life, so i lost those 2 lives, it didn't increase.

First of all they advertise the game as being a puzzle / escape style game. It is not. It is a candy crush type matching game you have to play in order to furnish / decorate a mansion. The game quickly gets extremely difficult to beat. To the point you either have to spend money to advance or you are stuck. I played for about a week and then quit after I could no longer advance without paying money for power ups.

So far it's the usual "match the colors and collect the tiles." Nothing like the commercial where you choose the right tool to save the guy or whatever. I'll hold on a little while to see if they're in a higher level. I'm on level 57 now. Also, you earn some coins that you can't use, because they want you to buy the safe! Extortion!

Okay, at first. The ad was extremely misleading. This is not a decision making game of consequence. I was disappointed but okay for a while. And as you progress to the harder levels it is nearly impossible to pass some without purchasing little boosters to assist you. I quit at level 97. A game should never be so difficult that you can't pass it without having to buy something.

I deleted app. After playing for a day or so, the match 3 mini game became very difficult to beat due to very few moves allowed to beat the level. I play a lot of match 3 games, so I'm pretty good at it. You quickly use up all your lives and have to spend money to buy more. I don't spend money on these games just to beat a level. After being stuck at one level for 3 days, I deleted the game.

False advertising on what the game really is. I mean the ad is everywhere and looks funny. But when you actually start playing the game, it's nothing like that add. Thus a star being taken off. With that being said, it is a pretty fun and decent game otherwise for me to kick back and kill time while I'm waiting on other things in different games to finish. Graphics are pretty stellar, too.

Cannot get past level 1185. They use to give you 25 moves and lowered to 20 making it virtually impossible to get onto the next level. I have fun when I can earn the stars to decorate. Also you have to use too many stars at one time to decorate one thing. I am thinking of deleting the app. When you get stuck for days or weeks at a time, it gets boring.

It's good at the beginning. You spend some money because you feel like you can. Then over time you feel the need to buy more to complete levels. You buy more. Then you get to points that you are stuck. You don't want to keep buying in. You buy coins... I've edited my review after the previous point. The game keeps you playing, but not for the right reasons. A challenging game should be challenging, but this this game is near impossible unless you pay into it. This game is toxic.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Eric,

Price changes can be affected by various factors. These adjustments are part of our ongoing efforts to ensure a great gaming experience for all playersüòä In the meantime, you can explore numerous ways to earn coins. Check out this helpful article: https://plrx.me/xIN8HMJIiE

title: Dan the Man: Action Platformer
description:
MULTIPLAYER UPDATE

Wait what?! That's right! MULTIPLAYER has finally come to Dan The Man: Action Platformer!

Our most requested feature of all time comes in the form of a classic "beat up a horde" style coop mode. Grab a friend and relive the glory days of retro coop split screen... online! Don't have any friends? Dan the Man: Action Platformer has you covered. Just search for a quick match and get an instant brawl buddy!ü§úüí¢

We are sure you'll agree that two Dans are better than one, as you both co-operative take down an Army of Soldiers, Robots, Bats, and even Epic Bosses to clean up the streets of fury. Just make sure you take all the coins!üí™


With a cracking funny story, action, an awesome upgradeable fighting skills and an epic arsenal of weapons that will make even the most heroic of heroes envious, Dan The Man's arcade fight fest has enough enemies and boss fights to satisfy every hardcore  Action Platformer enthusiast and every indie game lover.

THE CLASSIC GAME MODES YOU LOVE

üî•Campaign Mode: Follow the adventure of Dan in a new stage to this epic series. Get ready to kick foes in one of the most epic retro platformer games to date!
üî•Endless Survival: Reach the top of the rankings and show the world who is boss fighting in this endless action game mode.
üî•Adventure Mode: Test yourself in tons of epic challenges and different kinds of games and unlock exclusive skins and prizes!
üî•Multiplayer Mode: search for a match or play with a friend in this coop format.

All of them for FREE!

UPGRADE YOUR CHARACTERS

Upgrade your favorite character to make them the best in this platformer game, unlocking new abilities and longer super epic combos to give your enemies a hard time!

CREATE YOUR OWN HERO

Customise your own character with all kinds of epic skins and clothing that give you extra advantages in combat. Play your character the way you want!

RETRO PIXEL INDIE GAME

Retro pixel art graphics bring back the best of old arcade games filled with action, platforms and lots of fighting.

What are you waiting for? Join the action! Be legendary! PLAY NOW for FREE!

***

Catch up on the story that precedes the game! Watch each stage of the web series: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLuNyw_z6mVdXCUK05PYmwYQ3Yozs9hsGs

***

This game contains optional in-app purchases. You can disable this feature in the settings menu of your device.

View our privacy policy at http://halfbrick.com/pp
Views our terms of service at http://halfbrick.com/tos

***

Permissions used in the game:

- Check your network, WIFI and Internet availability: 
Ensures your game is kept up to date, give you access to online/cloud save options and serve ads where applicable. Game can be played offline.

- Avoid the device falls asleep: 
This prevents the device from going into a sleep state while the game is active. 

- Allow IAP items purchases:
This allows you to make purchases from our in-game store.

- Receive push notifications:
Gives us authorization to send you messages and notifications for events, features, etc.

- Bind_Get_Install_Referrer_Service:
Used to track and measure Dan the Man application installations.
