summary: Do you like action and platform games? this is your game

scraped_reviews.content: Great Game! literally by far the best Platformer Fighting Combat Games that I've played in my Lifetimes. Like you can play this game with your friends online AND play the in the Events, and my favorite is Survival mode, and I've beat every level in Main Story Mode and managed to get to hard mode, and you definitely don't need Wi-Fi to play this game when you're in the car or outside or even at school, and I just LOVE when u customize ur Character into anything, so why not install it? TOO FUN! üëä

I love this game, but there are just two problems I have with it. 1. There are too many micro transactions like the barry steakfries fighter and the Christmas & Halloween levels. What i would do is make side quests for the player to earn them. 2. there are so many ads. every time you get to a checkpoint, it plays an ad. and there are timers to stop you from progressing fast, and you watch ads to take out some of the time off. that's all that bugs me

great game, you don't find many like it anymore in the free to ay world. great combat,and an excellent story. you have to wait a few hours to play each next level but that just gives you time to explore what else this game offers. the two side stories and a extra character behind a pay wall but it's not forced and constant pop-ups, reasonably priced too. (though I'm not the kind to spend money on phone games.) all and all Dan IS the man.

Honestly, best fighting platformer rgp on the market. Tons of levels, more mechanics than I can name, and it is challenging. It's not P2W and there are nearly no bugs so far. Would recommend to anybody who is trying to get into this style of game. Also props to the artists and concept artist. This is amazing. Never seen an 8 bit game as food as this.

Post update: Cannot play!! The ads do take time to get used to but it's not an overwhelming amount of ads. Sometimes they have in game sales. Thank God for that because the game asks for too much money. Pay for premium. Pay for characters. Play for other miscellaneous stuff. I don't like to play games that come up with various ways to get my cash. have to pay $6 for Barry or I can't complete levels in adventure mode. Barry should never be $5.99 in the first place. Jump button doesn't jump often.

Cation to new players: this game is super addictive. Just wish that it didn't require internet connection to play the new levels you unlock in story mode. Other than that, the best game I ever played. Another Nitpick I have is the timer to unlock levels. Seriously, the later levels require 12 Hours to unlock. I don't have enough money to buy the premium, even though it's only $2.99 to buy. I personally think that the levels should unlock as soon as you beat the previous level. But 10/10

Great game for what it is.....aw hell its a great game period and I'm playing it alot more lately because of its greatness! It's like combo based street fighting in a platforming and semi-RPG format. It also has a great sense of humor and obviously made by adults or at least college students...but nothing too inappropriate. It could probably use a few more fighting moves to upgrade and maybe some hand held non-throwing weapons. One of the best games in the App Store!

This game is freaking awesome! Limited ads and no pay to play. Classic platform style and no auto side scrolling. Sometimes you have to wait for the next level to open but there is plenty of side action to occupy you while you wait. Excellent time killer and plenty of action. I love this game and it holds up to Half-Brick quality. If you're disappointed after downloading this game, sorry, but you're just not a classic gamer.

So much fun! I love the pixel perfect game style and the story is great! I love character creation and multiplayer. But the problem is... The barry steakfries character is to hard to get, how do you get friends? It should be something you can buy with coins. A lot of the adventure stages need him and I can't upgrade him. Please make it easier to get him for free.

I love this game!!! But seriously guys, lose the forced tutorial. There is no reason even the most rudimentary players should have to play multiple levels, be taught how to open chests, etc. Make it optional, or at least make it shorter. I've had to redownload a few times, and every time I do it forces me to crawl through the tutorial before I can even log in to my profile. So unnecessary. Again, one of my top 3 mobile games ever. Great work. But fix the tutorial.

This is an 8 dollar game. If you get rid of the advertisements=2.99 And if you want Barry (you need him to complete some levels but he kinda sucks)=4.99. Is this game worth 8? I think there should be more story at the base price(which you apparently have to pay for). The only real challenge is at the later levels as well as adventure mode. Survival is fun too.

Would be a great game if it didnt have ads blowing up on my face. The game is good and the story itself is ok, but the ads are everywhere. Once you finish a level, the next level will be stuck on a timer for hours unless you watch an ad or pay for a membership. One of the side stories cost 5.99 and the other you have to get all gold trophies in adventure. Who released this game? EA?!

I really love this game,I really do but I think there's two many ads,it can get very annoying at times and can ruin the experience,also you should add a co-op mode where you and your friend can play the story together,think about how cool that would be, when this stuff happens I'll give it a five star,but other than that's it's a great game and I recommend it if your looking for a fun action platformer. Edit: also get rid of the timer,it's annoying,and ruins the game play kinda.

Pretty cool little retro-style platformer. Graphics are purposely pixelated, controls are tight and precise, and the levels are pretty decently sized and challenging. Plays well with touch controls. I bought the premium version for $2.99 to eliminate the ads, but even the free version is fun. The ads don't break the game, i just like to buy the game i enjoy to support the developer.

This is the best game I can play on my phone! It has a 90's game theme, reminds me of Mario, sonic, and other games, He has different game modes, he has cool characters, you can even custom your character, It has great weapons, it's awesome, no it's PERFECT. This is the game that you want to play for 100 days straight, this is THE GAME. No game can ever beat this! I just wish the game gives you more coins when you win the battle or kill ememies, but this is by far, the best game on mobileüëåüëåüëå

Dan the Man not only has like the best name ever, but the best gameplay ever to see the app store. The ads are hardly in your face, and often times your getting something for watching those ads. I've played a lot of games that have really cheap deaths. Deaths that push you away back and forth, draining your health bar to oblivion. But in this, it seems to launch Dan back up to where he needs to go. And the in app purchases.. are amazing. Their really fairly priced. I could go on and on. (500/500

It's one of the best games I've played and I don't plan on uninstalling it anytime soon. However, I'd like to make a couple suggestions: 1) Add an online Multiplayer that's unlocked at the end or something, if it was unlocked at the end it would be kinda like the web series and it would give more of a rewarding feeling to the player. 2) Allow the player to use their custom character as their halfbrick profile picture.

Glitches out after nearly every ad. I enjoy the game, it is great. I also understand the ads, everyone has to get paid. However nearly every ad, savepoint or not will go to blackscreen after the ad and not transition back to the game. I will have to restart the game. Kind of lame. Update, after a little bit of time the ad issues went away. I really like the game and have beat it in normal and modes.

I love the game, it's just like mario or sonic. The customizing is alright, there really wasn't that much to choose from, please add more items. The story mode is very interesting, BUT when you're finished with story mode. You can buy other story modes??? (Idk what to call them.) The timer before you can go on to another mission, it really limits the fun. Over all not that bad of a game, just a few updates there and there and i think this game would be perfect

i love this game. only downfall is that i would love to be able to arrange my controls where i like on the screen. other than that, its fun, addictive, and able to be played for free without needing to make additional purchases later on. great job. i expect nothing less from the makers of jetpack joyride. you guys always kill it with the games you make. keep it up.

I've played mobile games since the old nokia snake...this is by far the best and funnest I've ever played, with the best soundtrack as well and I'm only in the 2nd area of levels so far. Reminds me of playing Mario 3 when I was a kid, only you use karate, knives, and guns to wipe out a ton of enemies. Only issue I have is the ‚¨ÖÔ∏è button responding, that could very well be my phone or my finger placement though. Seems like I keep missing with my thumb. Maybe allow enlarging the buttons for tha

This game is awsome! The battles, the boss battles, the fights, even the story. I never played a game as good as this. I love that it's challenging, and it test your platform gaming skills to the max. Even on hard mode, and on arcade mode. But the boss, and the main story (this might be a spoiler), can't compare to the frosty plains levels, enemys. They were challenging, but the boss was really challenging. Please don't change anything in this game. Best game ever!

I really love the slightly retro feel to the whole thing, and the secrets are awesome. Cons include a bunch of forced ads (which technically can be removed with $$$, but...), a somewhat grindy economy and that the stars for completing different aspects of levels aren't fleshed out or explained at all. Also I just recently unlocked Hard Mode, and during cutscenes some enemies have the upgraded colors, while others (notably the first boss) don't.

The new multi-player came out and I really love it, but there's one big problem that caught my attention. In some multi-player battles when there is a boss fight, the boss is able to fight before the players can move causing us to die before we can even move. This always happens with the machine gun boss. Also, there needs to be a balance change with the jump boss. He is incredibly easy and beaten in a matter of seconds. I love that the devs are still working on this game! Thanks

This is the best game ever! The graphics remind me of those 1980 Atari arcade games. The gameplay is excellent, the controls are SUPER responsive, and I like how there's 3 storys to choose from. The only downfall is, that you can get Frosty Plains for free if you get all gold trophies in adventure mode, but you have to pay 5.99$ for Fright Zone. And the ads are a bit out of control, but otherwise, this game is amazing! totally download it for a great time!

this is honestly one of the most entertaining mobile games ive played. im not the type of person that spends money on mobile games, but this one is worth the premium price in my opinion. the only gripe i have are the controls, not being able to customize them is a minor annoyance. if you accidentally move your thumbs, you mess up, sometimes costing your life. being able to place the controls any way you want would be perfect.

Hands down the best game I've played in a long time. The controls are simple and handle smoothly, the fights fun and fast paced, and the load out of weaponry is awesome as well. There is one issue that I've had but I'm not sure if this is the game center or the app itself. Whenever I get an achievement, the game freezes the controls while the achievements text displays for like 5 seconds. That's a lot of time to stand there and get wailed on in the middle of a huge fight.

Overall its a great game However there are some things that should be done. First of all there should be accounts, i had this game on an alt device and lost all my progress which at the moment, isn't a big deal but just to ensure that someone can save there progress is a big deal. Second they need to implement a PvP mode, i dont know if they can or if the combat system would work but if they can it would be fantastic. And make no ads purchasable option. Overall great game.

I love the game, the concept, the wackiness, and the fun, but the thing in my opinion that is almost killing it is all the ads and the lack of story. there are just so much ads here and there, almost making unplayable. the story is alright but only 1 story/chapter?? and the other stories you have to buy with only 6 levels?? it's still a fun game but it might need some work if it will become even better.

I love the game but What I don't like is Two things. The first thing I don't like is the fact the game tends to lag offline and online. And lastly, the game Lags Offline a lot even when your not online. Please fix this problem with the game, otherwise I will rate it four stars. Also Please unlock all the levels for free. I Find it stupid and dumb to unlock level by waiting a lot of games make levels free.

I really like Dan the Man so much, it's such an amazing platformer. And the comedy can be really funny. I also enjoy customizing my character. But of course there is still some problems, like for one Everytime I jump the game has a small lag spike. That's pretty much it though. In my opinion Dan is a game for people who really like the Halfbrick games

This is a side scrolling action platformer with esthetically pleasing animation. it also has a story that goes hand in hand with a short series on YouTube. I highly recommend Dan The Man to any gamer with a pulse. I hope they make a sequel or at least a similar game with this animation and game play. The only gripe anyone could have is the ads, but you can't be surprised these guys are trying to make money doing g what they love. if it bugs you, buy the ad free edition. support these guys!

DTM is one of the BEST platformers out there and is just plain AWESOMENESS. The battle levels are fun and a definite challenge, especially the 3rd teir. Extended gameplay and fun mechanics. TONS of weapons, powerups and moves too. Awesome job devs ! I can't recommend this game enough. it's the best when the full game is unlocked (no ads). DO IT !

It's the first game I ever got, and I love it, it's great!! It's challenging to get past the end. But, I rated four stars beacuse I feel they should continue the story line. Make a second game where I can still keep my levels and get even higher! And the art for the app logo is getting worse. But other than that, WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR??? DOWNLOAD IT!!!

This is a very great game, highly recommended. But, just to make healing more interesting, make a button to see the healing items you've collected. How it would work: Once you select this healing option, the rest of the screen gets a little darker and a blue backrounded menu appears at the top of the screen, then you can see your healing items, the images of them and the amount of health it heals, but the level still runs while using this option

"Countless levels" it says lmao Not only are there an incredibly finite amount of levels in this ancient game, but there's not so much as a 'Good job, guy' for 3 starring every one of the.....4 chapters worth of levels. What a joke. But hey, they got my $5 for 'no ads' early on, when i was unaware of how short the game is. So good job, i suppose. Very sneaky, sis

Too many ads. Too many pay walls. I don't mind paying for items in a game and I don't mind buying the premium package to get rid of ads. But I tend to make purchases after getting a good feel for the game to make sure I like it and as a thank you to the developers for making a good game. Unfortunately with this game I felt like the dev was trying to force my hand by making me watch an ad something like 6 times during the course of 1 level. It's just too much. I miss the Halfbrick of years gone by. I've uninstalled this game. Edit: changed to three stars because the game was fun. Still, a bad experience with the ads led me to uninstall.

Cool game, this game USED to be a lot fun. There is lots of ads in everytime you play. Take for example, you go for a revival potion because you died in a boss battle, not only do you have to watch an ad for the revival potion, (not that i complain about it.) But you have to watch yet another ad for no reason at all! Some ads are unskipable and some aren't. THE ADS ARE GONNA TAKE OVER THE WORLD! It is though a fun game and i do recommend you play it, it has a fun story and fun fights.

So I was on the play store and found this game at first I thought it was going to be "okay" but when I entered the game I was like HOLY SMOKES MUSIC BLASTING IT WAS AMAZING I automatically started dancing to the awesome music and the story line,cutscenes,and bosses were really good but the only downside I can think of is wating for the next stage and how you have to watch ads to skip it but besides that it's a really good game! KEEP IT UP!

THIS GAME IS AMAZING! The Level of Detail in the Game is Amazing and I love the Gun-Fu in this game because the controls are buttery smooth. The only thing that kills this game is having to wait forever to play the next level in story mode. Everything else is perfect. The Character Creator could use some work. Like being able to change to skin color on you character or being able to change the color of your Character Pieces. Other than these minor things, 10 out of 5 Stars in spirit!

It's a good 2d packed platformer cool abilities, cool characters, and more. Why I put this as four stars is the ads. They everywhere. This game also has some okay online multiplayer mode. It sucks when the internet connection isn't working. It sucks that you have to buy Barry. Though it's a amazing and creative 2d Action packed platformer.

Dan the man is one of the greatest action platformers I've played in years! The levels, and bosses are really unique. Leveling up your character is pretty quick and easy as well! The adventure mode is great too! And the spike in difficulty is really fast, setting up a new challenge for all ages! So does hard mode! Hard mode is also really fun! The only bad things I can say about it is the adventure mode lags like crazy sometimes. Other than that, great game!!! Hope there is a sequel soon!

So far so good, I recently downloaded this game, I've loved the gameplay ever since, for those wondering yes, this is an ad heavy game, which can be solved by spending 2 or 3 dollars, let's face it we've spent more on other useless stuff, I have to add, I ran into some trouble when I bought it, mostly the fact that it was still showing ads, but I contacted the developers (who live in australia so be mindful of the time difference) and they fixed it up rather swiftly.

Fun game. Great retro graphics, thoughtful story, & a good sense of humor behind its development. Upgradable & customizable characters, replay value, & bonuses ensure a lot of time will be put into play. I'm on my second play through (hard mode) & still enjoying it. In-app ads aren't intrusive & in-app purchase prices are fair. Would like to see more of the story though. The current episode left us with a few cliffhangers. I'm anxious to see what happens. Overall well done. *thumbs up*

I'm having an incredible time with this game. The controls and hit boxes are solid and the story is lots of fun. The only gripes I have is that you shouldn't have to pay for the DLC, the final boss is incredibly hard, and it's difficult to play your own music over the game, like I'm already playing my metal and it just cuts out, even with sound effects and music turned off (But the music is pretty good).

this game is really really fun! Other games I've played that invole levels/prologues happen to have an add during the level, but this game doesn't. this game is really simple to do and doesn't take much time to figure it out. It's fun amd easy! I also love the type of art they chose; pixel. It turned out really well and is really nice. It makes me happy 'cause it reminds me of the old pixel gamesI'd play woth my Uncle/cousins.

Great pixel game, it reminds me of older days, and it is probably one of the best pixel games, it's a fun platforming and fighting game, wouldn't recommend for smaller audiences, but it's good, online is kinda wonky and needs to be better but it's still good, I spend my time playing this, the only other problems are how much it takes for another level, and there aren't ads unless you want them (checkpoints have ads but if ya don't want them buy membership), Great game.

TOO MANY ADS. I'm not talking about rewarded ones I'm talking about the ad while you're in a stage. You get 2-3 ads a stage which is ridiculous, also pretty early in the game you have to WAIT 6 HOURS FOR THE NEXT STAGE. If you are rich, good for you and get the no ad gamepass. If you are a casual gamer who doest want to spend much money, reconsider playing this game. Essay by Brandon Cassidy.

Very good! Most of the game (incuding hard mode) is awsome, though the only problem i have is that the last few levels seem to spam forced battles, slowing down the flow of the game. other than this, the game is almost perfect. I do have an idea, a level editor. I have a feeling that this would be very difficult to program. I dont feel like giving any extra ideas, as I feel like it should be up to you to design the level editor, as you are the creators.

Great game with good controls and several play modes (story, survival, multiplayer, adventure). Only two major downsides: 1) Story mode needs more content, a new story to play through. Normal and Hard story line can both be completed within a week or so with fairly minimal play time. 2) Ads often break: no close option is presented, or when a close button is tapped the game freezes on a black screen. This can cause you to lose your progress, especially in Survival mode.

title: WPS Office-PDF, Word, Sheet
description: ‚òÖWPS Office-Free Office suite for Word, PDF, Sheet, is an all-in-one office suite integrates Word docs, PDF, Sheet spreadsheets, PowerPoint slides, WPS AI, Forms, Cloud Storage, Online Editing, Template library and Sharing. Access various WPS Office functions through mobile devices, such as scan PDF files, edit slides, convert spreadsheets, or view documents anytime, anywhere. WPS AI revolutionizes your workflow by offering functions like AI-Powered document scanner, AI-generated content, rewriting, ChatPDFs, and more. „ÄåFeatures of WPS AI „Äç 1. AI-Powered Document Scanner ‚Ä¢ Digitize paper documents, extract & erase elements rapidly and accurately! 2. WPS AI-generated content (AIGC) ‚Ä¢ Get instant and high-quality content like meeting summaries, event planning, resumes, etc, all with a prompt! 3. AI-powered rewriting ‚Ä¢ WPS AI is here to offer professional rewriting and polishing work. ‚Ä¢ WPS AI is committed to be a powerful writing assistant and revolutionize the writing process. 4. ChatPDFs ‚Ä¢ Free from tedious PDF-reading workload! ‚Ä¢ WPS AI is able to effortlessly process long PDFs and provides summaries, outlines or translations as you like. ‚Ä¢ Engage in conversations with WPS AI and get instant answers about the PDFs. 5. AI-powered OCR ‚Ä¢ Revolutionized OCR technology helps to deal with the data entry work. ‚Ä¢ Ready to provide insights for any scanned document. ‚òÖAs a professional word processor, WPS Office is compatible with various office softwares in core functions, more intelligent and easier. „Äå Typical Features of WPS Office „Äç 1. Powerful Office Suite on your Android device ‚Ä¢ Using templates to start editing your budget, Word, Presentations, sheet, resumes, documents and other files. ‚Ä¢Using tools to convert and process Document, PDF and images. ‚Ä¢Easy to create, edit, share files and collaborated on with others in real-time. 2. Scan, view, edit, convert PDF on your Android device ‚Ä¢ Free PDF viewer that can open, view, share and comment on PDFs anywhere and on any device. ‚Ä¢ Convert all Office documents (Word, Text, Sheet, PowerPoint, Docs, Images) to PDF. ‚Ä¢ Scan paper documents to PDF. ‚Ä¢ Support PDF annotation, PDF signature, PDF extraction/split, PDF merge. ‚Ä¢ Easily add and delete watermarks in PDF. 3. Powerful cloud storage function, you are not afraid of losing documents ‚Ä¢ Use WPS Cloud to manage all documents, synchronize in real time on mobile phones and computers, and easily and directly access and edit office documents ‚Ä¢ Save documents to third-party clouds: Dropbox, Google Drive, Box, Evernote and Microsoft OneDrive. 4. Solutions for working remotely on Android devices ‚Ä¢ 1G free cloud storage, support online editing and sharing of files, easy to build and join the cloud team. ‚Ä¢ Easy to share office documents via WIFI, NFC, DLNA, email, instant messaging, WhatsApp, Telegram, Facebook and Twitter. Now available PC and Mac for free , please visit the following link: https://www.wps.com/download/ Support page: https://www.wps.com/support/
descriptionHTML:
‚òÖWPS Office-Free Office suite for Word, PDF, Sheet, is an all-in-one office suite integrates Word docs, PDF, Sheet spreadsheets, PowerPoint slides, WPS AI, Forms, Cloud Storage, Online Editing, Template library and Sharing. Access various WPS Office functions through mobile devices, such as scan PDF files, edit slides, convert spreadsheets, or view documents anytime, anywhere. WPS AI revolutionizes your workflow by offering functions like AI-Powered document scanner, AI-generated content, rewriting, ChatPDFs, and more.

„ÄåFeatures of WPS AI „Äç
1. AI-Powered Document Scanner
‚Ä¢ Digitize paper documents, extract & erase elements rapidly and accurately!

2. WPS AI-generated content (AIGC)
‚Ä¢ Get instant and high-quality content like meeting summaries, event planning, resumes, etc, all with a prompt!

3. AI-powered rewriting
‚Ä¢ WPS AI is here to offer professional rewriting and polishing work.
‚Ä¢ WPS AI is committed to be a powerful writing assistant and revolutionize the writing process.

4. ChatPDFs
‚Ä¢ Free from tedious PDF-reading workload!
‚Ä¢ WPS AI is able to effortlessly process long PDFs and provides summaries, outlines or translations as you like.
‚Ä¢ Engage in conversations with WPS AI and get instant answers about the PDFs.

5. AI-powered OCR
‚Ä¢ Revolutionized OCR technology helps to deal with the data entry work.
‚Ä¢ Ready to provide insights for any scanned document.

‚òÖAs a professional word processor, WPS Office is compatible with various office softwares in core functions, more intelligent and easier.

„Äå Typical Features of WPS Office „Äç
1. Powerful Office Suite on your Android device
‚Ä¢ Using templates to start editing your budget, Word, Presentations, sheet, resumes, documents and other files.
‚Ä¢Using tools to convert and process Document, PDF and images.
‚Ä¢Easy to create, edit, share files and collaborated on with others in real-time.

2. Scan, view, edit, convert PDF on your Android device
‚Ä¢ Free PDF viewer that can open, view, share and comment on PDFs anywhere and on any device.
‚Ä¢ Convert all Office documents (Word, Text, Sheet, PowerPoint, Docs, Images) to PDF.
‚Ä¢ Scan paper documents to PDF.
‚Ä¢ Support PDF annotation, PDF signature, PDF extraction/split, PDF merge.
‚Ä¢ Easily add and delete watermarks in PDF.

3. Powerful cloud storage function, you are not afraid of losing documents
‚Ä¢ Use WPS Cloud to manage all documents, synchronize in real time on mobile phones and computers, and easily and directly access and edit office documents
‚Ä¢ Save documents to third-party clouds: Dropbox, Google Drive, Box, Evernote and Microsoft OneDrive.

4. Solutions for working remotely on Android devices
‚Ä¢ 1G free cloud storage, support online editing and sharing of files, easy to build and join the cloud team.
‚Ä¢ Easy to share office documents via WIFI, NFC, DLNA, email, instant messaging, WhatsApp, Telegram, Facebook and Twitter.


Now available PC and Mac for free , please visit the following link: https://www.wps.com/download/
Support page: https://www.wps.com/support/
summary: PDF, Word, Sheet, PowerPoint, Form & Notes

scraped_reviews.content: What appears as a great alternative to Microsoft Office, is just that...an appearance...the program has disappointed me multiple times with stuff it doesn't do that Microsoft Office does and the last straw for me was the fact that I went to open a template they supposedly provided so that I could make a cover letter and it said something like: "error: download unavailable, please make sure your internet is on" and my phone is fully connected to service of my carrier. Developers, WPS major fail!

too many ads! annoying when you convert a word document to a PDF and then save it it doesn't ACTUALLY save it or you can't find it in you're saved files on your phone if you go to attach it in something like a web portal message. Makes it hard to find a SIMPLE DOWNLOAD AS A FILE OPTION when you convert a file to another type and if you want to try to download it to your phone it's always giving you many options up front to include it AS A LINK but make it Hard to find the DOWNLOAD FILE OPTION.

Simply fantastic. This Office app is a must-use for everyone. Its effective and efficient tools are sufficient for me. But, in just a minute, enhance Night Mode in the (Open document) VIEW drop-down to Very Dark and Strong White texts since the phone default doesn't apply. This can be achieved for page backgrounds as well.

landscape view was great. used to be like a trick to get bigger font without compromising on having to scroll horizontally to read a line. the landscape view now is just a potrait view with waste, blurred space. I want this new change gone.. ugh. it's a basic feature. don't be like this. who's this stupid blur thing even helping. annoying

I'm experiencing the same issue as many others. I was recently charged 2,200 even though I didn't knowingly subscribe. I only signed up for the free trial and was not aware that it would automatically renew and deduct from my account without clearly notice. I immediately requested a refund many times, how ever they are denied. Please give consideration, I need to get my money back. I am kindly asking a full refund of the amount. Make action for this, this is really frustrating!

Hi! I'm experiencing the same issues as many others. last night i was recently charged for P 1200 even though i don't have an active subscription. I signed up for a 3 days free trial and without any notice, you automatically deducted from my account. I'm kindly asking for a refund, but always declined. Please give me some consideration. I badly needed the money for my allowance in 2 weeks. I am requesting a full refund for the amount. I was not aware of this auto deduct subscription. please!! ü•∫

descriptionHTML:
Over 75 million people have already chosen Memrise to achieve their language goals‚Äî make it your resolution this year! Whether it‚Äôs finally speaking Spanish, brushing up on French, or mastering Japanese, Memrise makes learning authentic, engaging, and unforgettable.

Start 2025 strong by picking up a new language and sticking to it! With real-life conversations, cultural insights, and the confidence to speak like a local, Memrise is your ultimate partner for turning your resolution into reality.

Learn Spanish, Korean, Japanese or 31 other languages in lessons that teach you vocabulary, listening and speaking as if you were a local living in the country!

Choose a language from Spanish üá™üá∏üá≤üáΩ, Korean üá∞üá∑, Japanese üáØüáµ, English üá¨üáßüá∫üá∏, French üá´üá∑, Italian üáÆüáπ, Portuguese üáµüáπüáßüá∑, German üá©üá™, Polish üáµüá±, Russian üá∑üá∫, Turkish üáπüá∑, Arabic, Chinese üá®üá≥, Dutch üá≥üá±, Danish üá©üá∞, Icelandic üáÆüá∏, Mongolianüá≤üá≥, Norwegian üá≥üá¥, Slovenian üá∏üáÆ Yoruba üá≥üá¨ Hindi üáÆüá≥ Ukranian üá∫üá¶ Thai üáπüá≠ Swahili üáπüáøüá∞üá™, Hebrew üáÆüá± Greek üá¨üá∑ Indonesian üáÆüá©, Welsh üè¥Û†ÅßÛ†Å¢Û†Å∑Û†Å¨Û†Å≥Û†Åø, üáµüá≠ Tagalog, üáÆüá∑Persian, üáªüá≥ Vietnamese. Also added: Yoruba, Hausa, and Somali!

Memrise is the ultimate language-learning app for achieving your New Year‚Äôs goals. Whether you‚Äôre a beginner starting from scratch, an intermediate learner building confidence in listening and speaking, or an advanced learner perfecting your conversational skills, Memrise has everything you need to succeed.

Download Memrise and make this year the one where you confidently:

‚ù§Ô∏è Connect with your partner and their family
‚úàÔ∏è Have a better time while travelling
üí° Sharpen your mind if you‚Äôre learning a language for brain health
üìñ Prepare for a language exam
üíº Connect with work colleagues
üé® Better understand different cultures

How does Memrise help you learn Spanish, Korean, Japanese, and more?

-Choose from hundreds of lessons inspired by real-life scenarios to keep learning practical and relevant.
-Build your vocabulary with essential words and phrases locals actually use.
-Practice listening with thousands of videos featuring native speakers in everyday settings.
-Gain confidence speaking with AI Buddies: personalised language-learning bots. Practice sentence-building, grammar, conjugation, and all the essential skills to sound fluent in your new language.

üòé Tailored to your language level ability
üí™ Challenging but not overwhelming

‚≠ê Helping 75+ million learners speak confidently
‚≠ê 190,00 4.6 star ratings
‚≠ê Featured in BBC World Service, Conde Nast Traveller, Lonely Planet and more.

What other learners are saying

‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ "I've been using Memrise for about two years, studying European Portuguese. I have the paid version - it's a solid learning tool, and it has been my primary resource ever since got it. I find the Learn with Locals feature to be especially useful, more so as my Portuguese improves. My wife and I spent a couple of weeks in Portugal a few months ago, and we were able to handle all of our transactions - stores, restaurants, markets, car rental, etc!" -Volo√∫re

Need to speak a new language soon? Get the practice you need with Memrise Pro

Memrise Pro ‚úì Unlock all vocab lessons ‚úì Unlock all native speaker videos ‚úì Unlimited speaking practice ‚úì Ad free

Compare with our Free Plan - Limited vocab lessons - Limited videos and conversations ‚úï Ad free

*PLEASE READ: A Memrise Pro subscription is required in to access all learning features. These vary depending on your device's language and language pair. Once purchased, subscriptions will automatically renew unless cancelled before the end of the current payment period. Subscriptions can be managed in your Google Play Store account. To enable some features of the Memrise app we may need to ask for your permission. You can change permissions at any time in your settings.

Privacy Policy: https://www.memrise.com/privacy/
Terms of Use: https://www.memrise.com/terms/safa
summary: Make 2025 your year!Learn a language,connect with culture and speak confidently.

scraped_reviews.content: This app has potential. My biggest things are having to pay to have the grammatically explained to you. Limiting those explanations make it harder to fully grasp language learning. Also, the lessons move way too fast. When answering a question, you can't just reflect on it for a second, because it almost immediately goes to the next question. Navigating through the app is overwhelming and showing lessons that free users cannot access is just distracting. Learning common phrases does help.

Used a few hours and am impressed compared to similar aps. I didn't know I could select more than 1 word list, so I wound up doing semi-advanced conversations for moving abroad, which is a bit too difficult currently (yet still had fun). I tried going backward in lessons but couldn't, so I deleted all progress and am starting anew. Lessons have no tags/labels, so navigation is a bit convoluted. Will have to see what else is on here and re-review.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, thanks for your honest review. Sorry to hear that you aren't fully satisfied with Memrise. We appreciate you taking the time to send us your comments - we'll take your feedback into consideration for future updates. We're always glad to hear your thoughts, for more comments please reach out to us in the app (Profile - Settings - Help).

scraped_reviews.content: Better than other options, but they still change the program every 6 months or so and dump all progress. I'm not fast, just leave it alone. also, again to say it is far better than any other I've touched, but I can barely spell in English. there is no reason to circle through the same work I've misspelled 10 time already in one lesson to force me to somehow figure it out. leave it and let me come back.

I love this app! It teaches me words and phrases that aren't commonly taught while still teaching common words. It's super easy to interact with and the lessons are a lot of fun with variations. I also like that I can switch languages and learn more than one. I just can't stand how the app is down almost every day and I don't get to use it most days anymore. If it didn't crash so much I would probably spend my money on the upgrade. I just don't want to spend money on something that's broken.

So I started Memrise about 2 weeks ago and I really like the program and the way it is taught. I love native Spanish people showing the correct way to say the words. My only problem, I need a way to slow everything down. I can't hear some of the harder words because it is spoken too fast for me to understand each syllable. I would like to suggest some type of slow motion button so I can say the word correctly. Some of the words are tongue twisters. I believe that would help tremendously. thanks

Good overall. No basic review of the grammar is ever available which makes learning certain languages harder. The AI thing keeps prompting me to fill in nouns when I haven't learned any, so those lessons are useless; plus the pronunciation lessons will accept just about any pronunciation whether it's right or not. But the available vocabulary lists are extensive, so it's a pretty good complement to other study materials.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Thanks for your review! We'll suggest conversations we think you might be ready for based on the vocabulary you know, but as we don't yet have a high volume of conversations you may see the same ones again.

If you want to choose a different conversation from the one presented, just head to the Conversations and select one of your choice.

scraped_reviews.content: After a few weeks I have to edit my review. I'm not too fond of the lesson formats. They seem so random. However, the AI features are what gives this app such GREAT value for me. Definitely a keeper for that reason. We need something to train our minds into putting sentences together in the language we're learning. This app seems great for that.

A really good app to improve listening and vocab, but like any language learning app can't be your only source of information. Doesn't explain any sort of grammar. The native speaker videos are my favorite feature, because it really feels like "oh the stuff I'm learning could actually be used" which feels lacking with other apps. Also the videos are just charming.

Tried this for free for several days, liked it, paid for the annual. Immediately all of my progress disappeared and the app says I have done absolutely nothing in all that time. I have written to them several times and it's not even a real address. These guys might be absolute scammers! beware beware beware. I'm absolutely canceling my payment on my credit card because immediately after I paid -poof they disappeared. SCAMMERS!!!!!!! Seemed like a good app but I'm not impressed now
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry to hear your issue wasn't resolved! Can you please respond to the last message you received from Memrise Support? This will bring your case to the attention of the Support team. Alternatively, please reach out again via this form: https://memrisebeta.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/requests/new - Many thanks, Memrise team

scraped_reviews.content: OG 5 star review: It's a great supplement for learning languages Current: I loved the ability to search so many different sets of vocab and was using this to study for the JLPT. Ifibally bought the lifetime pro and then all their sets went away. Now I'm stuck with the same beginner words and cant choose a difficulty setting to make it harder. Also in the chats it won't let me type in Japanese! Don't waste your money, this app used to be WAY better. I regret buying this.

I'm having to change from 5 stars to 2 stars because, as someone said with learning Mandarin, the same thing is happening on the Japanese course with the Kanji. As it introduces a new Kanji, instead of having its translation in English at the bottom like it used to, it just has the same Kanji character which is completely useless an unhelpful. Please fix this! You have been my favorite language learning app and I'd like to still be able to use Memrise.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Elisabeth, „ÅÇ„Çä„Åå„Å®„ÅÜ„Åî„Åñ„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô for learning Japanese on Memrise. We are pushing the fix for this in the next release, so please watch out for future updates. I'm sorry it will be a bit less great until then...Êú¨ÂΩì„Å´„Åî„ÇÅ„Çì„Å™„Åï„ÅÑÔºÅKana

scraped_reviews.content: I love this app! I'm learning Norwegian and im almost on level 2 or "Norwegian 2" its called. I've been learning Norwegian fooooor a few months? Memrise is fun and easy to use. Some things require pay, but you don't have to. I'm learning Norwegian perfectly fine without paying. I definitely recommend this app to anyone who is interested in learning a new language. They start off with the basics. Like, communication. Saying sorry and such things similar to that. Enjoy and practice! Work hard!!!!!!

I use this app every day. First I paid for 1 year, but the lifetime membership is a much better deal. My favorite part is that they have videos of actual people saying the phrases. I also like the listening exercises. One improvement they could make: As you're reviewing a phrase in your target language, they don't always give you the English translation. As a result, sometimes I'm reviewing phrases, but I have absolutely no idea what they mean. I love this app! It's super!!

When I downloaded this app at the beginning of the year, it was phenomenal! I felt like I had finally found the hidden gem of language learning software. It updated automatically in February to a new and illogical version. They've intentionally removed all of the community generated languages from the app, so all my progress was lost. They did not notify me of any upcoming changes at all. Just decided to render hundreds and thousands of learners 'expelled,' so to speak, from the app.

I've enjoyed using this app for about a year. I use it in tandem with other learning apps. However, the most recent update has messed with my daily streaks and made them go away. Even after I complete my at quota for the day and it says that my daily goal has been met, it's all gone the next day. 300+ days gone away. I know it's a little thing but it's a little frustrating when you had made a goal and the way you were tracking it messes up.

Absolute trash app. They had something good and replaced it with some new nonsense. You cannot access older courses unless you were already using them. For instance, I can access Spanish I & II because I had already used those courses, but I am not allowed to access any of the rest of the older Spanish courses. Their new program is trash--it tries to do way too much and fails at nearly all of it.

It's disappointing that after paying for the monthly subscription, I can not get the app to work and and no one from support has responded to my email that was submitted several days ago. I have deleted, reinstalled, restarted my phone, and nothing works. With no response from tech support, all I can do is delete this app and lose the payment. I am extremely disappointed that any business would think it's ok to take a customer's money and not provide support. Good thing there's other apps!

ive just started an it was kind of difficult to understand in the beginning but you take the time and patients to understand it and i believe this app could teach you how to learn another language through muscle memory. although it does look like the really pressure you to buy the app if you are someone who wants to progress. If it didnt cost as much id buy it.

The mnemonics are quite good. My only complaint is that, if you try to get a less common language, that they offer on the website, onto the phone app, it doesn't do well with syncing those. I finally got a Cherokee lesson onto my phone, but it felt like I just got lucky. On the other hand, a common language like Russian, was no problem.

It's not bad. I used it for about a few days, missed a day or two. Do like the idea of the little clips - it's nice to hear conversations in German. Just subscribed so we'll see what that's like. ETA I knocked down a couple stars. Probably doing something wrong but am not noticing any difference between the free version and having a subscription. All the content/features seems to be the exact same.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, sorry to hear that! Can you please contact us in the app (Profile - Settings - Help) and send us more details? We‚Äôll sort this out asap! Memrise team

scraped_reviews.content: Please read me. Not a bot. I recommend this app to a lot of people. It works, but don't think that you don't have to practice. I've gotten better with French, Spanish and now I'm working on Portuguese (Brazil). If you are serious about learning then the free version is perfect to start. Keep reviewing vocab until done and get compliments on your accent in no time. Just do these as well and your good. 1 watch videos on speaking/movies 2 listen to music in language 3 learn lyrics and you're good.

I've tried several language apps and this is one of my favorites. There are multiple ways of learning each new word or phrase, and my favorite is being offered a literal translation. I do wish it would give me the *meaning* of a word when i misremember it, and not just the literal translation, but that is a minor annoyance in an otherwise pleasant and useful set of tools. Memrise offers me the most control over what i learn and when, which is important to me!

Damn this was my all time favorite app years ago, got myself to like almost B1 German and this helped a lot. Picked it back up and not only does it look and act crazy but... really? You need pro to "unlock" basic lessons? Like the first 3 basic lessons are locked lol, pretty useless for a language learning app. I'd pay to remove ads. But I won't pay to have the actual lessons that used to be free. And I definitely won't pay a subscription üòÇ must be out of your minds

I really think this is one of the best language learning apps out there.... But it has one major flaw. I'm here to learn a language and speak it fluently, but the app is way too easy. To properly learn a language, all inputs need to be done on either typing or voice. There needs to be a setting in app that allows users to make answering more difficult (voice or typing inputs only rather than multiple choice). I had to take a star away because of this problem.

I love this app, I think it's a tool you need when you start the process of learning a new language, so easy to use, I've progressed a lot since I started, just a recommendation for the team, I loved the old planets interface with the ziggy pet, It was so colorful, this one seems like and extension of another language program that is yellow and I don't want to say the name hahaha, other than that so pleased with this app.

It's not a bad language app as language apps go. However one of its key lackings is the fact that you don't hear the words so often. Very few words have audio. This may be a teaser to get him to buy the full version which is really quite expensive. Also there are number of errors in vocabulary which are exposed via inconsistencies, but these are not so many as to make it not worth your while. I am using this app to learn Estonian.

Native audio and great flashcards. The problem for me is the paywall. You only get a few flashcards and the rest are only available if you pay. For example I was doing korean 1, and I was only able to learn 33 of the 538 flashcards. If you want to learn more you have to pay and as of now, it's $8.49 a month, $29.99 a year, or $119.99 for lifetime accont.

There's probably no value in downloading this app. It used to be a really good flashcard app that could help you learn a language. Now it is an (at best) so-so language-learning app whose resources you can easily find for free elsewhere (Chat GPT-3, YouTube video playlists, flash card apps etc.) There are other language learning apps with more structured and in-depth curricula for similar prices. I would still recommend the community courses on browser if you can still access them though.

Hi, so as you can see from my profile, I have been using this app daily for over 6 years. When I logged in this morning I was prompted to try the newest version, which I was excited to do. However, upon opening the new version I found that all of my previous modules and history including all of my missed words were gone. I cannot find a way to go back to the previous version. Is all of that just gone now? If so, that is incredibly short sighted on the dev teams part...

Even without the paid subscription, this app has many options for learning languages that really help. I recommend using it mainly for vocabulary which is what I do. for this purpose it works great actually. The key to getting a lot from the app us having a good course to use that includes audio or even references to other languages. I amso find the mems to be great but for some of them they're either useless or non-existent. If you can work within those parameters then you will like it.

I have used this app on and off for a while and the recent update introduced full page ads with video and sound, sometimes it even gives me a scare when using headphones and the ad blasts my ears with sound effects. Went from 5 stars to 1... Wish there was a one time in app purchase to remove ads but I don't like the expensive premium subscription.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your honest review. Having ads in place allows us to keep developing the app experience while keeping the core content free for our learners - however we appreciate getting your feedback to pass on to our team. For the ad-free experience and to unlock extra features, you may find discounts by tapping Upgrade in the app. Memrise team

scraped_reviews.content: This app is a good app, you do have to pay for full lessons but you will learn some stuff free, you have the option of paying for full class courses to learn the language. But other than that this app is so amazing, I love learning new languages. Its easy to understand, and it tests you on memory to knowing the words. Totally worth it guys.

I am using the free version to learn Swedish. I absolutely love the videos of real people saying the words and phrases. It's so much more natural to learn this way. I also love the repetition and the literal English translation of the Swedish phrases. I've tested out the AI chat feature and it's great. As an addition, I would love if there was a way to practice or be tested on all the words and phrases that were learned, combined altogether. I will probably buy the full version on the app.

I loved this app and used it constantly, and was thrilled that I could use it offline on the train in Japan to review. Now "mobile support has ended" and I have to go to the website which doesn't work as well as the app did. The website is still great but I'm furious that I just paid for a full year a couple months ago and can't do anything on my phone anymore.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry for the confusion and frustration caused here. We hear your concerns and we‚Äôre addressing them. Please see our blog, where we'll be posting all updates pertaining to changes in the app and the future of community courses: https://www.memrise.com/blog/changes-to-the-memrise-app

scraped_reviews.content: Sorry to have to change my rating, but I paid for being able to use the app for the community lessons even though I knew I didn't have to. I am learning Thai that does not have the advanced courses now needed to use the app and will have to use a web based site. That wouldn't be so bad if the audio worked right, but it cuts out the end of most sentences both on the computer (Firefox, Edge). I really liked this app.

This app uses a flash card system alongside numerous audio samples so that you understand how the words are supposed to sound. It's got several safety measures to ensure that some words aren't slipping through the cracks. Really, even if I didn't want to learn a new language (which is clearly not the case), the learning process feels enough like brain teasing to give my mind a pleasant sort of active feeling.

I mourn the older version of the app(that won the Google App award) like i mourn for the Library of Alexandria. It used to have flashcards to learn ANYTHING, not just languages, and one could make ones own flashcards on website to be downloaded to the app. I was learning constellations when the app was modified. Now it is only languages. Dont get me wrong, languages are awesome, but the old app was legendarily superior. Still looking for anything half its equal.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, sorry to hear you've fallen out of love with Memrise:( We made these changes based on extensive user research, in order to create a better experience for you. You can read more at https://memri.se/2uk That said, we still take on board all feedback our customers give us, so thanks for your comments!

scraped_reviews.content: I remember getting this app a long time ago back when it was free and you didnt have to pay for certain courses. I honestly miss it. I deleted it because of that but other than that, it was great. Using mnemonics to memorize languages is the best way to go. I learned the Korean alphabet in 30 min., Russian alphabet in 30 min., and 2/3 of the Japanese ones in an hour. 2 hours to learn how to read words in 3 languages. But then it started wanting to charge post update and it wasnt working for me.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, thank you for your good words. We understand our prices might not be for everyone, however, they allow us to continue developing quality courses, as well as our learning tech. We hope you understand. Please do keep an eye out for special promotions by visiting the Plans tab in the app or https://www.memrise.com/premium/ on web

scraped_reviews.content: Used to have some great community-made courses. That's what I used it for. Then today it asked me to sync my progress. Now the only courses available are a select set of house language courses. I can't even log into my old account. I'm extremely disappointed. I'd found it very useful previously, but now it's only good for much more limited purposes.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry for the confusion and frustration caused here. We hear your concerns and we‚Äôre addressing them. Please see our blog, where we'll be posting all updates pertaining to changes in the app and the future of community courses: https://www.memrise.com/blog/changes-to-the-memrise-app

scraped_reviews.content: So I loved the first lesson, it was really simple and didn't go to fast for me which normally language apps do but on the second lesson it gave me a sentence and had me put it in order for grammar purposes and I'm fine with that but it would be great if you picked words you taught me in the first lesson or at least mention some of the words but no. And when I try to skip it wont let me so...
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Alex Dean, Thanks very much for the detailed feedback, we will take it on board! Caitlin from Memrise

scraped_reviews.content: I used to enjoy this app (especially with the idea that new words are seeds and you have to practice to 'water' them) but the new version is not fun to use at all. All the 'practice' is words I've never heard before - I understand challenging myself but this is ridiculous. Canceled my subscription, I think I'll be doing my language studying the old-school way moving forward. :(

I feel lied to and scammed. I paid for the subscription to learn Bengali because it's one of the few apps that teach the Sylhet dialect. However, after I paid for it, I realized all they teach you is a few basic words (somewhere around 6 words) and nothing else, while the other classes are a lot more detailed. So I paid to learn the exact same words that were free on the app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry to hear you're dissatisfied. We don't offer official courses for your source language, but community-created courses may be available on our website. We're not responsible for the content, but you can contact the creator through our forum at community.memrise.com/. Best regards

scraped_reviews.content: So far, so good. It is helping me slowly learn Japanese. However, at this point,making me communicate with AI as part of my curriculum is pointless. The AI, as far as I can tell, doesn't conform to the words you know or the level you are. It just goes straight out the gate at a high level. Due to that, I had to use translate and type my answers in Eng and have the app translate. It would be nice if the AI didn't start until you at least got most of the way through basic conversational levels.

It's been 4 years since I first installed this app. I soon quickly got frustrated that I wasn't remembering words or how to form sentences; I eventually gave up. Now in 2020, I am live streaming into all of Japan from my semi-truck, where its almost imperative I know Japanese! So I am giving this app another try, and spent $130+ for the lifetime subscription. I hope I won't get discouraged again. I have heard they are now teaching English again in schools across Japan! Maybe I can help them 2.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Chris! 

Thank you very much for your feedback. There are currently Japanese 1 (17 levels), Japanese 2 (32 levels) and Japanese 3 (55 levels) available for English speakers. Japanese 4-7 are currently being developed. I hope you continue to learn on our official courses!

scraped_reviews.content: It was good. Then they took off the download capabilities. I fly quite often and use to be able to take lessons while I'm on airplane mode. I thought the AI stuff was a good step up. it feels like a real conversation. But the download feature needs to be brought back so I can always take lessons on the go. I don't want to have to buy WiFi connectivity to take lessons. The only reason why I went to the pro version was so I can download the lessons.

I'm learning German and this app is great! I paid for a lifetime subscription and I think it was very much worth it. It's great to hear proper pronunciation, and I like the fact that you learn the words by listening first rather than reading. There aren't formal grammer lessons, so if you want that, this app isn't for you. You learn by listening, which is how we naturally learn languages, especially our first languages when we were babies. It's the same methodology as Rosetta Stone.

Really has helped me learn how to read Japanese. My biggest problem is with the pronunciation part of the lessons. For some reason, no matter how much I try, it refuses to recognize that I'm pronouncing the Japanese words correctly. I know that my accent and pronunciation are correct because I have Japanese friends who have told me that my accent is fantastic. The app does not recognize the words I'm saying and I fail the pronunciation part every time.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, sorry to hear this! To try and fix this, can you please uninstall the app, restart your device and then reinstall it? This tends to refresh the system and solve the error. If the issue persists, please contact us in the app (Profile - Settings - Help) and send us more details. We‚Äôll sort this out asap! Memrise team

scraped_reviews.content: Everything past the first course appears to be locked. It's barely enough to get a taste for the language, in the case of Japanese you can't even get through their Hiragana syllabary. The app seems really awesome, but it's all behind a pay wall way to early. You can get through so much more with duolingo, drops, lingo deer and many other before hitting the pay wall memrise has set up. Truly unfortunate.

I like a lot about this app, but some shortcomings. There aren't explanations or breakdowns in certain pronunciations that would be very helpful for new learners. It is great that the lessons are primarily taught by native speakers, but this also means they speak pretty quickly, fairly often. This makes it more challenging to break down phrases to learn, requiring phrases to be repeated, a lot, at times. I do wish the full subscription wasn't expensive, as there are lessons I can't get to.

After using the app for a while, I find it frustrating that I can't learn what I would like to. I was progressing through the Japanese 1 course, and once I finished that it told me that I had to pay to acfess the other lessons. I feel it's dishonest to call this app "free" when only the first 14 words of the language are actually free. That's like saying that the app is "free" to download, but you have to pay to access any of it's content.

title: Google Gemini
description:
Supercharge your creativity and productivity with Gemini, your AI assistant from Google.

Gemini gives you direct access to Google‚Äôs best family of AI models on your phone so you can:

- Go Live with Gemini to brainstorm ideas, simplify complex topics, and rehearse for important moments. Just click on the Gemini Live button in your Gemini app
- Connect with your favorite Google apps like Search, YouTube, Google Maps, Gmail, and more
- Study smarter and explore any topic with interactive visuals and real-world examples
- Turn any file into a podcast that you can listen to anytime, anywhere
- Create stunning images from just a few words
- Plan trips better and faster
- Get summaries, deep dives, and source links, all in one place
- Brainstorm new ideas, or improve existing ones

Try Nano Banana: state of the art image generation and editing built on Gemini 2.5 Flash

Level-up your Gemini app experience by upgrading to the Pro plan‚Äìunlock new and powerful features to tackle complex tasks and projects and enjoy industry-leading 1M token context window (enabling Gemini to process up to 1,500 pages of text or 30k lines of code), and:
- Get more access to our most powerful model, like 2.5 Pro
- Generate and dive into detailed reports on any topic with Deep Research powered by 2.5 Pro
- Turn words into high-quality, 8 second video clips with video generation with Veo 3.1, and more. 

Google AI Pro is available in 150 countries and territories, and includes additional benefits. Gemini app, as part of Google AI Pro, will continue to be available to qualifying Google Workspace business and education plans. Learn more: https://gemini.google/subscriptions/

Get the best of Gemini app by upgrading to the Ultra plan‚Äìunlock the highest level of access and exclusive features to turn anything into anything. Get the highest access to Google‚Äôs most powerful model, like 2.5 Pro, and features like video generation with Veo 3.1 and Deep Research. You‚Äôll also get early access to try our newest AI innovations as they become available, including Agent Mode.

Gemini in Google AI Ultra is available in the US and includes additional benefits as part of a Google AI Ultra subscription. Google AI Ultra is not currently available to Google Workspace business and education customers. Learn more: https://gemini.google/subscriptions/

If you opt in to the Gemini app, it will replace your Google Assistant as the primary assistant on the phone. Some Google Assistant voice features aren't available through the Gemini app yet. You can switch back to Google Assistant in settings.

Review the Gemini Apps Privacy Notice:
https://support.google.com/gemini?p=privacy_notice
