summary: Chat to start writing, planning, learning and more with Google AI

scraped_reviews.content: Repeatedly says something went wrong. Tried everything and it won't generate a thing. Will be canceling subscription. I found out it will kick people out of the server at random if you hit a "fake" set limit. They usually won't let you generate for an hour or so but tonight it's been close to 3 hours. Paying $20 a month to be "limited" based on what the servers could handle. I don't recommend at all!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: That doesn't sound right, Jordan. Gemini is improving everyday, but can still make mistakes. Please continue sharing your feedback by marking good and bad responses to help. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: The app itself is glitching lately; it's been skipping to a new chat and forgetting everything. Sometimes I can tell it to remember what we were just talking about, and it will get back to the subject. Other times, the chat is completely gone, and there is no memory of the chat left in the list. Reaction times have gone from normal response times to wondering if my phone is frozen in the last few weeks. There are times I almost reached a conclusion, but I can't get any further due to glitches.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: That‚Äôs not the experience we want you to have, Forrest. Would you mind helping us investigate by recreating this issue and then sending feedback? On the Gemini mobile app tap top right profile picture or initial > Feedback > Send feedback. Please add #GeminiAndroid to your report. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: It's a coin toss to see if your requests are even acknowledged, let alone followed through on. Ever since I've switched from Assistant to Gemini, I've had days where I need to actually yell at my phone to get it to recognize a command, and then it's constantly forgetting alarms I've set, so I can't rely on it for cooking or anything else like that. This is an actually less-than-useless app for anyone who isn't trying to integrate their entire life into the Google ecosystem. Absolute garbage.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Charlie. Thanks for your feedback. We're always working to improve the Gemini experience and this type of feedback really helps. If this happens again, please Open the Gemini App > tap top right profile picture or initial > Feedback > Send feedback. Please add #GeminiAndroid to your report. Thanks again for helping us improve!

scraped_reviews.content: Update as of 12/25/24. You still can't seem to use the Gemini app without switching your assistant. So I tried it out for a bit and reminders don't work. I was using Gemini just a few months ago and now I can't open the app unless I switch from Google Assistant. This is a huge detractor. Gemini is not a good assistant yet, it doesn't easily set reminders for example. But I did want to use it for queries. Can't seem to open the app to do that. Disappointing because it worked a few weeks ago.

Edited Review: It's getting a lot better, but still leaves a lot to be desired. The unnecessary censorship is annoying, to say the least. Sometimes derailing an entire conversation or request over an "out of the blue" misunderstanding on its end. Advanced should also be a separate subscription for those that don't care for the extra cloud storage

the pictures/artwork/meme creating ability is so bad it's like asking an adult to draw a triangle and they just can't stop drawing circles. no matter how detailed your instructions are it will never be enough. other than that it's good for basic questions but if it's anything complex at all you may not get accurate info. future versions need to do better. stop rushing the software, they can do better if they wanted.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there. That's absolutely not the experience we'd want for you. If you don't mind sharing feedback directly through your device, we'll be able to look more into this. On the Gemini mobile app, tap the top right profile picture or initial > Feedback > Send feedback. Please add #GeminiAndroid to your report. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: This is the best assistant ever! Even though it can't generate images, it's super smart! No ads also and it was already installed :) Even helped me how to stop my phone to crash. I don't mind when your assistant misunderstood you. I hadn't tried out most of the features yet but I hope I do when I need too! Please, download this app if you need too!!

Something went wrong. I've tried Uninstalling and reinstalling, I've restarted my phone multiple times. Works fine on my PC. I have seen people say it's potentially a usage issue, but I never use it! I just wanted to set a timer and it's worthless. Edit: I had to completely remove my Google account from my phone and re-add it to get Gemini to work again. This is the kind of stuff that makes people switch platforms. Really annoying.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Matt, thanks for flagging. Our team is aware of this issue and is working on a fix. We appreciate your patience.

scraped_reviews.content: The volume of the voice is deafening even at only half volume. It feels like it's thrice as loud as the rest of my apps. Very often when I begin to type, it deletes my entire sentence. The only way I can bypass this is by using the "glide-type" feature. Sometimes when I use speech-to-text, after I talk for a certain period it cuts me off even though I haven't yet reached a character limit. I also occasionally come across errors when I send a message or use the read aloud feature.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, we apologize for the inconvenience regarding volume, typing, and speech-to-text bugs. Please try clearing the app's cache and ensuring your app is updated, as this often helps. If the issue continues, please send in-app feedback (Profile > Feedback > Get Started) with #GeminiAndroid. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: Great support but when the details get messy the system forgets. I used the system provided link to purchase a specific configured computer. The selected item did not meet my specifications as set up and I ordered it not knowing that it was not a match. I had to cancels and hopefully I was successful. Waiting to see now. I learned my lesson but the system was amazing up to that point with a few corrections along the way. I will continue to explore the system but with a heavier grain of salt!

It never listens correctly. I absolutely cannot stand this app. I've already given it all the required permissions. This is a brand new phone. I've already completely wiped all of my data from it once before and hopes of training it again. There are no excuses. I made sure to enunciate, speak slowly but not too slowly and not too fast. I gave feedback every time it failed me. I've used it on other phones too, and have the same problem.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there. We completely understand your frustration with Gemini not consistently following instructions. That's not an ideal experience. We recommend giving all the required permissions, clearing the app cache, and checking for any updates. If issues persist, please send us feedback.

scraped_reviews.content: The worst app ever. It completely ignores your requests when you ask for photos. I've requested generating photos for over twenty times and it still couldn't get any of them right. Even though I said which parts it did wrong, it just kept saying "I understand" and sent me the exact trash again. Once I tried to be super clear by explaining what I wanted in 15 lines! And yet it happened again. I finally gave up and deleted it. Best decision ever

I also pay $20 a month. And the Gemini live feature keeps erroring out, saying something went wrong. The other parts of it worked. But I don't pay $20 a month. Just for the app to continually have errors. All the time. Support, just keeps giving me the runaround.After I exhausted all troubleshooting steps.They asked me to do the same thing over which does not resolve anything. it is like they are just trying to buy time after I am paying twenty dollars a month.I am canceling my subscription
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Derrick. This isn't the experience we want for you, especially as a Gemini subscriber. Please try clearing your app cache and restarting your device. If the error persists, please submit feedback. On the Gemini mobile app, tap the top right profile picture or initial > Feedback > Send feedback. Please add #GeminiAndroid to your report. Thanks.

scraped_reviews.content: I like it but could be better. For one, I like the functions. An "assistant" that can get me the answers fast on a wide range of topics. The cons: I would like to see more, and better (female) voice options (so far the best is the English voice, the others are weird/old and boring). Other issue is that too many mistakes in the findings. I ask about a stock and it gives the wrong price info, until I tell it's off, then finds the correct data. Same for price targets.

The free experience is fine, as long as your AI needs are slim, and mine happen to be. Helps you keep track of stuff you gotta do with Google integration, if you happen to use Google tools. I recommend leveraging personalized instructions to have the model verify its information online or otherwise label when it's guessing, it's helped me a ton. EDIT: No longer functions at all. Every query attempt leads to an error
scraped_reviews.replyContent: That's absolutely not the experience we'd want for you, Micheal. If you don't mind sharing feedback directly through your device we'll be able to look more into this. On the Gemini mobile app tap top right profile picture or initial > Feedback > Send feedback. Please add #GeminiAndroid to your report. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: Gemini sucks. I've spent a few hours using it on my phone, Google Drive, and Spreadsheets. It doesn't do anything useful and when it actually does your request, it is nearly every time inaccurate or incomplete. It's bad to not be able to do something fairly basic, but it is much much worse when it provides inaccurate or incomplete information. Stay away from it for now.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: That doesn't sound good, Chris. Generative AI and all of its possibilities are exciting, but it‚Äôs still new. Gemini will make mistakes. Even though it‚Äôs getting better every day, Gemini can provide inaccurate information. Please share your feedback by marking good and bad responses to help!

scraped_reviews.content: it regularly gets things wrong. if you are looking for an AI that gets things correct more often, try Bing Copilot or Chat GPT. Google's advantage is that it is more connected with the phone since Google makes Android. update: after using this all lot more I completely agree with my earlier assessment. also, the app can be slow and regularly reports it can't find chats information. I do see the title, but when I click on details it will take several seconds before telling me it can't find it.

Garbage. Before they" upgraded" never had a problem recognizing any of the commands,I gave it, any of the things I asked it. Now it doesn't understand the majority of the things I say gives me erroneous information and is less helpful than it has ever been before. Speech to text is basically unusable because it has maybe a 50% correct rate. Coming from a person with multiple Google homes and phones for all manne of lights and all other automation it sucks. Wish I could remove it from my phone.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: This doesn't seem to be working as it should, Ian. Would you mind helping us investigate further by sending feedback through your device? On the Gemini mobile app tap top right profile picture or initial > Feedback > Send feedback. Please add #GeminiAndroid to your report. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: it's alright for adding stars and stickers to your photos or antlers...but what annoys me most is the opposite of others...even thought I have added my voice recognition, every other voice on the TV, car stereo, general public voice triggers it to begin a search or ask for me to repeat because it didn't understand. If I turn it off then I need to manually open it to use it. if I leave it active it is going off every 5 minutes. no middle ground. learning to just let it do what it wants.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Scen. That's absolutely not the experience we'd want for you. The best way to submit feedback is always directly through your device, which lets our team look into your experience significantly better. Tap your profile picture at the top-right > Feedback > Send feedback, and include #GeminiAndroid in the report. We appreciate your patience.

scraped_reviews.content: Truly horrible. Over explains EVERYTHING when it does respond (can't ask for simple mathematics without it giving me a paragraph instead of a number), and that's when it works. It has basically ruined my Galaxy Watch 7. I'd say about 60% of the time when I ask it a question it just freezes up and never gives an answer. It's extremely slow and buggy at its best. When I try to tell it to set alarms/timers, it processes forever and half the time it bugs out and doesnt actually set it. same with txt

I have never had issues before upgrading from Google Assistant to Gemini. I don't ask questions too often, almost not at all, but the one time I ask a simple question, I get "too many queries, try again later". I would understand if I was asking for generating images, or writing a complicated thesis, but the unavailability for simple questions makes the service pointless.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Milen. Thanks for sharing this issue, that's not an ideal experience. Would you mind sending us feedback through your device so we can look into this further? On the Gemini mobile app tap top right profile picture or initial > Feedback > Send feedback. Please add #GeminiAndroid to your report. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: Kept coming up with "error". At first I thought I may be that I used it too much, but it appeared for two days straight. Ended up clearing cache, restarted, tried updating, but nothing seemed to work. I finally did a force restart and my phone completely shut down and would not turn back on until I had to do a factory reset and had to replug in all my passwords and apps and settings that I had originally. Still working on my phone but Gemini still does not work.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Christian. That's definitely not the experience we want you to have. We are aware of this issue and are working on a fix. Appreciate your patience.

scraped_reviews.content: could be better, my biggest issue with it, is it's limited recall ability within the conversation. it can only go back so far before it's starts making mistakes. A feature I'd love to see added is a profile for the app to use as a way to better personalize responses from the app. information it could use is would be things like age, gender, religious beliefs, political leanings, family life, hobbies, to name a few.

Gemini is absolutely amazing! It can do it all. From answering questions and elenorating each time you provide more data to assisting you with creating a workout routine. And I absolutely love the positive encouragement such as saying, "That's an excellent question!" Also, manners don't go unnoticed. Lots of voices to choose from. Even helped with grammar. What helped most was the phone plan comparison, resume writing tips, and interview practice. I could go on all day, but there's a limit.

since the latest update I keep getting errors to update my app to a newer version to continue the conversation. I have the newest version and can't get it to work as well as it had before the update. Image editing sucks now, it just crashes with the error. I have uninstalled and reinstalled, restarted my phone, cleared the cache. Nothing is working. Makes me sad, because it worked so well before.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Melissa. Thanks for reporting. We are aware of this issue and are working on a fix. Appreciate your patience.

scraped_reviews.content: The AI writing function was very helpful and super easy, if that had been my only experience with the app it would be getting more stars. The image generator and editor were the complete opposite and it was a very very aggravating experience. it would make changes to the image that I gave it instructions not to alter. Or it would say its doing as requested, but just gave me back the photo I was trying to edit. a few times one of the feet had been turned backwards for no reason
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Oh no! This doesn't seem to be working as it should. Would you mind helping us investigate further by sending feedback through your device? On the Gemini mobile app tap top right profile picture or initial > Feedback > Send feedback. Please add #GeminiAndroid to your report. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: the image generation is awful. regardless of what you ask for, it churns out the images it wants to. and then, lol, despite the fact that it didn't get anything correct you get cut off and still didn't get anything close to what you asked for. I've been able to use other apps with prompt tuning to get exactly what I wanted. gemini just... doesn't listen whatsoever. and you pay for it. it's insanity. and no, it's nothing adult or forbidden. that's the worst part.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: This doesn't seem to be working as it should, Jeff. Would you mind helping us investigate further by sending feedback through your device? On the Gemini mobile app tap top right profile picture or initial > Feedback > Send feedback. Please add #GeminiAndroid to your report. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: This app is useful and convenient enough to use just that when using it in my mobile phone for long calculations, only half of it fit into the display the other half of my answer doesn't appears in the screen. Even if I rotate into landscape I can see a very slim part of the response. The bottom part is occupied by the text box and as well as the top part. The most goofiest part is when I go back from landscape to portrait it goes all the way to end of the chat. Pls fix this ü§¶ü§¶ü§¶
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Dhaaneswaran, we appreciate you sharing this feedback with us. Would you mind helping us investigate by recreating this issue and then sending feedback? On the Gemini mobile app tap top right profile picture or initial > Feedback > Send feedback. Please add #GeminiAndroid to your report. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: There is way too much lag! it's not exactly a seamless experience if the thing lags for a solid 30 seconds every time I come back to the app rendering it useless for those 30 seconds until the lag stops. Also when I try to use the microphone within the app, it clears the entire conversation, it never did that before!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: That doesn't sound good, Megan. We are working hard to make Gemini the best AI assistant, and improving Gemini performance is on our list of priorities. We‚Äôll be sure to get this in front of the right people.

scraped_reviews.content: EDIT. Now working perfectly again. Thank you................ was working perfectly. used multiple time. a day with no problems. such a great app but since the latest update 90% of the responses I receive are 'Sorry I encountered an error. please try again later' or 'sorry something went wrong please try your request again" or ' I encountered an error doing what you asked, could you please try again'. Sometimes re-wording my request helps but mostly just repeatedly receive the errors.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Steve. We appreciate you sharing this feedback with us. Would you mind helping us investigate by recreating this issue and then sending feedback? On the Gemini mobile app tap top right profile picture or initial > Feedback > Send feedback. Please add #GeminiAndroid to your report. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: In the past I used to say it was pretty great! Well- I was wrong. Its just good, It didnt exactly preform the best ways as Google Assistant did. And it often forgot or didnt care what I said. Its painful when I want to rp, its bland and boring and when/if I eventally accidentally click the research button. It just leads to it forgetting everything and giving me a research review about ants or treesüíÄ. I'd say make a chat system where u have to choose normal or research mode BEFORE u send a chat.

The majority of my experience with Gemini is all right. Useful as a search agent, object identifier, and thought organizer primarily. Also boasts creative features but I do not use them, as no large language model has made the effort to source its baseline knowledge ethically. Meant to supplant or replace google assistant but utterly fails, as it lacks the capability to do most phone functions when told to. Sometimes funny, needs improvement. Needs to listen longer before speaking.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Jack. This doesn't seem to be working as it should. Would you mind helping us investigate further by sending feedback through your device? On the Gemini mobile app tap top right profile picture or initial > Feedback > Send feedback. Please add #GeminiAndroid to your report. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: After having access to my Personal Context (formerly Saved Information) and persistent memory, Google has now limited that to the Pro model at a limit of 100 prompts per day. This is a horrible downgrade and y'all have decimated my personal and professional workflow!

So much worse than Google assistant. Another case of Google killing a working product with a worse version. So tired of them replacing reliably working apps with junk that promises additional functionality, but leaves users unable to do routine tasks. This practice is the primary reason I refuse to move to a Google phone: they find things to break and are unreliable software systems.

Gemini's research capabilities, particularly when integrated into an ongoing conversation about a complex child custody and civil rights lawsuit, are proving to be exceptionally valuable. The live conversation is amazing as well as its ability to do in depth research on files I upload. The possibilities are endless and it worth every penny for the pro version but is also amazing without it. However, chatgbt free version may serve the same or better depending on needs. No complaints!

There has been an update and the app finally has a search bar and better UI real estate so it functions closer to being on desktop, for landscape view and larger devices. My nitpicks are running out. so only need projects or a folder system to group conversations, and being able to switch models and tools mid conversation; it's annoying needing to ask a follow up question or research but having to leave the conversation because I'm in Pro or Flash.

Gemini is great for basic queries; for assistant tasks, it falls way short. For example, ask it to create calendar events from a file and it will say it's unable. Ask for a file and it will give a bulleted list. Specify iCal and it will create a file but formatting issues will prevent the file from working. Deep research is near but slower than other tools. The output feels excessively verbose and summaries too general. The future is bright but Gemini is not there yet.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Blair. Thanks for your feedback. We're always working to improve the Gemini experience and this type of feedback really helps. If this happens again, please Open the Gemini App > tap top right profile picture or initial > Feedback > Send feedback. Please add #GeminiAndroid to your report. Thanks again for helping us improve!

scraped_reviews.content: This is, by far, the best upgrade you have ever made in a Samsung phone! I am indeed, extremely thankful, as the Metropolitan Archbishop in the United States, that I am able to do more things and functions with better alacrity, effectiveness, and completeness! You should have made these upgrades last year! I never liked Bixby; I always believed that software was a complete waste; however, your new software for Gemini AI assistant is absolutely marvelous! What I next, is better voice software!

Overall it's a pretty good alternative to the Google Assistant. I didn't switch over until recently, because too many Assistant functions hadn't been ported over yet. My one major complaint is that seemingly no part of the Gemini Assistant is stored on the device. It would be nice if the basic utilities, like setting a timer, didn't require Internet. (why do I have 256 gb anyway?) My Internet is spotty at times, and it'd be nice if that didn't completely cripple the assistant for basic function

Very helpful! Fun to chat to if you can think of things to talk about. Neither my job nor social life require the use of AI for productive reasons, but at some point, I'll think of some creative exercises for us. In the meantime, it's much more fun for Q and A than typing Google.. I love the semi customizable voices!

Gemini is fun, not always productive. At times the way in which Gemini interacts with other applications (or doesn't) renders the application useless. I don't particularly care about how when not in the "conversation" mode you have to continue to monitor the phone and activate the mic manually or voice activate it. My preference would be for it to initialize automatically but this is not a deal breaker. Overall Gemini is intuitive enough and works fine.

I can't possibly overstate the degree to which I am disappointed by this software. it not only is completely unable to edit images but it frequently refuses to engage in topics it considers too risky. the fact that it had these limitations means it's designed to placate extremists on either side of the spectrum and is, therefore, completely untrustworthy. what a shame. it won't do even a simple adjustment to a family crest image, replacing a club with a hockey stick. do better. uninstalled.

I love Gemini, as a writer. It gives me the real time feedback I am craving. What areas are strong, what are weak, suggestions to improve it. I can't express just how useful this is as a creative writing tool. I even learned a few things about the Titanic I didn't know just by asking for obscure information on it. If you're on the edge, I would definitely give it a try. (The voice you hear on the YouTube commercials is called Orbit, but there are several others to choose from -- male and female

Garbage. How can you replace the best digital assistant with this nonsense. It can't send texts, gets confused often, just gives up if it doesn't get it right the first time. I say "Text Claudia and Spencer," it hears it 100% correct but asks me which Spencer I want to text instead of choosing the contact that shares the precise name. GA could do this easily. This is an alpha test at best, not a finished product. I just switched back to GA.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Stephen. Generative AI and all of its possibilities are exciting, but it‚Äôs still new. Gemini will make mistakes. Even though it‚Äôs getting better every day, Gemini can provide inaccurate information. Please share your feedback by marking good and bad responses to help!

scraped_reviews.content: I'm surprised that the 4x1 or 5x1 sizes of the Gemini widget doesn't have a search bar like the regular Google Search widget does, and honestly, I think it'd be even better if the Google Search app itself had an option to opt-in to use Gemini instead of the standard search or just blend the two completely. Using the 4x2 or 5x2 sizing isn't feasible, especially for anyone with a smaller phone.

I really can't wait for this app to be genuinely free and release its full potential,replacing the current Google Assistant. Today was my first try with it and after quite a bit of tinkering, I loved it for conversation but was forced to revert back to the default for actual necessary voice control device functions. Overall I'm not really surprised, only slightly disappointed. I will uninstall for now and wait longer to transition fully.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your feedback, Emmie. We're always working to improve the Gemini experience and this type of feedback really helps. If this happens again, please Open the Gemini App > tap top right profile picture or initial > Feedback > Send feedback. Please add #GeminiAndroid to your report. Thanks again for helping us improve!

scraped_reviews.content: Unreliable, can't handle simple tasks when used as assistant. Switched back to the old assistant because it actually works; this one consistently stops working and requires restarting the phone to work. And this is on a pixel phone. Maybe in a few months to a year, it will be good enough to be worth using.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Keko. Thanks for your feedback. We're always working to improve the Gemini experience and this type of feedback really helps. If this happens again, please Open the Gemini App > tap top right profile picture or initial > Feedback > Send feedback. Please add #GeminiAndroid to your report. Thanks again for helping us improve!

scraped_reviews.content: This rolled out with a UI update and completely replaced Assistant on my phone, and it has been nothing but a nuisance to use. None of my routines were ported from Assistant, it gives inconsistent feedback, and has generally just been more of a hassle to use. I've uninstalled it and swapped back to Assistant and THAT has been broken since the update too.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, thanks for flagging. Our team is aware of this issue and is working on a fix. Appreciate your patience.

scraped_reviews.content: The whole "you need to unlock your phone for me to do *insert task here*" nonsense makes it pretty pointless, especially when im driving: The whole great thing about Assistant is I could use it without unlocking and getting distracted/use hand free while driving. I've toggled every option for lock screen possible and it still tells me I need to unlock. I hope this is fixed soon.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Sabrina. Some actions aren't currently available while your screen is locked. This may change in the future as Gemini Apps features evolve. For now, please unlock your screen and try again. Thanks.

scraped_reviews.content: I didn't want this and it drains my battery like crazy. The newest android update is terrible. It feels like they just didn't care about all the random changes they were making to the UI and they only focussed on adding as much AI bloat as they could. Probably going to finally make the switch to an iPhone after this.

title: Planet Fitness
description:
Welcome to the Planet Fitness App: The Gym in Your Pocket!
Did you know the PF App has tons of free features everyone? It‚Äôs not just Planet Fitness members that can enjoy what the PF App has to offer! We believe fitness should be accessible for all, which is why non-members have access to a huge library of on-demand digital workouts, helpful exercise tutorials for extra guidance, and activity tracking to celebrate wins. You can even sign up for your membership in the PF App without visiting your local club.

Plus, we have exclusive features for all of our amazing Planet Fitness members like discounts on top brands you love, up to 3 free months through the PF Refer-a-Friend Program**, a Crowd Meter to pick the best time to visit, easy digital check-ins and more! 
 
DIGITAL WORKOUTS: FREE FITNESS ON-DEMAND
‚Äì Motivation: Start & stick with fitness no matter where you are on your unique journey with free workouts led by motivating trainers
‚Äì Guidance: Enjoy the benefits of Judgement Free fitness & education for all, with or without a membership
‚Äì Convenience: Get moving anytime, anywhere! On-demand workouts are designed to be completed at home or in the gym.
‚Äì Variety: Browse workouts by type, time, target, and more to find what‚Äôs best for you, whether you‚Äôre looking for a workout for beginners or want to try something new!
 
EQUIPMENT & EXERCISE TUTORIALS: GUIDANCE WHEN YOU NEED IT
‚Äì Easy-to-follow equipment tutorials & exercise movements to perfect your form and not be intimidated by equipment at home or in the gym
 
FITNESS TRACKING: CELEBRATE YOUR WINS
‚Äì Record how much you‚Äôre moving with the free Activity Tracker with a variety of in & out of gym activities, available for members AND non-members
‚Äì Fill out the ‚ÄúAbout Me‚Äù section to customize your fitness profile and receive personalized workout video recommendations, no membership required
‚Äì Members can track check-ins in the ‚ÄúMy Journey‚Äù tab. We‚Äôll celebrate small wins together‚Äìjust keep showing up!
DISCOUNTS FOR MEMBERS: SAVE ON TOP BRANDS YOU LOVE
‚Äì Make your fitness journey more rewarding when you save big with deals & discounts on your favorite brands across apparel, food & drink, travel, and more!***

MEMBER SAVINGS: FITNESS WITH FRIENDS
‚Äì Planet Fitness members earn free months through our Refer-a-Friend program
‚Äì Every friend that joins earns you 1 free month of membership** and your friends can join for only $1 down. Now that‚Äôs a win-win!

CROWD METER: A WORKOUT THAT WORKS FOR YOU
‚Äì Planning to squeeze in a workout? Pick the best time of day to visit the gym with our Crowd Meter! 

CLUB CHECK-INS: SEAMLESS, TOUCHLESS ENTRY 
‚Äì Check-in quickly & easily at your Planet Fitness home club with your digital Club Pass

PF BLACK CARD¬Æ MEMBERSHIP: ALL. THE. PERKS.
‚Äì Upgrade to our most popular membership right in the PF App for even more member benefits
‚Äì Enjoy PF Black Card¬Æ perks including use of any Planet Fitness worldwide, bringing a guest every time you work out, access to premium PF+ workouts & discounts, use of the Black Card Spa¬Æ where you can relax in massage chairs & HydroMassage‚Ñ¢‚Äîand much more!****
  
Download the FREE Planet Fitness App today ‚Äì You got this!
 
**Up to a maximum of three (3) total months of membership per calendar year. Visit https://www.planetfitness.com/referrals-terms-conditions for more information.
***Restrictions and exclusions may apply. Valid at participating locations only. Offers valid on select products only, see specific offer for details. 
****Services and perks subject to availability and restrictions. State and local restrictions on tanning frequency with PF Black Card¬Æ memberships apply. Participating locations only. See club for details.

summary: Workouts for everyone

scraped_reviews.content: I would rate 0 if I could. Please for the love of God fix the billing portion of the app. I put in all the correct information, the app accepts, and then scams me every month by saying there's an error the day the monthly fee is due. Either stop charging the original fee and tell me that I owe close to $50 per month, or fix the app so that I can pay whenever I choose instead of waiting on a faulty auto pay method that messes with my credit score.

Update: 10/5/25 Having same issues as others. Planet Fitness billing will not process my subscription, then bill me an additional $20 for late payment. First time it happened I paid the late fee. It happened for the second time, and I decided to block PF charges and uninstalled the app. As far as i'm concerned its a money grab tactic that backfired. They would have made far more money from me as a member. Good luck collecting any future payments from me.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sad to hear that you're having trouble with the PF App. Contact our support team for assistance here: https://planetfitness.app.link/support

scraped_reviews.content: I'm new to PF and enjoy my black card benefits, although I'm still figuring them out on the app. The crowd meter is a cool concept but doesn't seem very accurate. 2 bars is the norm at my home gym location, but that can mean busy (60+) or 20 people. Maybe there could be a numerical system instead that's live and updated every 5 minutes based on scans. After all, it is all digital.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for sharing your feedback with us! We're constantly working on ways to improve the PF App experience, so we'll be sure to pass this along for you.

scraped_reviews.content: I couldn't make it to the gym in person today. so I took advantage of the PF App exercises and it was great. I don't feel like I missed out. I love this alternative. When it don't seem like there's enough hours in the day to go in to the gym the variety of exercises on the app still allows a good focused workout in just the right amount of time. üí™üèΩü§ó
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are happy to hear that you are loving the PF App. Thanks for the review!

scraped_reviews.content: the clubs are fine. The workouts in the app are fine. Don't try to update anything, though, like ever. I've updated my address several times online and in the clubs, but the app still reflects only the very first one I had. I'm not a fan of PF in general because of this, and the automatic billing being spotty with no notification(including in the app) honestly, but they're the only gym with decent hours in my area. If any other gym picks up their slack, I'll be out like a light.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for sharing your experience! We'd like to investigate this further. Contact our support team here https://planetfitness.app.link/support so we can help troubleshoot and improve your experience!

scraped_reviews.content: Great for checking in and seeing the estimated traffic at the gym. Working through some of the programs is like a bad scavenger hunt, especially when the workout wants you to use equipment not at the gym. The at-home, no-equipment videos are pretty awesome. I wish there was a way to customize the workouts to take out certain exercises or to keep track of weight progress.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for sharing your feedback with us! We're constantly working on ways to improve the PF App experience, so we'll be sure to pass this along for you.

scraped_reviews.content: I have to keep reinstalling it on my (rather new Android) phone to get it to open. Plus, no way to search for a keyword like "standing" in app workouts. Finally, a workout that was there yesterday isn't listed today. Found it in my history but can't re-access it there. Oh, and it's kind of strange I am limited to my phone screen as opposed to being able to view workouts on my computer via my paid account.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sad to hear that you're having trouble with the PF App. Contact our support team for assistance here: https://planetfitness.app.link/support

scraped_reviews.content: Severe problems with payments. PF cannot handle payment by bank as the primary payment source. Every single month it manages to screw up the name on my bank account so name does not go through and I have to reset the bank account. I have credit card as backup, but the app won't go to the CC automatically, and I have to enter the entire number each month which is a real pain. It won't do GPay either. I got charged a late fee which is unfair.

I tried to join the planet fitness gym near me and they insisted I use the ap. However, I have now tried at least a dozen times over the last 48 hours and cannot get past the log in page. I keep getting errors, being asked to verify my account, being blocked from my account then unblocking it - rinse and repeat. I really wanted to join PF because it is closest to my home and the most affordable near me, but because of this unfortunate sign in process I will be looking elsewhere.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sad to hear that you're having trouble with the PF App. Contact our support team for assistance here: https://planetfitness.app.link/support

scraped_reviews.content: This app has a few problems. For one, the crowd meter on the dashboard isn't always the same as when you click into club details. I never really know which one is accurate. Also, the crowd meter doesn't do a great job of indicating how full the gym actually is. When it shows only 2 bars (which looks like it would mean the gym is relatively empty), the free weights are already pretty saturated. They need to calibrate it badly.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for sharing your feedback with us! We're constantly working on ways to improve the PF App experience, so we'll be sure to pass this along for you.

scraped_reviews.content: For me the main draw of this app are all the guided workouts that you can do while in the gym. Unfortunately, the app lacks a lot of functionality that would make it much more useful, like a search function. I'd also like to be able to follow a progressive series. If I've completed one in the series, the next one should come up automatically. Also I want to see if I've done a video already, or be able to save/track workouts to rewatch again. Very cheap development.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're constantly working on ways to improve the PF App experience, so we'll be sure to pass this along for you.

scraped_reviews.content: This is not a good app. The prior app was better. I could enter time worked out, distance, etc. Now a I can do is choose an activity (such as walking) with a time and speed that is available only in .5 mph increments. If I'm walking at 3.2...is that 3 or 3.5? ANSWER: NEITHER. Really, if inaccuracy isn't bad enough, I can no longer see my workout history to track my progress. Truly, the app no longer meets my needs.

Going with a 2 because it seems that the developers have no idea what users might want in a fitness app. We can check in and schedule classes, that's nice. But what's with the activity tracker that doesn't even include all of the machines at your gym? I'd like to be able to track my entire workout; both cardio and strength, in the same app, and it would be nice if the one that tracks my gym usage also included that option.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for sharing your feedback with us! We're constantly working on ways to improve the PF App experience, so we'll be sure to pass this along for you.

scraped_reviews.content: Just signed up today and I'll be starting my gym experience tomorrow. The app has a lot of great information for how certain exercises are done, but for some reason, the app force closes when switching exercises during your workout video tutorials. It'll count down to zero for the first one, but then I see my home screen... Please fix. Would rate 5 stars if fixed.

Can't get past the first login screen. "An error occurred looking up your email." Hadn't used it in a while. Updated to latest version. Cleared cache and data. Uninstalled and reinstalled. I'm not going to install an old version. This is ridiculous. P.S. "An unexpected error occurred. Please try again" That's what happens when I try to report it to the app technical support. Those are the only two things I can try doing in this app, and neither work.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello, George! Please try the following steps to get the PF App running!

1. Ensure you are connected to Wi-Fi
2. Please Update the PF App to the new version 9.3.13. to from the Google Play Store.
3. Update the PF App via your device
4. Open the app, and sign in.

Please let us know if this helps!

scraped_reviews.content: Im pretty frustrated because I can't book a training session. It continues to give me an "Ooops, we are uanble to book a session..." Message. Ive submitted 3 requests for support and Im told its fixed by some auto response email. The last time I did actually get some specific instructions to clear my cookies and try it and then uninstall and reinstall the app. Still not working. Im stumped.

Update fixed the slow loading, but I hate the new workout tracking. The old graph for workout time & seeing day/week/month total was very motivating. No way to view progress anymore. Workout aren't calculated by total in a day anymore. If I workout with stretching, strength training & cardio, app adds as three short workouts, & workout average reflects that. Can't overstate the difference. Other features seem fine; I don't use them. This is for the most recent update, so confused by response.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much for the feedback, Shay! Please update to the latest version of the PF App.

scraped_reviews.content: The app is fine and easy to use for check ins. I would like to see more versatility in the journey tracking however. Machine workouts account for half of the available usage, but there's nowhere within the app that lists these machines for tracking. Adding these in would be great in the future. As for member perks, they're also just alright. I wouldn't complain if they had a bit more of a selection relative to fitness in general. +2 more stars if the app sees some of this updated though.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for sharing your feedback with us! We're constantly working on ways to improve the PF App experience, so we'll be sure to pass this along for you.

scraped_reviews.content: App is stuck in a loop. Says I need to update it and links to the play store but it's the newest version. My android OS meets the minimum requirements so I'm not sure what's going on with it. Need this app to work to fully use my gym membership. Update: tech support reached out and indicated it was fixed but still now working. Hoping they can fix it soon.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please update your device to OS v. 8.0 to get the PF App running, Crusher!

scraped_reviews.content: The new version of the Crowd Meter is completely useless. A gym location ("club") can be almost completely full with people, with no cardio equipment or weight equipment left to use, and the app will say that it's only 2 bars full (out of 10). How am I supposed to plan my visit accurately when the information is not accurate? The previous Crowd Meter was very accurate in representing how full the gym was.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for sharing your feedback with us! We're constantly working on ways to improve the PF App experience, so we'll be sure to pass this along for you.

scraped_reviews.content: App worked fine until 7/3/22. Has done nothing but crash since. Wi-Fi is fine, other apps load even when my Wi-Fi signal isn't great. Have uninstalled and reinstalled twice. Asked for help via customer service email, told the same thing everyone on here was, "click the Support button on the app". The app that refuses to load! I signed up too recently to get a physical card, if I want to go in I have to ask an employee to check me in every time. You know they don't like being asked to do things.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are aware of the update concerns plaguing the PF App, Sheila. We're working around the clock to get our app running smoothly for you and all our members. We thank you for your patience as we work to bring you the best version of our App!

scraped_reviews.content: The app is good for checking in. After that....meh. My biggest dislike is the apparent inability to set favorite clubs. It only shows your home club, the one you signed up at. Every time you want to go to a different club you have to do "locate a club." Why? For ppl who travel a lot or who split time between two states that's a PITA. I'm in another state from my home club for 3 months at a time. But I can't set another other club as a favorite so I can easily access it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for sharing your feedback with us! We're constantly working on ways to improve the PF App experience, so we'll be sure to pass this along for you.

scraped_reviews.content: New app sucks! i cant pull out my member info, so I now have to bring a physical card. A key feature taken away is a major turn off. I wont be using this app anymore. The Homepage is the only section of the app that is frozen, so I cant get access to the digital key tag. All other sections: workouts, exercises, sessions, and activity work. Horrible!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Ken. That doesn't seem right! The digital key tag can be accessed through the homepage of the app for easier check-in. If you're having any trouble locating this, please inform your club's front desk staff so they can walk you through the new layout.

scraped_reviews.content: Absolute Junk! ALOT of features have been removed for this so called Update. Planet of Triumphs, for those that enjoy seeing other's success stories, has been removed...Snap a Workout is gone. Now you HAVE TO manually enter your workout data, and now it incorrectly calculates calories burned when compared to a piece of equipment's readings...And all the previous workout data is pretty much gone or messed up. The ONLY useful thing is the Barcode to check in to the Gym. 0 stars. Terrible!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Sean. Since this is a fresh update, we are still fixing certain bugs as well as adding new features too. Stay tuned for a fresh update in the near future. Thanks for staying connected with us and have a great day.

scraped_reviews.content: I had a problem with the ap. It would freeze up with a typical annoying ad. All you could do was shut off the app. It made checking in a pain and time consuming. The company actually responded when I posted a poor review. That being said, I uninstalled & reinstalled the app and it seems fine for the moment. The fact that planet fitness took the time to respond, in and of itself, is a good thing.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for supporting the PF App! Stay tuned for more updates and improvements.

scraped_reviews.content: I agree with most of the recent comments on the new update. I was forced to change my password even though I'm certain it was correct. I use this app mainly because of the instructional videos for the machines which I can't find anymore. and have been replaced with workout that barely involve the machines. Not happy with the update at all!

App isn't working. I've uninstalled and reinstalled at the companies suggestion when I made them aware that it continues to say "something went wrong." I have all my info correct, even tried to reset password and it still gives same error notice with their reset password. Agent said to contact my local club. They obviously don't have answers for technical support, either.

The ONLY thing I use this app for is to check in at my club. I would rather use a bar code attached to my key chain but that is not an option. So, when I have my gym bag in one hand and am trying to find the "check in" button with the other, the LAST thing I need is for a marketing pitch to cover the screen right after I boot the app. STOP IT!!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback, TJ!

scraped_reviews.content: Why do app developers always take away the most useful tools in old apps. Planet fitness chose to remove the feature where you could take a picture of the machine you are on (treadmill, elliptical, etc.) to record your data. In addition, they removed the most useful features that I use, which are the ability to enter all your own data for workouts and the ability to see past months and years of workouts. I can't even find this. Don't even try asking the workers at PF for help.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: The X-capture photo-based feature has been taken down, but we are committed to bringing you a connected mobile app experience so stay tuned for app updates in the future that include this feature. Also, you can still track your workouts, and if you'd like your previous information transferred please submit a trouble ticket via the support link.

scraped_reviews.content: I've been a black card member for two years and mostly did account management on the website, but wanted to try the app out to be able to access my information while on the go. Tried to use this app for over 3 months now and it keeps telling me my log in doesnt exist, my password is wrong, or just doesn't load to begin with. I read about a potential fix of uninstalling and reinstalling the app, as well as doing that again and waiting a couple days, and it's all been for nothing. Next to useless

The gym is great but whatever August update they did kicked me out and now I can't use the app. This isn't just me, it's literally millions of people. Once the app opens, nothing is clickable except the bottom list to show you nore things that you can't interact with. I have uninstalled completely and reinstalled then logged in 3 times now. You guys gotta fix this.

It's great that we could keep track of activity, but It would also be awesome if we could keep track of weight without changing the starting weight and a section where we could keep track of body measurements as well. That way we could see changes over time in the same app. I currently use 3 different apps, I wish it was all in this one. A section to keep track of what you eat? A reminder to drink water?I also don't like the update. I miss the glowing circle thing everytime you add an activity.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much for the feedback, Cat!

scraped_reviews.content: I installed this, then immediately uninstalled. Never even used it. So my low rating may be out of place. But when I realized I can't use this with my watch, then I figured it was pointless. Especially since I never bring my phone to the gym. Make a watch app or add the ability to connect to a watch and then I'll reinstall. Other features I will be looking for: Advice on how to use machines. Techniques to try at the gym based on my previous workouts. Reminders to hit the gym if I haven't gone in a while. People looking for gym buddies. connect to tv sounds via bluetooth. workout music suggestions from members sharing workout goals and accomplishments (inspiring stories)

I'm unhappy with the new updates. I liked the previous way we were able to track our fitness, and it showed the weekly hours. Now, you can't see the hours you did during the week. For someone trying to reach the required hours to maintain a healthy heart, the previous version was better! Now, it only shows activity and calories burned. Other than that, I love the at home exercises available and other features of the app. Please bring the hours exercised back! Now it's not tracking my workouts
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for the feedback, Laura!

scraped_reviews.content: Beware using app to update payment info. They do not allow you to view numbers, only enter twice. But, they do not provide enough room for all digits in long account numbers, causing payment issues, and then late fees. They need to make 3 changes. One is to lengthen characters allowed. 2 is to allow you to view the entry. 3 allow club changes through the app. It is really only useful to look up club hours and to check in.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Steven! If you'd like to change your payment information, please use your MyiClubOnline account. Thank you for stopping by our page!

scraped_reviews.content: While I have not had issue accessing the app, I feel it lacks utility. The workout section should have greater flexibility in tracking your routine. My cardio routine generally consists of using the treadmill. Plugging the information into the app does not always provide the same info as the treadmill. With Bluetooth capabilities, perhaps the info could be transmitted to the app on your phone. Additionally, not all equipment is listed in the app, i.e.. strength training equipment.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much for the feedback, as we're always looking for ways to improve the PF App!

scraped_reviews.content: Can't even open the app. Why did you do away with the key cards? They were so much easier and more convenient. Please bring them back! I already made sure I was connected to WiFi. There is no update waiting when I go into the app store or my settings. All I tried to do was download the app, and it immediately said to "update" it. Which feels like it should be unnecessary if I'm downloading the app directly from the store. Fix this please, and bring back the key cards!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: You're more than welcome to check-in via your phone number, driver's license, or government issued state I.D., Morgan!

scraped_reviews.content: This could be so much better with 2 tweaks. First, make it able to read the QR codes on each machine and add it automatically to each day's activity. Presently we can only record very generic and limited data. Second, include the weight training machines in the list of activities. As an example, I just did pectoral and deltoid flys. Very specific exercises. But I can only record them in my daily activities as very generic "weightlifting." It's not a a good way to track progress.

Useless. Cannot login, ever, no matter what. This includes definitely-right accounts, resetting passwords, or creating a new account. The app just instantly but silently fails every single time. This has been my experience for well over a year now. The attendants at the gym gave up too after trying to help me. Since they don't print cards anymore, I have to manually checkin with my phone number every time if I want to use my membership. Considering finding a new gym because of this.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Benjamin. Please update to the latest version on the PF App!

scraped_reviews.content: Unlike other users, I can still use my barcode to scan in, but literally NOTHING ELSE works. Everything I click on -- Workouts, Exercises, Sessions, Activity -- says "Oops! Something went wrong." I try to 'Set up my profile', and click on an option for 'What's your personal goal?" (step 1 of 5) and...nothing happens; there's no way to get to step 2. Soooo...aside from being able to pull up the barcode, this app has now, literally, become useless. Phone = OnePlus 6 w/ Android 9 (Pie)
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Matthew! Thank you for letting us know about this issue. Can you update us with more information about what type of device you're using? Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: I liked the previous app much more. they need to bring back the feature where you can take a picture of the screen on your treadmill, elliptical, bike. etc. it was the best! it logged when my workouts were, the calories I burned, the miles I went, etc.. the new app sucks. it doesn't log any of that and you have to do it manually which I dont have time for at every machine i use. it only logs how long your exercise was, which tells you nothing about your workout! lame!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Sarah! We're working on providing you with an even better Planet experience with our app, so hold tight for new changes in the future. We appreciate your patience while we take the time to create the best experience possible for you. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: Poor interface. I've had a black membership for 6 months. Traveled without my scan tag so I thought I would download the app to use my account. I had set everything up when I got my membership. However, the only way to load in your membership is by the barcode, which makes zero sense, as I have all my account information in my email. I'm sure the app works fine, but not when you're in a pinch. Club location couldn't help me either, with all that info.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Jason! We appreciate your feedback and are sorry to hear about the frustrations you had with the app. Linking your membership through ways other than the barcode is something we will consider in future updates! Thanks again for your feedback.

scraped_reviews.content: $84+ to cancel my membership, even though I paid the annual fee, and cancelled on the correct date; customer support/local club won't answer! At my club, they won't check your QR in, they just tell anyone to "go ahead." Why pay monthly if they let anyone in. This happens at other gyms too from what I gather. The APP is very wonky, no real navigation and always useless notifications even when turned off; it's just as bad as my experience at the clubs themselves. Out of order sign up for both!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! The PF App is designed to be your partner in our club or at home. From tracking your activities to scheduling a workout, we're right here for you! For cancellation questions, please contact your home club directly through this link: https://www.planetfitness.com/gyms. They would love your feedback!

scraped_reviews.content: I agree with every other user, the update ruined what was already a great app. You can no longer track your miles or calories, and it isn't as user friendly. You can't "snap your workout" (take a pic of workout summary), instead you manually put your info in but again, not calories or distance. Plus I lost a lot of my August workouts that were recorded. And yes I have submitted a trouble ticket to support. Planet Fitness should have kept the app the way it was. The new update has made it garbage!

This app is terrible. So last year I had lost 20 pounds because the trainer at the gym set me up with a plan. There was a file folder at the gym with everyone's workout plans. Gym closed because of covid. I go back when it reopened and was ready to resume. Nope, they threw out the whole box because of covid. As a beginner I needed that information. So all my information on weight loss, the machines I used, settings for those machines was lost. I yelled at them when I see the staff has a file folder at their station "You better throw that out because of covid." Fast forward, and I go back to the gym. I get the app hoping that will help. All it is good for is letting you in the door. I asked the manager if it had a way to record all the info previously; machined used, seat settings, weight settings, progress......Nope. So I said "You're telling me I have to go through, try to remember what I used for machines, weights, and settings until you guys eventually get a trainer back?" Um, yeah. So check out the response. They say they are looking to improve the app to have a more in-depth tracker. Eight months ago it didn't have it. It still doesn't have it, and these clowns say "near future?" It's paper, pen, and my Body Minder workbook for me. Tech is supposed to make life easier, not harder.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Bill! Thank you for reaching out. If you have questions or concerns related to a recent visit or experience, please contact your home club directly through this link: https://www.planetfitness.com/about-planet-fitness/contact-us. As for your app concern, we hope to add a more in-depth activity tracker in the near future. Stay tuned!

scraped_reviews.content: App does not work!!!! The digital keytag does not work... initially I was able to input my keytag manually. But when I got home, the keytag was no longer there and the app instructed me to visit in person to receive my keytag. There's a bug in the app. When I reached out to IT support, they claimed to have fixed it but in reality, the issue is still there!!!! INCREDIBLY FRUSTRATING. Not impressed with PF at all. I just got a membership two days ago, and planning to cancel bc of this.

Maybe I can get an answer here... I can't log onto the app.I even tried doing a password reset, and a website I said that I reset it successfully, and I got a email confirmation. But I still can't even log in. I just get a bad username or password error. secondly, I also agree with other users that it should be a way to connect the machine being used to the app for tracking purposes. Otherwise, I'd rather just use Excel than the app. Thirdly, check Google policy on notification icon color.

This app is useless. Nothing about the app makes it easier to check in or invite a friend, it's actually more difficult now. You can not properly track your workout because it only lists a few exercises and not most of the machines at the gym. Mostly it just takes up space on my phone but I cannot delete it because they refuse to let me check in with my members card I originally received when I signed up for planet fitness. There is nothing the app does that you couldn't already do with the web
scraped_reviews.replyContent: With over 36 options within the "Activity Tracker", there's an exercise option for every one. Please click "Other Activities" to log them as well! Thank you so much for your feedback!

scraped_reviews.content: Wow! They deleted my first 1 star review because they can't accept the facts. You do everything in this app, you can make an account with it, you have to use the app to get access to the gym etc etc but when you're wanting to cancel your membership you have to go there in person??? So I called them and And mentioned that what if I was in a hospital bed and the guy told me he got wrote up one time for canceling someone's membership that was in a hospital. This company doesn't care about people.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hey there, friend! If you have questions about the PF App, were always here to help! Please speak directly to your home club manager for any gym related concerns!

https://www.planetfitness.com/about-planet-fitness/contact-us

scraped_reviews.content: The app seems pretty straightforward and has a lot of good content on it. I don't particularly use any of it but I looked at it and it seems okay. My main gripe is that you're basically forced to have the app to check in. It has a crowd meter that supposedly tells you how busy your selected gym is but it seems pretty inaccurate to me. I just left the gym and it was packed and the "crowd meter" said it was only 3/10 where I would assume it was more around 6/10 at least.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: You're more than welcome to check in via your phone number, driver's license, or however your home club allows!

title: Pok√©mon Sleep
description:
Collect Pok√©mon Through Sleeping!
 
In the world of Pok√©mon Sleep, Pok√©mon with the same sleep type as you will gather around as you catch some Zs, so discover all the various different sleep styles that Pok√©mon can have as you aim to complete your Sleep Style Dex!
 
What A Day Looks Like in Pok√©mon Sleep
 
‚ñ† When Night Falls...
It‚Äôs time to track your sleep! All you need to do is place your smart device by your pillow (don‚Äôt place your device under your pillow or blankets as it may overheat), then call it a night. You can also play using sleep data tracked via your smartwatch.
 
‚ñ† A New Day Dawns
By the time you wake, Pok√©mon will have gathered in Pok√©mon Sleep based on your sleep type and how long you slept for. Carry out research on these Pok√©mon‚Äôs sleep styles to complete your Sleep Style Dex!
 
‚ñ† And the Rest of the Day...
Raise Snorlax big and strong! Snorlax will grow larger by receiving Berries from the Pok√©mon you befriend. The more you raise Snorlax, the greater your odds will be of encountering Pok√©mon with rare sleep styles!
 
Rest Your Very Best!

‚ñ† Check Your Sleep Report
What kind of sleep did you get last night? Your sleep report contains tidbits like how long you took to fall asleep, how long you spent in different sleep stages, and whether you snored or talked in your sleep.
 
‚ñ† Get Support to try to Sleep Your Best
You can have Pok√©mon at your side even when you sleep! With features like Pok√©mon-inspired music to relax you into sleep, plus smart alarms that wake you when you‚Äôre in a shallow stage of sleep, Pok√©mon Sleep may help you to rest your very best.

‚ñ† Smartwatch Pairing
By linking with Health Connect, you can use sleep data tracked through certain smartwatches to play Pok√©mon Sleep.
Compatible devices can be checked here.
https://www.pokemonsleep.net/en/devices/

It‚Äôs time to track your sleep! All you need to do is place your smart device by your pillow (don‚Äôt place your device under your pillow or blankets as it may overheat), then call it a night. You can also play using sleep data tracked via your smartwatch.

‚ñ† And the Rest of the Day...
