summary: Track your sleep with a smart device to discover adorable Pok√©mon sleep styles!

scraped_reviews.content: Been playing since Day 1, so I have seen how the QoL shifts and changes. This game has become a part of my morning and bedtime routine. The art and animation of Pok√©mon Sleep are very, very charming and showcase well the Pok√©mons' personalities. There are seasonal and recurring events, which I do enjoy. The main reason for not giving this game its final star is due to how grindy the game can feel, along with how long it takes just to get through the analytics screen in the morning.

I've been "playing" this for a year, but I haven't had the motivation to open it lately. To be honest it lacks content. It's fun for a while, but eventually just becomes repetitive and feels more like a daily chore than a game. They need to add more things to add excitement/fun to the game, and preferably not block those things with a paywall Edit: Quit for several months and came back. Nothing changed. Still lacks content, still paywalls in order to enjoy most things, still just a chore.

Gameplay was smoother when I first started using it. The game requires you to collect resources, which used to be a seamless experience, but it no longer is, and has not been for a very long time. It takes longer to complete as you have to do it multiple times to be sure to collect everything, and this is particularly important if you are changing teams as you lose all uncollected resources on those changed out as well as all skills that should have but didn't trigger.

New review: I'm not playing this game again until they reduce how many times you have to click on things. After doing it every day for over a year, it's tiring. I still wish you could skip past the research completely and be able to look at it later IF you want. Like other sleep data. Instead of the devs forcing you to do it later in the day. I don't want to have to do it at all. I just want to catch Pokemon and feed Snorlax.

This takes a very long time to get through all of the loading screens. I've been using this app for a while I don't need to read the same thing EVERY day. It can take upward of 30 mins to do just the wake up items. The idea is to log in three times a day to feed Snorlax and collect berries and ingredients but it takes too long. Also, I have contacted support to make them aware of issues surrounding the reward points in the morning (if you use "extras" it's way worse) but was told "we can't help"

I love this game but needs a lot of work, while on sleep mode when I go out of tab the game resets and the only thing it saves back to is the sleep results when I wasn't ready to end the sleep session, it should always load back to sleep mode, especially when you're going back to sleep and not ready for the research yet. also, there needs to be more music options, a good soundtrack would be using the ones in-game or from Pokemon Dungeons.

I've only had this game a few days, and it is really good. but when im trying to go to bed and track my sleep, it drags me into a tutorial that I can't escape without finishing, which leaves me to not using my app because im too tired to read for the next hour. again, the game is amazing, but I really wish I could have the option of not doing another tutorial when it's 3am and im trying to go to sleep.

thoroughly enjoy this as an extra incentive to proper sleeping habits. it won't force you to go to sleep but, if you're a Pok√©mon fan, and want to improve your sleeping habits via tracking, then this is a good tool and game to enjoy that path. I especially like the health tips which are expanded upon in their website, and the alarm clock. the alarm is a motion sensitive alarm that will only play when your body is active, which means you're less likely to be groggy when you wake up. Fun app.

thought I liked it the first night, but i didn't like how it didn't have white noise or anything so on night 2 I tried to play some from yt music. the app INTENTIONALLY crashed it every time I tried to play it while in the app. some apps just pause the music, whatever, but no it like forced stopped the app, and i dont know how. deleted it immediately, thats virus behavior. fix your app.

At its core, I can't complain; it's a gameified sleep tracker and using it has improved my sleep habits, so mission accomplished. The game part feels just a little bit stingy with the upgrade items, and the loading feels a little much sometimes, especially going between different menu pages. Wish the "relaxing sounds" included at least one option that was just ambient noise, the music is distracting.

It's fine to use if you don't have FOMO, which is played upon by not telling if you caught a Pok√© or it's gender. It takes a while to earn enough points to buy items, which can lead to being unable to catch Pok√© you find. The prices for items is way to high. If you want to buy gems, the # you get for what they charge is awful considering the cost of items in game. While it's not the main function of this app, there are many gameified aspects that lend itself to wanting to advance in the "game".

It's a decent game, but I get frustrated having to spend 5 minutes of my morning clicking through things just to finish looking at results and such- or worse, skipping it in the morning and then having to do it right before bed. There's so many steps and it gets monotonous after a bit. I've still got it installed but haven't played in a week or two and feel better NOT having to worry about it in the morning, honestly. Also, not being able to play without wifi ruined a streak a while ago. Boo.

the game itself is cute and fun and helps me go to bed at a reasonable hour because it gives me a high score if I sleep so many hours. However, the sleep research and morning tasks like feeding or collecting on events in the morning takes way too long. Today, it took me 45 minutes to get through. The loading screens and having to scroll around to find where the pokemon are to collect their berries, the cooking screen, watching the pokemon eat takes too long. Maybe there could be skip option

I love this app! It works well and is really fun. The sleep tracking doesn't work sometimes but it's not too big of an issue. However, I hate when I'll stop my sleep tracking and there'll be an update that I wasn't aware of. Then once I update the app, it'll say that my sleep data couldn't be found because "the app was closed", even when it wasn't. Edit: The next update should make this offline-capable; so many problems would be solved.

I really love this game and I can't wait for updates to come. The only problem keeping this from 5 stars is that it will sometimes say that I wasn't sleeping and track only half a night because it can't hear things ig? I'm not sure if this is a me problem where my mic doesn't work properly or a them problem. I think it's a bug tho because recordings still work and other nights it works fine. I think that the ability to connect to a watch that tracks sleep better than a phone would be good.

I'm super frustrated. Like most Pok√©mon games, this totally drains your battery. Which would be fine if they weren't so weird about letting you change your sleep time. If your phone dies in the middle of the night, you really can't do much about your sleep data. You can add a second sleep time but it doesn't change your sleep stats. Sometimes I'm exhausted and forget to plug in my phone. I'm not trying to game the system or get special rewards. It'd be worth buying premium for..

If you're looking for a cool Pokemon sleep tracking app, this is NOT the one for you. Ideally, you would just open this app, press a button, and go to sleep. But this game requires you to spend 5 - 7 minutes before it lets you start tracking. Basically forcing you to play a game before you can sleep. And that's after completing a 30 minute mandatory tutorial. This app tries too hard to be something it's not. Not everything Pokemon related has to have a capture and feed mechanic.

While it's easy to use, and works as a great alarm clock, the game unfortunately struggles with a lot of performance issues. I'm constantly battling my game freezing between sleep reports and menu changes, and sometimes I don't get through the main screen. It makes me sad, because I like playing the game a lot, and I have a lot of pokemon collected and even several shiny pokemon.

Game is pretty good! I use it almost every night and it helps me keep a consistent bed time. Recently, it's been annoying with how it tracks my sleep, though. Sometimes, the app will track the sleep, but say that the data was untracked and give you an awful score in the morning, which totally ruins the day.

it's a great game to play and helps me get to sleep but it has NEVER tracked my sleep data. I have done everything it tells me to buy it still doesn't work üò≠ sound of the aspect of the game. but yah. (it still tracks how long I sleep just with a made up sleep data and no graphs.) edit: after a update a bit ago I have stopped using this game! It is super laggy and green grass ile (sry can't spell) doesn't even have GREEN GRASS!

The sleep system isn't perfect, (I almost always get the "unusually long sleep" and then lose 30-60 minutes of sleep time. However, it's a nice game that can take as much or as little time as you want and still enjoy the game. The developers are fantastic and almost always generous the times they have to give compensation.

This has to be one of the most unstable games I've played. It freezes at least once a night, and crashes while sleeping once to twice a week, wasting your progress. (it's crashed 3 times on me this week.) For a game that's all about collecting food and cooking it, the animations take WAY too long. It is miserable how long an animation takes to tell you you leveled up... Again. And again. Oh, you were doing something? Better stop what you're doing because you leveled up and can't skip it!

its a game-ified sleep tracker. ive had great results. its cute and simple. i cant speak to the quality of the actual sleep tracking, as i just use it to get myself to sleep earlier. one thing to note is that you should not rely on the in-app alarm; i had it screw me over after the app updated in the middle of the night, and the alarm didnt go off. other than that, no complaints.

Fun and well paced, as in you don't run out of content too quickly, but progression isn't so slow that it feels impossible. New content feels like it's being added at a reasonable pace. They've also added some quality of life improvements over the course of many updates, but there's room for more, like a tagging system so I can filter a list of what Pok√©mon I might use rare items on and things like that. Also, not fully locking out FTP users out of buying certain items‚Äîjust make them expensive!

It's good for what it is. the sleep aspect. I have no issues with it crashing. however, there is a new version almost every month it seems, updates like twice a week, and it takes forever to get threw every single step of the app. once you click out of sleep mode all of the extra steps takes to long for me in the morning. Same with on Mondays picking a new area. also I work over nights and I feel like the grading system is not good for people who work over night. I'm just there for the pokemon.

While it is great to keep track of my sleep, I have one complaint. You need to be connected to the Internet in order to keep track of sleep. The app can go to maintenance and you won't have access to your Pokemon, but you can store up to 8 sleep records. Yet if you go to a place with no Internet, the app refuses to open. Why not keep track of sleep like maintenance until I go to a safe place to connect.

I REALLY DO enjoy this app. The biggest issue is that it crashes about 4 to 5 nights per month, losing valuable sleep scores. The simple solution is to allow players to manually input sleep data and receive FULL rewards for such. It's already capped at 100 points per night, so I don't see how there's a problem with allowing that. Obviously, some people could abuse it, but I lose the joy of the game when this happens so often. EDIT: Hasn't crashed in 3 months, so it is much more enjoyable!

This app is cool and all, and frankly I do like it because I like to know my sleep habits. Unfortunately I have two major issues with it; later game it can be difficult to get new sleep styles to unlock the last couple of places, and the amount of updates is kind of ridiculous. It updates both in-game AND via the play store, and it does this at least twice a week. Eventually it'll be unusable for most phones because of the amount of space it will need.

The game is okay, the sleep recording is not super accurate but that's okay. By far the worst part is how often the game pulls control away from you. If I'm just trying to collect from my Pokemon it's so frustrating when each time I click one they activate a skill that I have to sit and watch, or Snorlax levels up a level and I have to sit and watch it. It's infuriating to have control taken away on every other click instead of just letting me go about collecting berries. Please stop.

it forces audio to stop while tracking sleep, which makes it annoying to use when you listen to audio from other apps to sleep. ive used other apps that are able to track sleep while using the mic that doesnt force other audio sources to pause, so this is something competitors are able to do that the pokemon sleep app can not. very disappointing that disabling it is not an option and makes this unusable for me.

excellent app motivating to use and also without saying anything sort of attempts to give you Gentle reminders to eat three meals a day period because you can open up the app and give your Pokemon meals at wide ranging meal times. the only thing that they could do better would be to update their algorithm to not include the sounds of other people in the room.

Freezes at least once a day requiring restarting the app which usually requires restarting whatever process you were in the middle of. The sleep device is far too easy to stop the sleep function during your sleep so you dont get credit for a lot of the sleep sometimes which is incredibly frustrating when that happens. Lots and lots of loading screens though. Otherwise enjoyable enough.

I LOVE pokemon sleep, but after the most recent maintenance, any sounds my phone makes while on the sleep screen, alarm sounds, media, notifications, are all distorted by static and disruptive. im so upset because there's an event going on and sleep is my most reliable alarm. if this problem is ever fixed, I'll happily change my review, but until then it's 1 star, and if it isn't fixed soon I'm going to have to stop using the app all together, the alarm tones have began to stress me out.

I really do love this game. It feels good being FTP, your never pressured to buy the pass, you get amazing events every Holliday and season. Atleast one for every moon cycle half complete. It has a great alarm I use every night to wake up since it has come out. My ONE issue with the game. When my Snorlax levels up, I'm FORCED to see what level he goes to. I wish it would just appear in the corner or like a banner on top just letting me know. It kills it for me.

it's a fun way to track sleep, but it a bit overstimulating before falling asleep if you're in certain parts.. it does crash and freeze a LOT which isn't ideal, but I think the most annoying thing is trying to get ingredients- even with ingredients heavy Pok√©mon it's so hard to get more than 12 each time which makes it very boring to try and progress throughout the week

On the whole I rather enjoy this game. I wish it would allow us more ingredient storage though. Especially as you upgrade your pot to allow more ingredients to be used per meal. Then on Sundays they increase the amount of ingredients you can normally put in, and you can end up running out of ingredients very quickly. Even more so if you use the good camp ticket which also increases the amount of ingredients you can put in the pot. Or if an event increases the pot size.

This app is actually pretty good with a few minor issues, mostly with how dodgy the sleep detection itself is at its worse. I have had instances of having a full night's sleep and the recording seems to pick and choose when to actually record the data, and that's not to mention how it is incapable of tracking sleep when the app isn't on the whole time, which has led to some very frustrating results like only recording a small fraction of the time. It's an alright game otherwise.

This is a great sleep tracker. I love Pok√©mon, love the franchise, but this game feels like a cash grab, wanting you to buy items left and right. They don't give you enough sleep points for doing jobs or missions, so I highly suggest just to get this as a sleep tracker. Nothing more. I've already deleted it because I can just get another sleep tracker. I wanted this because of the Pok√©mon, but the items and everything in the store made me delete it. I don't like the cash grab feeling.

The gameplay is fun, the Pokemon are cute, the sleep tracking is alright. The main source of inaccuracy is that it can't really tell if I wake up during the night, so interrupted sleep won't really be reflected in your records. it does crash occasionally(though this hasn't happened to me in a while), and it's kinda unforgiving about the tracking being interrupted, so I recommend making sure all your other apps are closed before sleep tracking. But overall, I love this game! And it‚Äôs ad free!

It's good for promoting sleeping and has a cute art style, but can't tell when background noise is you. If you have any AC or a fan going, or just have any sort of noise in the background, it WILL give a low score if not covered, which can also cause your device to overheat. Not optimal in more extreme weather (summer and winter), and even picks up the sound of my AC from the next room over to give a low score.

As a Pokemon-skinned Tamogachi, it's a lot more fun than I originally thought. However, the amount of time spent on loading screens and pop-ups is really starting to grate on me. When you try to collect ingredients, you need to click on a Mon through the candy and then it might trigger a skill, which might trigger a Snorlax level up... dialog boxes all the way down that are slow to resolve. The sheer waiting for these to resolve at a glacial pace really take away from the game.

It has a lot of potential, but there's some issues. I wish it could make my screen dark while sleeping because I usually end up turning my phone off, and it can't be tracked properly. Also, on Samsung S21 there's a weird black border at the top and bottom and the corners aren't rounded to fit with the display. edit: Got better with age. still want to see more content get added but fun game to encourage good sleep.

I'm getting tired of the constant updates every other week that I don't have the space for on my phone. I wouldn't be as annoyed if the updates actually fixed the way the app runs (choppy movement when you drag the screen, frequent crashing, long load times) but they haven't. I can't keep scrambling to delete something else that I don't want to delete off my phone just to hurry and update it before I miss my sleep time (which doesn't matter, it doesn't count about four hours of my sleep anyway!

It's fun and addictive but has SO many issues. The biggest issue is this game just slows down your phone. Not even just while playing it or tracking your sleep. In the middle of the day, I closed the app hours ago, my phone says it's having performance problems because of Pokemon Sleep. I've had to put it into deep sleep, but that means when tracking sleep, if I get a phone call or reply to a message, the app will probably close and I lose the rest of the sleep log. Loading times are still awful

if helps me sleep, sure, but my god. the updates lately have been nearly every day. several times this month alone I've had to go to the app store to get a new update. it's unbelievably infuriating. not to mention the game has so many little cutscenes that it drags down the time of the game. it shouldn't take me nearly a half hour to set up my new island each week.

for an app thats supposed to track sleep, it does a horrible job at doing so. numerous sessions have screwed up my stats due to the tracker's horrific inaccuracies, going as fas as to say I didnt sleep for well over 2 hours after I actually went to bed. screws over my progress, my team energy, and my statistics the game tracks. fun game, but never use the sleep tracker that's built-in. use your watch, at least that's reliable.

Much better to play with a watch or other tracking divice. Using the phone it's self is hard on the battery and data etc. Makes sleeping a little easier since I have something to focus on other than rest. The pay walls ate steep though, which is surprising considering pokemon games usually have a good varity of prices on things. If the monthly subscription was less like 4.99 or something I would do it but 9.99 is a lot of money for what it is.

I love this app so much. My complaint isn't with the app, but recently, I've started getting your ads while on other apps, and every time I do, it automatically opens up Pok√©mon Sleep. Please do not. It is very annoying. If this is something you guys set up, undo it. If not, figure out how to make it stop doing that. Snapchats ads did it to, which led me to uninstall it because it was not worth the consistent annoyance.

The app crashed on me at least twice a week, meaning all the potential Pok√©mon I could've caught are gone, and trying to evolve a Pok√©mon that requires X amount of hours in your party is slowed down a lot. There's very little gain from this app. If you care about your sleep stats, great. If you want to just play a Pok√©mon game, you should find something else.

the game is fun, but it crashes way too often for me to enjoy it. i use a google phone so not too sure if its just the android version. been playing the game everyday for about a year now and it crashes at least once or twice each morning as i do my reports. also could happen in the middle of me playing. issue can be solved by restarting the app but gets too annoying when im just trying to wake up or go to sleep.

title: Venmo
description:
Venmo is the fast, safe, social way to pay and get paid. Join over 90+ million people who use the Venmo app today
¬†
SEND AND RECEIVE MONEY
Pay and get paid for anything from your share of rent to a gift. Add a note to each payment to share and connect with friends

SPLIT A REQUEST AMONG MULTIPLE VENMO FRIENDS
You can now send a payment request to multiple Venmo friends at once and customize the amount each person owes
¬†
GET REWARDED WITH THE VENMO CREDIT CARD
Earn up to 3% cash back on your eligible top spend category¬π ‚Äîwe‚Äôll do the math. Split card purchases with Venmo friends, and shop everywhere Visa¬Æ credit cards are accepted‚Äîonline, in-store, worldwide¬≤

BUY CRYPTO WITH AS LITTLE AS $1
Buy, hold, and sell cryptocurrency right on the Venmo app. New to crypto? Learn more with in-app resources. Crypto is volatile, so it can rise and fall in value quickly. Be sure to take it at a pace you're comfortable with¬≥

SHOP WITH THE VENMO DEBIT CARD
Spend your money in Venmo everywhere Mastercard¬Æ is accepted around the globe  ‚Äî and earn cashback from some of your favorite spots. Terms apply: venmo.me/rewards‚Å¥

VENMO TEEN ACCOUNTS
A debit card of their very own and a Venmo account to send money to trusted friends and family‚Åµ. All with no minimum balance or monthly fee
¬†
DO BUSINESS ON VENMO
Create a business profile for your side gig, small business, or anything in between‚Äîall under your same Venmo account

MANAGE YOUR MONEY
Get your Venmo money in the bank within minutes using Instant Transfer‚Å∂. Want your paycheck up to two days earlier* than your normal payday? Try Direct Deposit
¬†
¬πUse of cash back is subject to the terms of the Venmo account. See Rewards Program Terms: https://www.synchronycredit.com/gecrbterms/html/RewardsTerms.htm
¬≤Application subject to credit approval. You must be at least 18 years old and reside in the US or its territories to apply. You must have a Venmo account in good standing, that has been open for at least 30 days prior to application
The Venmo Credit Card is issued by Synchrony Bank pursuant to a license from Visa USA Inc. VISA is a registered trademark of Visa International Service Association and used under license
¬≥Terms apply. Only available in the US and limited in certain states. Buying and selling cryptocurrency is subject to a number of risk and may result in significant losses. Venmo does not make any recommendation regarding buying or selling cryptocurrency. Consider seeking advice from your financial or tax adviser
‚Å¥The Venmo Mastercard¬Æ is issued by The Bancorp Bank, N.A., pursuant to license by Mastercard International Incorporated. Mastercard and the circles design are registered trademarks of Mastercard International Incorporated. The Bancorp Bank, N.A. is issuer of the Card only and not responsible for the associated accounts or other products, services, or offers from Venmo
‚Åµ The Venmo Teen Debit Card is available for eligible users 13-17 years old with parent or legal guardian sign up. Terms apply
‚Å∂ Transfer speed depends on your bank and could take up to 30 minutes. Transfers are reviewed which may result in delays or funds being frozen or removed from your Venmo account. * The availability of Direct Deposit is subject to your employer sending paycheck information 1-2 days in advance of payday.¬†Early access compared to standard banking practice of posting funds at settlement and subject to your employer providing pay information to the bank prior to payday. It may take up to two pay cycles for Direct Deposit to take effect. Transactions are reviewed, which may result in delays or funds being frozen or removed from your account

Emoji artwork is provided by emojitwo.github.io/, originally released as emojione.com/ by Ranks.com with contributions from the Emojitwo community and is licensed under creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/legalcode

Venmo
2211 N. First St., San Jose, CA 95131

Venmo
2211 N. First St., San Jose, CA 95131
summary: Venmo is the fun and easy way to pay and get paid.

scraped_reviews.content: This app was fine until about a week ago. I depend on Venmo for important matters, but it has recently started misbehaving. I don't think I can trust it anymore for anything important. First, the software seems to have problems even loading this past week. Secondly, when the app is behaving, it stopped transferring money in the middle of a series of payments I was making. No solution seems to be within sight. I don't think I can trust it anymore.

Had nothing but problems with this app. Used to be able to buy, sell, send, & receive crypto til about 8 months ago. now I'm only able to buy & sell, which does me no good. No one at Venmo seems to know an exact issue. Instead, I get a list of possible reasons with a very wide range. Also, I'm unable to transfer money instantly to my linked debit card. Never had issues in the past, but when I try getting answers as to why, once again, a list of possibles. Doesn't deserve the 1 star I had to put

I got Venmo and the debit card with the intention of using it as a way to save for personal fun spending. Turns out, as a sportsman, many of the things I was planning on using it for are prohibited by their terms of service even though they're legal purchases (think ammunition, firearms, etc. from licensed companies). Large money transfers also take a LONG time, and customer service is a joke when needed, as it relies heavily on an incompetent AI system. I'll be looking for other solutions.

I like the service, but find the app annoying. When you click notifications for the first time, it will take you to the app, but then the notification gets stuck and won't do anything. It won't clear unless you manually swipe it away. It's difficult to find things in-app (like the link to your profile, for some reason???), it automatically switches you to "transactions" even when you've clicked on "wallet" multiple times. Just frustrating.

Although the app is great and works very quickly. Hopefully you never end up getting hacked like I did. As soon as I saw it I spoke with Venmo repeatedly on their customer service. But they are saying it takes 7 to 10 days to correct any problems. Since they are PayPal backed I would think that they would get things significantly faster and more active. Not too happy in regards to being the customer and getting ripped off.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there ‚Äî If you have not yet been assisted, we'd be happy to take a look if you reach out to us at app-reviews@venmo.com

scraped_reviews.content: Use this app as long as you don't mind being unable to touch your account balance. nothing better than seeing the small bit of money you received that you actually really needed asap be untouchable "but it's the bank" didn't know another venmo account or visa+ counted as my bank not allowing it to go through. cool though. love knowing I can't use my money for Christmas üß°

MY FRIENDS -- STICK TO CASH APP. This app is an absolute mess. They can place a 3 week hold on your payment for no reason at all. In the Help section, they claim you can locate the reason within the payment details under "Transactions" in the "Me" tab, but this is also a lie. No reason is provided. We first made two small "test" transactions that went thru fine, just to make sure there are no issues. No problems, so she sent me $120 thinking it's safe. NOPE! 3 WEEK HOLD, with no reverse option.

Nothing but problems signing up. The app says that I am verified but I have not been able to add any credit/debit card or account from multiple banks. Either improper form or can't accept. I have triple checked everything and nothing works. For some reason the account if frozen now. I have submitted a driver's license but have to wait a week for a response. The chatbot is absolutely useless. The phone number doesn't lead anywhere helpful. I have no idea why people use this time wasting app.

They advised me in the evening via email that a money transfer was initiated. It was fraudulently initiated, and I was unable to do the transaction because it was outside of their business hours. The following morning, the money was sitting in a fraudulently requested virtual debit card which I immediately cancelled. They held my money for a week before finally making it accessible in the venmo account, as opposed to putting it back in my bank. They were very unhelpful thru the entire process.

Latest production version -- haven't been able to open the app on my new device. It's been like this for ages least a week. Error message is generic "something went wrong. Try again later" Pixel 8 pro. Android 14 latest version. Good app when I can get in. Update 2 weeks later: Still crashes on launch this ^ was last device. fixed eventually but don't know how. got a new pixel 8 pro, same problem. cannot access app.

Can't add or move money around, Support says everything is fine on their end even though nothing is working... Not useable even after ID verification and reconnecting all accounts with Plaid. Told to wait for things to clear up, but that hasn't worked either. Only financial app that gives me unnecessary headaches. Tried clearing the cache and reinstalling, but still no luck getting it working. Cards say that they've been added when they haven't been. Terrible user experience overall.

Frustrating. Used to work great for cashing checks, which is really only reason i use venmo...the convenience. I use it because it's fast and easy for all different kinds of checks written to me for business. Now, I can't get it to load the check when I try taking the pictures of it. Can't get past the loading phase. I've done literally every suggestion possible to see if it's on my end, but it's not. Would give them 5 stars if they could fix this issue, otherwise not really needed.

Despite having identity verification, it seems the amount I can send is very small. In addition to that, I can't add a balance to my account and when I attempted to contact support, I waited for an hour for a response and stepped away from my phone for a few minutes. Upon returning, I had been contacted and the conversation was closed with me being unable to open anything new. Is their system really set up so we can't just talk as we can like any other customer support? Awful app.

This is the worst ever. I've tried to send funds for a week now from a credit card and gotten the vague non-helpful error message that something went wrong, please try again later. I've called twice and after 30 minute holds done everything the rep asked me to do other than pay from a debit rather than a credit card which I refuse to do. Very frustrating and very poor customer service.

App doesn't have decent customer service, and even if you can get someone, understanding them is a whole different thing. They seemed to be fine before using it about a year or more ago, but today, they hold money won't let me send it to someone else from a balance, and are telling me they do not even have a reason for this "inconvenience". Its much more than just and inconvenience, when you're holding up my money and cannot give me a reason, or a solution!

the app is fine for regular venmo transanctions but when it comes to the credit card this app has never been able to add my bank manually or via Plaid all the years Ive had this account. ive called and complained about this several times, and they can never give me an explanation, my only solution for credit card payments is to call every single time and dial the proper extensions to make a payment. It's very time consuming.

Terrible!! I constantly get an error message saying, "something went wrong. Your transaction cannot be complete. Try again later." I called customer service 4 times and followed all there instructions. They even had me try to make a payment while on the phone with them and got the same message. All they could say is the system is flagging it and there is nothing we can do.... Complete GARBAGE service!!!

crypto is inaccessible. I invested a few bucks and every time I go to check it, you can't access it. it's constantly loading. for months!! I'm at the point of just being over it. this has been going on for months! I know it's not just me. I don't have a problem with any other apps. I have no issues with other tabs in the venmo app, just crypto. get it together!!!

Payments to others from a bank account fail 99% of the time. I removed and re-added several different bank accounts, but all failed with vague "something went wrong" errors, and customer service is useless, suggesting brilliant strategies like "reinstall the app" even when I told them it fails on 3 different phones (Android) and even after a fresh app install. I was only able to finally get a payment made by using a debit card.

For a year and a half, I was able to add money to my Venmo account from my bank debit cards without a problem. For the last two months, I suddenly have not been able to. I have tried updating the app, restarting my phone, my accounts have plenty of funds, my cards are valid, I haven't come close to exceeding any transfer thresholds rolling or otherwise, my account is in good status and not restricted, and support is supremely unhelpful.

I've had nothing but problems with venmo. I had crypto transferred into venmo, and they've locked it- for no reason. I can't send it anywhere, and the service rep doesn't know why or how long it will take for the "system" to resolve the red flag issue. Use cashapp instead. It's so easy and seamless. You can transfer crypto the MOMENT you buy or receive it, unlike this garbage app.

I've got a bank account and 3 credit cards. This frustrating app won't let me remove the credit card that is no longer valid! It doesn't say why... just keeps saying, "Error removing card. Keep trying. ". Plus, I have to keep clicking on Wallet to see my cards/accounts. The process of accessing payment methods is clunky. Originally, I clicked on the "Cards" tab, but all that does is show you the Venmo cards they want you to use instead. Super frustrating. Used to be much easier. Boooo!

I used them for automatic bill payments. They repeatedly double and triple charged me several weeks in a row. Upon contacting them via chat, they insisted this issue was fixed (then it would happen again anyway) but that they couldn't recover my money unless the recipient sent it back themselves, despite their app causing the issue. After this happening several times in a row, I will no longer use this terrible app.

"Something went wrong. Try again" That's all I have gotten from this app. No error message, no help. Over and over. It appears that you can't access the chat until you create an account, but all my problems are while trying to create an account. The troubleshooting pages just go in circles, offering advice for everything except this impossibly generic error.

can't get the app to work for a long time. can't log in. reset does not work. tells me my phone number and email are not valid. I try to register and something went wrong. I feel like I am blocked out of the app and I don't understand the reason. I even tried chat and phone support. can't reach a resolution. chat wants me to open the app. the customer support just keeps ringing endlessly until it hangs up. The support seems to assume I can get the app to open. it doesn't.

Log on one day to my account and it's not functioning. I have no emails with an explanation from Venmo. I call, enter my phone number, and the automated system says there's no account associated with my phone number. In my account profile, my phone number is verified. Not sure what's going on here but I've used this app without issue for over a decade. Very disappointed as I had trust in using this platform.

Been trying to pay for a purchase for over 7 hours now and it just declines. I switched backup payment card and it still paid to the presumed primary card. There doesn't seem a way to switch cards during the payment process. I have called my credit card company, ebay and vemo and all I can be sure of is it isn't my credit card. Venmo's solution is just wait and try later or spend money to fund the account. I just want to pay for my purchase with a credit card. it shouldn't be a hard thing to do

1). To pay someone is bothersome. It should be a two or three click payment process but you have to fumble around to get to the correct location to pay. Also, the graphics are not self explanatory for what you are trying to do - specifically for paying people. There are better apps that are more intuitive out there. 2) Also, I cannot add a credit card, the app gives me an error on the Venmo side message. 3) Customer support is so buried down in the bowels of the app, I can't find any help.

Idiotic user experience. You can have a verified phone number & bank account, but it doesn't tell you that the reason you can't accept a payment is because you haven't verified your email. Is this needed step on the main screen? No. Is it in your settings? No. Is it in the page that pops up when you click Accept Money in the email? NO!! Is it in the tiny little notifications icon in the top right corner where apps bug you with useless promos? Yep that's where it's hiding.

Haven't even used my account yet, and it froze on me. The Venmo app won't let me fix the issue, I've tried every portal they made me go through. I tried contacting Venmo via call. The first call took me to collections. Which wasn't the right number. And this number I was transferred to, I've been on hold for over an hour now. The agents over the phone don't respect other people's time. I would suggest saving your time by using a different app.

The app has so many issues it's impossible to sign up. First it didn't accept my valid number with just 'an error occurred'. my wife's number got the same later in the process. The support pages just say to use the in app support which is not available during signup. The support number leaves you on hold for hours. Tried a new number - "the number is associated with another account, contact support". The forgot password links display broken UI. How is this broken app so popular?

I have tried using venmo to purchase items online with no success. My transactions keep getting declined and provides no reason as to why. contact customer service and say that the system doesn't recognize the transaction so it declines the charge as it's learning my trends. then tells me to wait a few days to try again so the system can maybe recognize the charge and approve or just use another card. what's the point in using your system at this point. won't be using again.

I love this app forever and to be honest still do. It's been a little glitchy lately. I've had to uninstall it twice and reinstall just because it wouldn't load. And for whatever reason I can't add my 4th card. I keep getting an error message saying there's an issue on there end. I'm sure there will be software issues that fix all this and when it does I'll rate it 5 stars for sure.

I have had venmo for a couple months. I purposely chose to not have overdraft. But for whatever reason, they decided to let some random charge overdraft my account. When ive NEVER had that ability before. I did not approve the purchase, I did not approve the overdraft, and ive messaged them, emailed them, and even tried calling them to dispute the charge. Just use cash app yall. This app is a 2nd rate version of that, and their customer service is as bad, if not worse then PayPal.

Their customer support is TERRIBLE. Don't expect anything to get done at all. Whatever you click or transfer or anything, not their problem and they can NEVER do anything about it. I've had nearly 5 issues over the last 3 years and it's always useless to try and get their help. Not even worth trying honestly. Now they have removed verification of the bank I transferred to for some unknown reason, that is the only bank they did it to, and I have to wait another 3 days to get my money back. cool

After I transferred money to my account, it locked for suspicious activity and I didn't hear back until 24 hours later, "Unfortunately, your attempt to add money to your account is being declined by our system. This generally happens because a transaction has raised a security flag. I'm very sorry about the inconvenience here, but we are unable to override this decline." Though I had no flags having used it days before with no issues. There are much better services to use.

It was absolutely amazing, perfect, and convenient for flippin years up until about a month or two ago. It stopped letting me transfer money to my account completely. I can send money, but the second someone else sends me any, I'm not allowed to transfer it and venmo just eats it. It's way too buggy and won't let me verify my bank info or whatever. I've deleted it, updated it, removed and readded my card, nothing works. It's a lost cause, and I have no clue what to do.

Just a poor user experience and interface. Way too hard to add a contact. When I start a payment I can't even see my contacts to pick one. I don't need to socialize payments just make it easy. It's just way too hard to make a simple payment, I should be able to see my friends easily when creating a new payment or an easy way to repeat the previous payment. Update, still. horrible. Search sucks, and when find a business, no way to see and verify details to make sure paying the right account.

installed app just to get coupon on eBay and the transaction keeps getting declined. I called my bank who confirmed everything is good on their end. Contacted Venmo who confirmed their security flagged it for some reason, but they couldn't say why. They also couldnt override it and allow it to go through. They just said to try again later after the system "refreshes itself," whatever that means. They said it refreshes itself every 2 hours. Well I tried again the next day and it STILL got decline

Only negative experience what so ever I have had using the app was a one time thing so far. The app is great and the convenient factor is up the at a 9 or 10. The ability to digitally send money to anyone anywhere instantly is a game changer. Here is where negative situation comes in. When sending money to someone you have to watch what you say in comments bc Venmo's system will pick it up as a sale and charge the receiver of the funds a percentage.

This is the worst payment app. Last month, I submitted my security deposit, and it went through without zero issues. However, when it came time to send my rent, that's when the issues arose. They ended up suspending my account. I went back and forth with customer service. I ended up changing my password twice and submitted a selfie with my ID. They eventually unsuspended my account, but even then, that didn't help. My card is still flagged, and Customer Service is zero help.

Pros: Easy to use, quick processing of transactions. Cons: Selecting party to pay can be confusing and uncertain when entering their name (so many people with the same name.) Also, the deposit check feature often has glitches - at best, clunky with several retakes of the check. Ar worst, tire of retakes and give up/ use another app.)

froze my account for no reason and when I went to the article provided saying where I can go about unfreezing my email, did not provide relevant or useful advice. tried calling customer support, made me listen to a bot and dial numbers corresponding to my problems, then just restarted the greeting message. can't even connect it to apps saying it accepts venmo payment, so I have to transfer money to my debit each time where it charges a fee (not a lot, but a few I'd rather not pay nonetheless.)

Venmo isnt what it used to be...With that being said, it is still a great app that I use frequently. I wish they would still allow ppl to still send money to others, even if you can't afford it/don't have it in your account. And you would then pay it back at a later time, or they would take (owed-money/debt) bit by bit as ppl sent you money, or your stocks/investments gained profits. Was great for paying that pesky bill, or getting that emergency last minute wedding/bday gift. Bring back credit!

I gave a horrible review, not for the app. It is possibly the worst experience with actually getting in contact with someone. Everything reverts you back to the app. Well, if I could, i would. I have a lost email and phone number I can't access. When I did get in contact with someone, the phone disconnected. Repeated process until someone didn't hang up until I got my ID photos uploaded... then the phone drops, making me think it's some kind of hack going on. I call the # back it it's PAYPAL.

They love freezing accounts for no reason downloaded the app, sent a request, account got frozen because they couldn't verify my identity. once my identity was verified my account got unfrozen, and then when I request money again, they freeze my account all over again. the support is slow, and unclear as to why my account was frozen in the first place. terrible app and company.

We had a difficult time using it at first. We considered changing apps but the people we wanted to interact with used it. The support is a chat bot. After a few frustrating chats,I learned to ask for a live agent. I had concerns there because they from India. Where most scams originate. They were finally able to get my payment through. The next month we had the same issues. Turns out after a total of 3.5 hours in chat and on the phone, we couldn't use our bank account directly. Terrible suppor

account was frozen upon creation. I reached out to support no one joined the chat for 40 min. I had to go. I tried again later, the support member forwarded my case to some one else who could help. I got an email that my account was unfrozen. I tried to add my bank details without luck. I reach out to support again and they tell me my account is flagged as a risk to venmo or it's customers. I request to talk with management. they say they will call. 10 days later, still no call now app wont open

Well, this app went downhill quickly. if you have any kind of issue trying to put money into your account; you have to TRY and dispute it through their chatbot. If that doesn't help, you're led through another goose chase for help on their website to over the over-the-phone assistance. No real help ar all. Just a frozen account that I can't put money in. I don't get it.

Use to be able to use Vemno with no issues. i preferred its app over cashapp, but recently its been giving me many problems. Can't add money to account using a card or directly from bank. Just an error message pops up everytime. Won't let me add a new debit card to the account either. When I called tech support and was finally able to talk to someone, they didn't have anything to say about the issue. PLEASE fix your app. Its not functional at all anymore.

title: Kagi News
description:
Get a comprehensive daily press review with global news. Fully private, with sources openly curated by our community. 

What You Get:
One thoughtful press review per day (updated 12:00 UTC)
Coverage: Any and all topics usually covered in the press
Multiple perspectives from global sources
One-tap access to original articles
Clean sections: Summary, Highlights, Key Quotes, Timeline, Context, Impact

How It Works:

Kagi News uses AI to read thousands of community-curated RSS feeds from publications worldwide and distills them into a single, thoughtful press review. 

Every review cites the sources it pulled from, so you can dive deeper with one tap.

Community Contributions:
Contribute sources to broaden perspectives
Open source platform with community-curated feeds

Privacy by Design:

No ads. No trackers. Your attention belongs to you.

https://kagi.com/privacy

Download now for your daily dose of quality journalism without the noise.

summary: Be informed, save time

scraped_reviews.content: As close to unbiased and factual as I can find nowadays, and I really appreciate the ability to fine tune what kinds of stories are presented. Since it's not ad driven, it's not trying to maximize clicks and attention. It seems to just get straight to the point without clutter while still covering all the background I'd want to see.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you Scott for your 5-star review!!

scraped_reviews.content: Great idea, and good app but a max of 12 articles isn't enough. The Privacy category seems broken, it only returns a single article. No Politics category seems like an oversight. App doesn't update the articles at an appropriate time for the UK, fresh articles should he ready in the morning. The ability to specify favourite news sources to pull stories from would both be great and shoulder be able to blacklist news types like TV and football. I can't wait to see how this continues to improve.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks, Joe, for your feedback! Kagi products evolve through the input we receive from users like you. You‚Äôre always welcome to share more feedback here or at kagifeedback.org. We‚Äôd also be happy to see you join the conversation at kagi.com/discord

scraped_reviews.content: This has got to be the best news app I've had the pleasure of using. The interface is very simple and slick, the categories are really useful and work very well. And all the sources used for each story are prominently displayed at the top above the summary so you can check for yourself! To top it all off, any story with a location has the location linked so you can quickly open where it's taking place in your map of choice.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for the kind review!

scraped_reviews.content: I want to say this news app is great for beginners like myself on current events. I would only suggest if the developers can please add a save/read for later option in the app. If so then the app would be perfect.

Honestly it is awesome but why not Dark theme? Edit: I am sorry, it did changed and i have not noticed it. Thank you but Why can't we add new category? I use Google which feels little pathetic but still i can add custom keyword and it will show related results as it is a news aggregator of my keywords.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you Kailasa for the feedback! We actually do support Dark Mode, it follows your system theme automatically. If your device is set to dark mode, Kagi News will match it.

scraped_reviews.content: Works pretty well, but sometimes things don't load, and the translation doesn't either. More news would be nice as well, but so far, it's a really good app for being in beta. Best news app I ever used!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you! We‚Äôre glad you‚Äôre enjoying Kagi News and appreciate your patience as we improve stability, translation, and expand our news sources during beta. Your support means a lot!

scraped_reviews.content: very well thought out interface that allows me to quickly verify if the ai summary is accurate, my only gripes are that the ai sometimes makes headlines sound weird and there are no widgets.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you! We‚Äôre continuously improving AI headline generation, and widgets are definitely on our radar!

scraped_reviews.content: Kagi News is a life-changing way to quickly get the latest news without wasting time on reading the same things again and again, or getting sucked into low-quality clickbait "content" with mountains of ads. I don't use social media but my experience on Google News had become so bad that it almost felt like the echo chambers of Facebook & Co. Ads and recommended "content" from influencers and tech writers without any depth or usefulness. Kagi feels like a breath of fresh air compared to that.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much for sharing this! We‚Äôre thrilled that Kagi News brings you a calmer, higher-quality way to stay informed. It means a lot to hear that it feels like a breath of fresh air compared to the noise elsewhere.

scraped_reviews.content: The best privacy friendly News app That I can get compared to Google News. it let's me categorize what I want the news of the focus to be It's only going to get better from here on out!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for downloading Kagi News! We will keep working on it!

scraped_reviews.content: I like kagi for search but this app sucks. It really is just AI slop. As you read an article, points are repeated over and over again. Tough to argue with the price though
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback, we‚Äôre sorry to hear Kagi News didn‚Äôt meet your expectations. We‚Äôre continuously refining our AI summaries to reduce repetition and improve clarity.

scraped_reviews.content: Love this! Just news, none of that junk that comes with other news apps that spend more time trying to sell you something or sell your data. Kagi is one of the best new companies out there.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much for your review! Our users are and will always be first.

scraped_reviews.content: Kagi is amazing. I love the philosophy. Search has been amazing for a while now and it's great to see their news product brought out into a dedicated app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you, Dave! We appreciate you taking the time to leave such a nice review.

scraped_reviews.content: App is very promissing i loved it but has very little news feeds has. And i think this app needs easy way to contribute in app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you! We‚Äôre continuously expanding our news sources and exploring ways to make contributions easier in the app.

scraped_reviews.content: Superb app. Well designed, easy to use, clearly sourced, and rather comprehensive.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you Ian for trying the app and the nice review!

scraped_reviews.content: it's well designed and reliant. unfortunately I would like to have news for my country France not the world in English
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback! Kagi News does include a France category where you can follow local news. Also, French is one of the supported languages for the UI and translated content, so you can read articles in your preferred language.

scraped_reviews.content: A great idea for a news app and the transparency is much appreciated!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you, Tudor! We really appreciate your feedback, and we promise the app will only get better moving forward!

scraped_reviews.content: Excellent summary of news. Allows you to see the actual story plus different perspectives on different stories with many different sources.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you Devin for trying the app and the nice review!

scraped_reviews.content: Doesn't support landscape mode for tablets.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Thank you Joe for trying the app. We unlocked landscape mode on tablets and iPads in our latest update. A better and more responsive design will be shipped gradually.

We welcome your feedback either here or on kagifeedback.org. We'll also be happy to have you at kagi.com/discord

scraped_reviews.content: Truly amazing, best news app so far.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you! We're really glad you're enjoying the app.

scraped_reviews.content: this is on entirely different level of thinking: clean and with summary outlines. fabulous! erik
clean and concise. bite size stories and no clutter.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you! We‚Äôre glad you‚Äôre enjoying the clean and bite-sized news experience.

scraped_reviews.content: A million times better than Google News or similar apps.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much! We‚Äôre thrilled that you‚Äôre enjoying Kagi News, that means a lot to us!

scraped_reviews.content: great news format, clear of BS and seems unbiased. thanks Kagi for putting this out
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you Kyle for downloading and trying the app! We appreciate your review!

scraped_reviews.content: Thought this would be a news aggregator without adverse incentives toward users, but it's actually just AI slop summaries of news articles. If I wanted that I could get that anywhere else.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for you feedback, we‚Äôre sorry Kagi News didn‚Äôt meet your expectations. Our approach is to distill diverse, community-curated sources into a brief daily update, with full source links so you can check originals. We‚Äôre actively improving summary quality and transparency, and your note helps us prioritize that work.

scraped_reviews.content: Kagi News is amazing! Finally, an impartial, ethical, highly efficient way to stay informed. Thank you, Kagi!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much for your kind words! We‚Äôre thrilled that you‚Äôre enjoying Kagi News!

scraped_reviews.content: This News app provides an ideal, succinct overview of current topics/events. By summarizing articles from multiple sources it eliminates the bloat/boilerplate text leaving just the key facts while also avoiding duplicate articles on the same topic. The once a day content update along with a responsive, efficient user interface is so refreshing. This is now a benchmark for how News should be consumed.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much for your wonderful and detailed feedback! We‚Äôre thrilled to hear that you enjoy the concise summaries, clean experience, and daily updates. It means a lot to us that you see Kagi News as a benchmark for how news should be consumed. Your support truly motivates our team! We promise it'll only get better going forward!

scraped_reviews.content: I want to like this app, but I can't even start using it. I'm immediately greeted with "Something went wrong, there are no stories here!" and there's no option to refresh or anything.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Thank you Anthony for downloading and trying the app! We had a small incident on Sep 29, 2025 that was resolved immediately. Please try again anytime and keep us posted.

We welcome your feedback either here or on kagifeedback.org. We'll also be happy to have you at kagi.com/discord

scraped_reviews.content: Absolute gamechanger. Now I can stay up to date without doomscrolling past a bunch of celeb BS. goodbye forever google news.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you! We're so glad Kagi News helps you stay informed without the noise, that‚Äôs exactly what we‚Äôre aiming for!

scraped_reviews.content: Has repeated the same headlines for the last 3 days. 'World' news seems preferential to report on UK legislature. Uninstalled
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback! We haven‚Äôt seen other reports of repeated headlines, but we‚Äôll double-check and make sure this issue doesn‚Äôt affect our users.

scraped_reviews.content: app is great. üëå
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you! We‚Äôre happy to hear you‚Äôre enjoying Kagi News!

scraped_reviews.content: solved bad news for me

title: ÎÑ§Ïù¥Î≤Ñ ÏõπÌà∞ - Naver Webtoon
description:
Check out new webtoons everyday on NAVER Webtoons! 
All webtoons are sorted by popularity, view count or update so you can easily find the one you're looking for.

Use your reading history under the menus to continue reading from the last page you read, or '48-Hour Temporary Save' to enjoy webtoons offline. You can also use 'Notifications' to get notified as soon as your favorite webtoons are updated.

If you have any questions or problems while using the app, please feel free to leave your inquiry on NAVER Webtoons Customer Center ( http://me2.do/FIvD1Tli ) or Settings > NAVER Webtoons Customer Center on your app.

scraped_reviews.content: I really like the English version of webtoon, so I decided to download this to improve my korean. It's pretty good! I've read a few reviews that says it isnt in English, but theres a entirely separate app for that so if people wanna read in english you can go there. One thing is it's hard to get coins but its reasonable the authors need money, so 5/5!
I can't even receive the code when I tried to sign up. This is beyond frustrating.
its not good at all. Had so much trouble while signing up

I admit I downloaded this to practice my korean. As such this app is perfect for it. There are so many more manhwa that I haven't seen before. Really the only difference I have noticed is it is strictly just korean (which is to be expected honestly). All in all, super happy with it. I get to practice my korean, read so many new manhwa (the art is absolutely gorgeous for a large majority of them). I am happy with it truthfully.

Webtoon is an ultimate app, literally with an unique amount of comics to explore. I don't have any complaints expect one, or a help. I accidentally uninstalled this app yesterday and now when I reinstalled it, this app only works in Korean and I don't understand Korean either. Besides my subscription are also gone. I need an help with this issue.

scraped_reviews.content: For those complaining that it's not English, there is another Webtoon app with other languages including English (just may not have the same comics). Some comics here are translated into English on the other Webtoon version app, but may not have the latest Korean updates (so if you technically want to read ahead on some of the translated ones on the other Webtoon, you can kind of do that here)

I have both english and Korean version. One thing is for sure English version of naver is not updated as the korean version. It would be great if both version updated at the same time.. Notice that got more nicer story here than the english version.. please please update both at the same time, spent a lot $ for coins and i dnt mind to spend more in future üòÑ

This app is helping me very much. I am a transfer student in Korea and I barely know any Korean, which sucks. One of my teachers suggested that I should check the app out to help read and memorize Korean, even though I don't know what it is saying in English. So thank you very much for making this app so I can understand how the consonants and vowels work in Korean. Again, thank you so very much for making this app.

The stories are awesome! But since I'm a foreigner and can understand only a little bit of korean, I was hoping that reading interesting stuffs as novels could help me learn korean in a fun easy way. So us, foreign users would be really thankful if there could be a small english translation below the speech bubbles üôèüôèüôèüôèüôè. I know there are translated version of the novels, but as I want to learn korean it would be a really big help if I can read both hangul and translation at the same time

I'm, surprised. Naver's other WEBTOON app is the english version, and sure, some webtoons here are not on that one but it also has its own. I read from both myself. This app was never intending to support other languages in the first place, what you are doing is like comparing the global version of a game to the original and bashing on the original for no english support because the global version doesnt have all the things. If you really wish to read the stories here it would be best to learn.

To log in to this application is very difficult, even though I have filled in the data properly and correctly, but the code has not been sent either, and one more thing, besides being difficult to log in, this application only has 1 language, so I can only enjoy the images in the Manhwa application, and not absorb the meaning. I hope that in the future this application will make it easier to log in and also increase language options.

So for everyone who's annoying by the app because y'all cannot change the language, let me explain. So webtoon have 2 app. One's the Line Webtoon, and one's is (this app) Naver Webtoon. So in Line webtoon, you can change the language to english, thailand, Fran√ßais, Espan√µl, Deutsch, and more. And in this Naver Webtoon you can change too, but It is difficult. B'cuz you don't understand Korean (I don't too üò≠). So it's better to use Line Webtoon if you didn't understand Korean, alright üò≠üôè

(For those of you who cannot understand Korean) This app is for Korean webtoons, so there is no way to change the language of comics in the app. However, there is another Naver Webtoon official app for other languages (i.e. English, Chinese, Malaysian, Japanese etc.), so you can try those :)

It's good for me who need such spoiler and tired of waiting for translation. I confused why so many reviewers said they disappointed because this app didn't have translation when naver webtoon is actually in korean. If you want to read in english or other language you can download the other one, Line Webtoon. Not this one.

Downloaded this app because I'm tired of waiting for updates on the English version so this is better even if I don't understand the language but pictures speak louder than words xD so I am very satisfied. The only drawback is that I don't know how to search for the webtoons that I read on the English version because the name is in Korean but I found some of them and I'm really grateful (': thank you Naver.

I can understand a bit of Korean so I really wanted to try this app so I can be more up-to-date with Webtoons I read on the international app, but everytime I put in my contact info, I never get a verification code. I've tried EVERYTHING; nothing worked. I don't even understand why Emails can't suffice in the first place... I love this app for the sole reason of wanting to support my favourite authors and artists, but I dislike how difficult it is to sign up because of how buggy it is.

Attention all English readers! Stop being stupid! There is not an English option and there will never be! They have an entire app dedicated to English readers, they are not going to add it to this one. If you want to read the comics featured on Naver Webtoon, learn korean. Other than that, this app is absolutely amazing.

This app is amazing. The reason I dowloaded it in the first place was because in the english version, I wanted to get ahead in my original korean webtoons. When I got it, it was more than I what I was expecting.They have such amazing japanese based art style webtoons that I had to read all of them. The only problem is that it is korean, but that is understandable. It would cool if you guys added cookies for people who dont know korean but this is the original app so I get why it is in korean.

I'm not sure why some people are complaining that the webtoons and app are in Korean. This app was created to be catered towards Koreans. And translating webtoons into English takes longer than you may think. That's why LINE Webtoon exists. It has some english translations from this app (true beauty, looksim...) and webtoons that are created by english speakers.

For everyone reading this, please understand that there is another seperate app in English. As you should have figured out, this is KOREAN app for KOREAN people. Therefore, there would be no need to add English. Please type in "Webtoon" to get the English version of this app. It is really infuriating to see English hate comments on a Korean app ü§¶üèæ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èü§¶üèæ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

I love this app, I've been learning korean for the past 2 years and this app does help me practice my reading. Of course you won't learn korean from this app because it's not a teaching app, it's comics. But if you know how to read and write in korean, and know some vocabulary, this app will be very fun. I love it!! ‚ô•Ô∏è

Good app, lot of free content. There is a bit of a paywall but I don't mind. I have one issue only: I wish app would remember where i stopped reading. I often close the app in the middle of reading and when I open it again, i need to scroll down a bit and find the part I was reading.

Poor account recovery process. I can't log into my phone naver app because my account is associated with Line. There is no option to log in with a Line account. I can't change my password because I can't receive a confirmation code to my phone. I must have an old account with my phone number, but I can't access that because I don't remember my user ID or password. So, I'm stuck unable to log in to the app and unable to bookmark my favorite webtoon. It's a very frustrating process.

I'm not receiving any code verification for the sign-up thing. Even though the information I provided is correct. This gotta be fixed up. I already tried any methods to figure out what's wrong, follow the guidelines, and still can't receive a message for my sign-up.

The app is really easy to use and browse through. It has a wide selection of webtoons to chose from, and there's specials that allow me to read webtoons that are locked and usually require cookies to read them. I'm using it for my daily Korean reading practice and it's really useful.
I wish you could make them translate into English it would have been even better

scraped_reviews.content: I'm not fluent in Korean but there are some words I am familiar with. I love this app so much. I have so many Manhwas that I have read already! And they have nice storylines. I recommend to other people to use this app if that person loves reading stories. 5 stars for me! And if it's possible, I'd rate this so much more!

I don't live korea but am interested in reading. As part of the app, cookies are able to be gained. To do that, you need to get an account and when I made one, it kept suspending it for being in a country other than korea. It also took me very long to verify my account's phone number because it's from another country. I searched it up online & this happened to many other people who also didn't live in Korea.

For all the people asking for English version. There is one, just download the version of Webtoon that doesn't have korean in the title of the app and search "Webtoon" instead of "Naver Webtoon". There's a lot of Korean series translated and posted to the English version of Webtoon.

I have the English version of the app (which is simply called Line Webtoon) I just couldn't wait for one webtoon to be translated and posted so I got this one too. It's pretty much the exact same thing with extra details like drama adaption notifications and animated webtoons,etc. Both are filled with great comics.
We hope that it has an English translation so that we can read more series in this app

Overall i'm very satisfied with the app, i've improved my korean a lot while reading the webtoons, which is amazing. The only downside is since i'm not a korean native i couldn't buy the cookies and have to try really really hard to gain the free ones. But still overall this app is amazing!

Nowdays in USA Korean mangas/novels became extremely popular. Many people from USA would read Korean novels and webtoons, etc. Problem only is in absence English language settings in APP and it would be enough to enable Google translate services for novels. That way you guys could earn more money. And earn 5* for app.

title: K MANGA
description:
Welcome to K MANGA - the official Kodansha manga app where you can dive into your favorite Kodansha titles every day. With K MANGA, you can immerse yourself in renowned titles such as 'Attack on Titan', 'Ghost in the Shell', 'Fairy Tail', 'Hajime no Ippo: The Fighting Spirits', 'Tokyo Revengers', and many more.

Enjoy reading popular manga, ongoing series available simultaneously in Japan and the US, or explore new original series on K MANGA right from your phone or tablet. Dive into a new story whenever you like. Show your support for your favorite authors by reading the titles through official releases.

Why K MANGA?

- Access to a vast collection of over 500 titles from Kodansha‚Äôs Manga Catalog
- More than 60 original manga series available the moment they are published in Japan
- Discover fresh stories from your favorite titles, original series, and continuously added new titles
- Read a new chapter for free every day
- Encompasses a wide range of genres from Action, Romance, Sports, Isekai, Suspense, Drama, Fantasy, and more
- Official service that supports your favorite authors


Explore Famous Kodansha Manga:
- 'Attack on Titan'
- 'Ghost in the Shell'
- 'Fairy Tail'
- 'Hajime no Ippo: The Fighting Spirits'
- 'Tokyo Revengers'
- 'Initial D'


Discover K MANGA Original Series Simulpubbed with Japan:
- 'Don‚Äôt Toy With Me, Miss Nagatoro'
- 'The Fragrant Flower Blooms with Dignity'
- 'WIND BREAKER'
- 'As a Reincarnated Aristocrat, I‚Äôll Use My Appraisal Skill to Rise in the World'
- 'Alya Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian'


Explore a diverse array of genres including Action, Romance, Sports, Isekai, Suspense, Outlaws, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Shojo, and more.


If you're a fan of K MANGA or curious about our latest titles, follow us on X: [https://twitter.com/KMANGA_KODANSHA] - Stay updated on our releases and exciting news!
