scraped_reviews.content: More professional than "CA" I had been using, but the "advanced" version is too busy and difficult to navigate, while the "lite" version is missing the trade options that "advanced" has as well as the very cool "bid/ask" sub chart. I also had a stock halt auto-cancel my bid, only for it to auto-reinstate the bid at that same price as the stock was crashing. That would have been devastating if I had lost a larger amount of $, so I'm undecided about moving the rest of my portfolio here
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Jimi. Thank you for your review. I will forward your feedback about the advanced and lite versions to our product management team and work towards improvement. For questions about specific trades in your account, please drop us a line through our in-app Help Center or support@webull.com for assistance.

scraped_reviews.content: Too bad other platforms are not as easy to understand options like this one is. I absolutely love the charting system they use! The only dispute I have is that there are no alerts able to be made on the "horizontal" and "ray" lines in the tool menu. If I were able to have alerts on the lines I drew, I would have my charts looking even cleaner!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Paul. Thank you for your review. I will pass your suggestion on to our product team for consideration and to explore the possibility of adding this feature in the future. Thank you for your suggestion!

scraped_reviews.content: The lie is that you don't take a commission. I can prove you take $0.01 per EVERY executed trade. That's a commission. I did contact your support 3 weeks ago, no one addressed this issue. They just skipped over it and moved onto the next problem. Nope regulatory fees don't amount to anywhere near that per transaction, I checked. And now not only is the app lagging a lot but also I contacted support about all these issues, no response so far.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We apologize for the delayed customer response. We understand the importance of prompt customer service and are actively working to improve response times. For a detailed check on the lag issue, please continue to contact us via the in-app Help Center or support@webull.com. We'll address your question as quickly as possible. Have a nice day.

scraped_reviews.content: The default view when the app opens is crypto and I cannot find a way to change this. I was happy with crypto being in a separate app. I have no use for crypto being the default. This app is currently garbage every moment I see CRYPTO when I open it. You added it back, neat. I do not need it in my face, too, the crypto ads are more than enough. Also, Webull still randomly pulls up the google play store to webull showing it as installed when I am navigating through the app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Cory, thank you for your review. You can adjust the visibility and ranking of your watchlists by tapping the top-left icon on the Watchlists tab, then selecting "Manage List" at the bottom left. For the other feedback, please reach out to us through the Help Center or email us at support@webull.com. We‚Äôd be happy to assist.

scraped_reviews.content: THE BEST TRADING APP but please improve: 1) Add a LOCK button for drawing tools so the trandlines can't be moved by accident, happens all the time. Moomoo has that implemented already, so it can be done easily. 2) Add a FAVORITE POSTS list within the Feeds so we can save posts we find helpful and get to them later. 3) Webull points collected with posting in feeds have no value at all, make them tradable for cash or stocks. All of these could be done in one update. Thank you!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for reviewing our app and for giving us some great suggestions for future versions of our App! We have noted down your comment and will work to implement your suggestion in our future update. Have a nice day!

scraped_reviews.content: Overall a very informative app with nice comment functionality and news for various stocks. More robust than Robinhood. However, their support is TERRIBLE. I tried transferring shares into the app and it failed, but with no information as to why it failed. After two weeks of sending messages to WeBull support (both in the app and via email), no one has responded except to tell me to send a message in the app, which I've already done. I do not recommend because their support is non-existent.

This new webull app is absolutely horrible. I used to love this platform, but not now. Obviously someone who doesn't day trade updated this app. It is incredibly difficult to follow, and I requested to go back to the old version, but is not allowed. I have sent them 7 different messages showing them examples of how things are so different. A few examples will be, you cannot follow the price action from the day before, when you're trading options, it's difficult. Very very frustrating

What haven't liked about it so far is: deposits take forever to settle, partial stocks are unavailable (or atleast I haven't found them easily), the UI is complicated, and you must wait for money to settle to buy crypto (which takes about 2 weeks it seems). There are a few things I do like though: they are constantly running promos for free stocks, there are a lot of advanced features for those who are knowledgeable, and they do Roth IRAs. Overall, there are better easier trading apps.

All things considered, I like this app. However, it can be very misleading which has bit me a few times. Example 1) I placed a limit buy on a security that was still in a "closed" state. I expected it to either reject the order or queue up my order for when the security opened for pre-market trading. Not only did it take my order, but it executed at the limit price which was well above the last close.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, thank you for trying out our app. The order might has been filled in other exchange other than Nasdaq, and it would not show on the the app when you only have the advanced quotes of Nasdaq Totalview in your account. If you have any additional questions, please feel free to contact us via the Help Center. Thank you and have a good day.

scraped_reviews.content: Wow. Webull lures you in with a nice-looking app and free stocks and then really drops the ball when it comes tax time. No forms available until mid-February and they marked my brokerage 1099 as having incorrect information. No problem, let me see what went wrong... Oh oops. You have to request the document, sign out, wait 10 minutes, then come back and maybe they'll give it to you then. Incredibly poor experience. So glad I transferred everything to TD Ameritrade.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we are sorry to learn that you are not satisfied with our service. Most of the 1099 forms should be ready on our site www.webull.com/edocs. We'll re-issue the form if you find any discrepancies about the information or the content. You can reach out to us at any time via the Help Center or email us at customerservice@webull.com.

scraped_reviews.content: Setting up an account is easy. Transferring money from your bank is easy. Trying to get your money back requires jumping through hoops, calling customer service, waiting 5 business days while they casually get around to verifying the bank documents (statement and letter from the bank) they required before they would allow withdrawls. I cannot recommend this platform, as they clearly are intent on making it difficult to get your money back out once you've put it in. Beware.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi James, I appreciate you making us aware of your negative experience of withdrawing your funds. Whenever you link 2 bank accounts to your Webull account, or your funds came from different sources, it triggers an automatic AML (Anti Money Laundry) flag. In this case, we're required to review your information to allow the withdrawal. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: This was a good trading platform. Some found it complex, but that's what I liked. Lots of info available for you. Worth learning how to use...if you don't mind relearning it every few months. Webull tech team. Please go easy in the updates! Bug fixes and occasional useful additions are welcomed. Changing the format and moving important resources every couple of months isn't. I still haven't finished finding features that you moved the location of 2 updates ago! Now there's another?! I'm scared..

I just really can't stand using this new version of Webull. It is really inconvenient to use. Here are the lists. 1. Screener tab is gone on main market. It's hidden somewhere at more tab and when you want to use it. It's unfriendly user now. No listing names on the side, when you click on one stock. You have to go back and forth on the tab. 2. On main market tab, it usually had listing stock names on the side, when you click to see stock chart. Now you have to go back and forth all the time.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for sharing your thoughts about our new update. I will forward your words about the changes in the Market tab to the right team. Have a nice day.

scraped_reviews.content: Out of the half dozen or so apps that I've been trying for the last approximately 6 months this one ranks in the middle. Decent interface, with a lot of information. My biggest complaints would be the poor customer service, and VERY slow transaction time compared to others. For example if you're trying to make a deposit to capitalize on a purchase FORGET IT! Instantaneous almost on several other platforms! (Fix these issues and I'll raise my rating)

There's always an issue lately with Webull. First it's now impossible to reach customer support. They've removed access and replaced it with FAQ. This is a major problem. They also finally caught up with Robinhood doing instant deposits and withdrawals only it's doesn't work. It's impossible to link a debit card without getting an error message saying your phone number is in the wrong format. Of course it's not and it's been broken for 2 months. No way to get a hold of any support to fix it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, thank you for leaving this comment. If you find the FAQ you read does not answer your question, please click on Contact Webull Support at the bottom of the article to get in touch with one of our reps. You can also email us directly at support@webull.us. Have a great day.

scraped_reviews.content: Untrustworthy company. For weeks they ignored communication attempts. One response a month ago tells me they would get around to me. Two months ago I had some difficulty getting set up. Got it all working and now Webull is not upholding their end of the deal. I fulfilled the requirements for the promotion (twice) and help center refuses to give the stock. Menu shows no acknowledgement of my free stocks. All funds are settled for at least 30 days. Took weeks to close my account. Good riddance.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Jawn. Have you tried visiting MENU- MY FREE STOCK- GET ? If you still can‚Äôt claim your free stock, please contact us via the HELP CENTER and one of our support agents will be more than happy to assist you.

scraped_reviews.content: Every time the app opens, there is a pop-up for up sales or promotions, and transferring money in takes over a week to complete. To withdraw money more than 5k, requires verification, even i sent in everything and still got denied. Tried 4 times, finally got the money, it took over a week. Their excuse is security concerns, yeh right, its a simple withdraw from webull back to my personal checking that is the same account i use to deposit money to them. I don't trust them with my money.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your review. Marketing notifications can be disabled on the app: Menu page - Settings - Message Settings. If you still have difficulty withdrawing, please log in to our app and send us a message via the in-app Help Center so we can further assist.

scraped_reviews.content: The absolute worst trading app in the playstore. Not user friendly. Robinhood is 100x better. I only signed up to get the free stock. If I would have known how terrible their application was and how hard it is just to find something as simple as an account balance, I would have never signed up. Deleting and never using again.

To many permissions asked if us. Transferring or cashing out all 4 of my accounts. The Paine is great. The costumer service if wonderful and quick to fix any issues, but the things they want us to agree on in the permissions is unfathomable. Sorry webull, i have to bow out of your platform. Good luck, and thank you ti costumer service ppl, they've done a great job.

Not really for daytraders. Overly complicated and takes 5 business days to transfer money over.. unless you want to wire it. That means if you find a stock at a good price, and your webull wallet is empty, you better hope it stays that price 5 days later when you can actually purchase it. Also, it took three months to get the proper micro transactions from webull to link my bank account. It would be nice to do fractional shares too. All in all this app looks nice but that's about it.

Piss poor customer support. Hands down. The app is pretty good, better than Robinhood, but when a trading app won't display the stock info, don't argue with me and tell me I could have bought or sold without pricing info. Anyone willing to do that is an idiot, and so was that support tech for suggesting it. One of many little things.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Jerod. I'm sorry to hear that your experience with our customer service is less than satisfying. If you can elaborate as to how we can do better, we‚Äôd love to hear from you via the Help Center. Thank you and have a nice day.

scraped_reviews.content: This company is own by Chinese, your personal data is now being sold over sea. Customer service is super slow, no phone calls, only message from the app. Transfer money takes 2 weeks sometimes, but money is taken out from my bank the next day, but doesn't show up in webull until 10 business days. And every time I open the app there is always a pop-up ad, why?????

The April 2023 ruined what was a perfect app. No more ability to quickly pull down data like yield, ex dividend date, previous closing price, average daily volume, etc. Even the font adjustment no longer works all is displayed at the smallest font size with more blank space on the screen than the the data. Just awful and no way to go back to what in my opinion was the perfect trading app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, thank you for sharing your thoughts of our latest update. I will forward them to the right team for improvement. If there is any other critiques or suggestions, you can also send them directly via our in-app Help Center. Have a nice day.

scraped_reviews.content: Visually, I love this platform. As I was a budding trader, it seemed like the most powerful application around and arguably, it still might be. But now that I'm beyond the beginner stage, I'd like to be able to do more with the platform. It's downright frustrating to see all three tabs(buy/sell/short) knowing that not every stock has the short tab on it, click it wait for a setup, only to find out there are no shares available. An updated Level 2 showing more exchanges would be appreciated.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Jeffery, thank you for reviewing us. The amount of shares can be borrowed is dynamic. Experience that you described some times could happen on highly traded stocks. As for the level 2 quotes, it is a premium data feed powered by Nasdaq TotalView and provides bid and asks from all listed stocks on Nasdaq Market Center.

scraped_reviews.content: Probably great for stocks, but it took a week to deposit funds for use in crypto. I still can't buy 2 days after funds were fully taken out of my bank account. It still says "in transit" in the app. I'll probably not buy any crypto on Webull at this point and just wait another week to get my money back. It's my fault for not reading the finer print, but other apps allow instant access to funds for all trades. If that changes, I would retry and adjust my rating accordingly.

It's a little bit of a learning curve with this one, but am slowly getting it. The only thing i don't like is how long it takes for your funds to be recorded as received in the App. Even after they pull them out from your bank account, the App shows them as "in transit" they say 2-5 business days buts it's been over 10 days now. My account has not yet received the funds i sent. In short, the direct deposit system is very slow. You should work on that.

The app itself is decent, but the customer service is atrocious. None of their "promotions" seem to work. My friend referred me and neither of us received our "free stocks". When I contacted customer support they were unhelpful and seemed to barely be able to write coherently. Hesitant to add more money cause of how unhelpful staff are if something goes wrong.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, I'm sorry to know that you feel this way about our referral promotion and customer service. To check invitees' status, you may visit Menu - My Free Stock - Invitation Bonus - My Invites. Invite relationship will be created when the invitees use your link to sign up, open an account and make the first deposit of $100.

scraped_reviews.content: The app is very complex for new investors. The customer service is TERRIBLE. I help a frien open an account to receive free stock like they advertise. We made deposits twice and got nothing. I messaged for help, but after 48 hours of no response from them, the case gets closed. You have to submit another. I have sent 3 messages about this issue but it always gets closed without a response. Closing a case because they failed to get to it is bad business. It shows me they dont want to help clients

I absolutely LOVE the level of data you get when compared to Robinhood, but the lack of international market trades really bothers me. Customer Service also never gets back to you. I've messaged them multiple times and the only response I ever get is their bot telling me "somebody will be with you shortly". On the flip side, they offer even more investment avenues like IRA's, etc. All-in-all, I'm on the fence as to whether or not this one is as good as Robinhood...

New update sucks please go back. This is less efficient, not as easy to see all information. I do not want to scroll left and right and go everywhere to find what used to be easily available. Please go back to previous version. Please webull do not try to be like robinhood, I chose you guys because your professional and descriptive look. I do not want a cartoon look and I don't want an app that makes it look like it's made for a 10 year old. Go back to what it was.

The app is decent but some features fail to work. I set price alerts for several stocks but none of them got triggered even though at least one break through the set alert price. I would not rely on this app to watch my stocks. Adding stocks to a Watchlist is cumbersome and unintuitive. It asks you to do it twice. When ur inside your Watchlist, you click '+Add symbol', enter ticker, click on the company and it brings up an option asking you which Watchlist you want to add it to. Illogical.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, thank you for your constructive feedback. I have forwarded it to our developers. Thank you for helping us to make our app better. If you have any other requests or feedback, please don't hesitate to contact us via the Help Center. We'd love to hear from you. Thank you and have a great day!

scraped_reviews.content: Both the phone app and the desktop site is not user friendly. I wish there was a graph that showed the value of all my equities on the front page. They also give way too much information when you click on a stock/etf. I wish a page for a stock/etf only showed a graph (with the option to change time frames) and the ability to buy and sell. The other information is good but I wish it was on a separate page that you have to click a button to reach.

Like everyone else, I had problems with my bank account. I was linked and made several trades and deposits/withdrawals with no problem. Then, out of the blue, with absolutely no rhyme or reason, when I tried to made a deposit I got an error message saying my bank infringed changed. Only it had not changed. Not one iota. They wanted me to go through the whole micro deposit thing again and I told them no that they could keep their app and would use another platform.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, thank you for your feedback. The usually occurs when the bank degraded network connection with Plaid, and you might experience issues using ACH. Please link your bank account via micro-deposit verification.¬†We apologize for the inconvenience might have caused and thank you for your understanding. Have a good day!

scraped_reviews.content: So far it's not better than robinhood. Its pretty much more of the same. Rules, rules, rules. Fine print everywhere. I'm trying to buy crypto and it never allows me because of something in the fine print. That's fine I just go to PayPal and coinbase and instantly make the transaction. I'm fine paying the fees because I know I'm locking in the price per token I need at that moment in time. At least I know what I'm getting instead of being manipulated and yanked around all day.

User Interface is so Annoying. I would like to just be able to hit a single button and search tickers while in the trading interface. Once there, I would like to be able to easily bring up the options chain. And then, once there, I would like to easily view all available options. But there's tons of scrolling involved, making it pretty annoying to compare options/tickers. Edit: 1 year later and it's still just as bad. Worse, even, because your charts don't display anymore. Crazy.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Sean, I understand that a streamlined experience is important for our customers. I will bring up this topic in our next meeting with the product management team. For further comments or suggestions, you can email us directly at cs@webull.com.

scraped_reviews.content: Very confusing interface. Slow process for deposit(4 days after withdrawl from bank account before the fund is available for trading), even worse, you cannot do it from the website, only the mobile app, and every time you need to add money, you have to repeat the annoying validation process, as the system seems not able to remember anything. It is said to be a margin account but does not have any margin buying power, i.e. The buying power is limited to tbe cash balance.

Good start, but too limited. They have added options spreads, but the spreads are not customizable beyond width. Glad they added the ability to set stop loss and limit sale price at the same time. Still can't use a long dated call as collateral for selling short dated call at higher strike. Also, it would be nice to have spending power shown for reference while placing an order. The account value chart doesn't have any numbers to reference and a fraction of a percent can look like a huge move.

With how much money you guys pull in off of customers, there's absolutely no reason to f##k us with horrible UI/UX.. The prior version was a million times better in every single possible way. Whoever got paid to update this software last, shouldn't have a job anymore.. I could do better. I've taken all my money out and uninstalled, as have all 30+ people I've referred over the years. We will not be coming back. We will launch a competing app and take you out of the running. Won't be hard.

I actually have to search to find my positions and need to figure out how to buy and sell. It may become wasy for people who have designed it or who put in the time to learn it. But i dont have that desire, i want to open ap, choose company, make trade, shares, or options. This interface is not user friendly. Give us a simple landing page with the option to dive deeper into all the other unnecessary filler that is currently in the way.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Jim, with one click at the Webull logo in the middle of the navigation bar, you can see your position. To quickly jump to stocks you are interested in, you can add them to a watchlist. The next time you open the app, you will see them right away. We also have a quick trade mode and LITE mode. For further inquiries, please find us at Help Center.

scraped_reviews.content: Good charts. Can set bracket orders. But can't set a stop loss order that's higher than the market price. For example if it's 8pm and a stock has gone up after hours, can't set a stop loss order at the after hours price (to execute the next day), have to set it under the market close price. other brokers allow this.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Jay, thank you for your review. Unfortunately, it is impossible to know the context you were in or access account information here. For specific help with your account, please contact us via the in-app Help Center or support@webull.com. Have a great day.

scraped_reviews.content: The new update is incredibly disappointing. We've been given an extremely ineffective and inefficient layout. The market page WHICH WE ALL LOVE...traded for "feeds" ... I'm not sure why we even need this, this app is meant for trading not socializing. Many many many people are irritated. We need this fixed. The font is too large for the charts ... Causing the secondary indicator to not show no matter how you adjust the chart size. I don't need a 1/4 of my screen showing the stock price.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, thank you for taking the time to review us. Your feedback has been passed onto the right team for improvement. Please allow some time for these to happen. Thank you for you for your patience during this time.

scraped_reviews.content: I never had any problems with Webull until now! My Bank transfers sometimes are rejected saying that I don't have sufficient funds, which I know how much money I have, and how much to transfer to Webull. Also for two days in a row I purchased stocks and the order was never filled, and it was cancelled after the market was closed. Customer service doesn't really care to fix the matter of me loosing the opportunity to buy the stocks at the price that I wanted, and at the right time.

I've had Etrade, Td, Fidelity, OptionsHouse, Robinhood and so far Webull it's been the best by far. It's almost everything a trader need in just one app. ** The new version is horrible. I have less of the things I liked and a bunch of widgets that I don't care about. Please fix this mess, it's complicating my trading. **Okay, this is absolutely ridiculous. How you go from a state of the art trading app to a complete useless tool? Not one of the changes has favored my trading, not even a bit

The problem is, trades don't process when they should, orders are cancelled without notice, orders don't fill when they're supposed to. The market manipulation is overwhelming, but it's to be expected I guess. When you send message as to why order doesn't process when a stock is running is. Sorry for your loss. Please resubmit order, and we will try to not let it happen again. Or send screen shot of it happening, but nothing is ever corrected. Just have to try again.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Steven, thank you for trying out our app. I am sorry it did not fit your brokerage needs. We very much welcome your criticism and would just like you to elaborate as to how we can do better. Please reach out through Help Center or email at CS@webull.com. We look forward to hearing from you!

scraped_reviews.content: DON'T DOWNLOAD THIS APP. This is one of the most confusing stock apps I've ever seen! It takes almost a month for your money to be deposited back into your bank account. I've tried to close it down and remove my bank information from it but it continuously tells me that I have pending orders so I cannot delete my account. And don't try to get ahold of anybody on their team. You're just going to get an automate response.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, depending on the method you use to make a deposit, it may take up to 5 days for your funds to settle. Regardless, we do provide you with provisional buying power. You can start trading instantly. Please let us know via the HELP CENTER if you have any other questions.

scraped_reviews.content: Warning: Do not use this service unless you want to lose your money. You may not be able to withdraw it. Especially if you change banks, as they only allow withdrawal to the account that made the deposit. Stupid restrictions like this makes it hard for you to get to your money, so they get to keep it. They give you free stocks when you open the account then it just disappears. ... What a scam

First time I was able to open an account but I tried and tried to make my first deposit but never could I tried the two available options, micro deposits and Real time verification but both failed every time. I waited two or three days but always the same error. Then I opted for opening a new account BUT NOW I can't sign up because verification codes never arrived And when I try again it says that the codes can't be send too often...what?? I never got them! And 5 minutes later boom got them all!

I'm new to stocks. I started with Robinhood and was happy with it. I seen a lot of ads on YouTube about this company and decided to give it a try during the 2 free stocks holiday promo. From signing up it was very difficult. They ask for way more info than Robinhood. It's rather scary how much personal info they ask for. More than a bank or credit card application. It took forever to receive the 2 free stocks. The app is incredibly hard to use and not new people friendly. Stay away.

I typically do not review apps, but the danger of this one needs to be stated. Their inability to correctly update after a dividend payment has (so far) costs me thousands of dollars. They have similar issues updating price basis after stock splits, but that is only a cosmetic issue, whereas their inability to correct options strike prices has essentially locked my account. I have checked multiple other apps and they have updated strike prices correctly, please use any other app for safety.

Great app with wonderfully detailed information that I need as a trader, but every time I try to link my bank account, it says there is an error and the password is incorrect. I can assure you I input the correct information, as I did it immediately on my bank all and it opened up. Then it locks me out after a few tries. When it doesn't do that, I get an app error when it tries to load. Unfortunate that I can invest my money. I guess I'll keep using Robinhood.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Brodie, we apologize for what happened on your bank account linking. Please try to unlink and re-link the bank account through micro-deposit verification. We will forward your comments to our developers. Please contact us via the Help Center if you need any help. Thank you and have a good day.

title: JW Library
description:
The JW Library app* is designed to enhance your Bible reading and deepen your personal study. Download Bible-based publications, videos, and audio programs to access your content anytime, anywhere.

Multiple Bible Translations
‚Ä¢ Read God‚Äôs Word and compare verses from various Bible translations available in hundreds of languages.

Library of Publications
‚Ä¢ Download books, brochures, and articles in over 1,000 languages, including more than 100 sign languages.

Videos and Audio Programs
‚Ä¢ Enjoy a variety of programs, including videos on Bible teachings, Bible talks, feature dramas, and animated series.

Music
‚Ä¢ Listen to a variety of original compositions, including vocal, orchestral, and instrumental recordings.

Daily Text
‚Ä¢ Start your day with a Bible verse and comments containing positive, upbuilding thoughts.

Meetings
‚Ä¢ Access material for both midweek and weekend meetings in one location.

Search
‚Ä¢ Find specific Bible verses, content, and topics.

Personal Study
‚Ä¢ Highlight text, add personal notes, and categorize with tags.

Playlists
‚Ä¢ Create and organize playlists of music, videos, audio programs, and pictures.

* JW Library is an official app produced by Jehovah‚Äôs Witnesses.

scraped_reviews.content: When I'm pre studying for the meeting it will not let me highlight very well. You have to press the line a bunch of times and it drives me nuts. Also there is only 10 bookmarks which is not enough to bookmark scriptures and things for the ministry, please can you make it so bookmarks are indefinite. It also doesn't sink properly to all your devices. When you're playing videos or audio and you turn off your phone it won't let you play them. You have to restart again.

Love the app. It's an amazing tool! But I have some suggestions... Love that there is a dark mode but the highlight colors are washed out and dark. They look terrible. Would be nice to increase the saturation so they are more bright and vivid. I know some of the older friends may not like that so a slider in the settings to adjust the brightness would be ideal. It would also be very nice if I could sync my notes from Google Drive to the app.

I really love this app. The brothers do a great job on it. I did notice recently that it is very difficult to highlight without the whole page moving so it is making it harder while studying. I'm not sure what happened because this was not always the case. Maybe it is due to a phone update on my samsung phone causing this problem but I would like to know if anything can be done on your end if it's not a phone issue.

Great app. Use it every day. Thank you for this wonderful study app. And thank you for all the effort and hard work that is obviously been put into it.‚ù§Ô∏è Is there a way to be able to highlight specific words in the comment boxes as well? Also, it would be great if I could underline words/ sentences in the paragraphs instead of color coding everything.

Lowered my rating because there's an issue with highlighting: as I move my pen or finger to highlight, the entire page moves along, so I remain on the same word. Also, it is not always possible to select a highlighted phrase to delete it. At times, touching a highlighted portion does not bring up a menu, and nothing can be done with it. Samsung S6 tablet, Android 12

Still waiting for the elusive cloud syncing (or at least a login, possibly tied to hub, that allows for data to be synced through there and then just need to log on to the app on each device)...additionally, it would be great to have a search bar (possibly with the transcript indexed in searching) that allows for searching for a specific program. Of course, the content will always be great so that would be a perpetual 5 stars :)

All is fantastic! I love the new feature where I can see my highlighted scriptures in the side panel. It's great for helping my eyes stay focused and jog my memory, without losing my place. It's awesome for keeping main points together üòÑ. I'm having one recent issue though, the same as Miguel Abad. On my laptop, I can be typing or speech texting, and without touching anything, my cursor jumps to the bottom of the note and puts text there instead. Thanks so much for your hard work on the app! üòä

Not to complain, but to help fix bugs in the system - I downloaded broadcasts so I wouldn't have to stream them. However, whenever I try to play the downloads, the whole app crashes. And it's not just the broadcasts. On my phone - Original songs work fine, but on my wife's phone, they don't unless they're on a separate Playlist. So, we know you are working hard to fix these kinds of things, just wanted to make you aware. Thank you so much brothers and sisters.

BEST APP EVER!!!! I truly love the app and thank Jehovah for it. I do have an issue with it tho and it might be related to an update but I am not sure. After opening the app it is very slow. When I click on different things like meetings etc. it just becomes very slow topen, and the Bible is the thing most affected. I click on the book, then the chapter, then the verse and by the time it loads the scripture has already been read. What could cause thus and is there anything I can do about it?

The app gets better & better. However, I have not been able to sync across devices automatically. I have been annotating on my PC jwlibrary app & saved a backup but when uploading it to my mobile device it says it can't download the file. I tried reinstalling it & it won't sync. I have now lost all my notes on my mobile device. They're only saved on my PC (an older version of the app).

An invaluable tool that works well for the most part. However when you highlight text it sometimes refuses to highlight the last word. You have to tap the paragraph twice, then the remainder of the highlighting shows up. Occasionally it won't highlight at all and you have to reopen the app. If you try to download multiple publications in a row, it queues them up and downloads them in order. However, it often fails to download some of them and you have to retry or reopen the app.

having JW Library on hand is very useful, you have all the scriptures and literature and stuff all on one app and it's very easy to use, really like having all the JW videos on hand toüòÅüòÅ [It is still great, but I've come across something.... I think its from having too many publications downloaded, now it won't open. This happened to my tablet and I had to wipe the data for it to work, I really don't want to do that for my phone....üòì]

App won't re-install. When I updated the study Bible, the app deleted the Bible and when I tried to reload the Bible the app kept crashing and stopped working. so I deleted the app entirely and am now trying to reload it, but, I get a message that my device will not support JW Library. I don't understand what happened. Maybe you can give me some suggestions, thank you! I cannot be without JW app even if I have to buy another tablet to have it. It is just too valuable!

I love the app. It's a perfect tool for learning and teaching truths from the Bible. With access to various Bible translations and the many publications, videos, and audio files available free of charge, this app is able to help make Bible truths easy to find and understand. Be sure to download at least one version of the Bible in order to use and make the most of the magazines, pamphlets, books and other publications you will likely want to download. What you download will be available offline.

Love it. sometimes when you d.l it. it takes a long while to show all publications and the rest of the tools here on the app. I don't have the research guide(spiritual gems) on my android. I can't go to a scripture and have other information to look up because it doesn't show up. Been trying to get them but I can't get them even with uninstalling it and downloading it again.

I love all content but wish an anchor could be dropped for watching videos. In other words, if I'm in one series of videos, when I finish a video it scrolls all the way to the beginning of all the videos. If it cant go back to where I left off at least highlight the ones I watched so I can scroll to the part I haven't watched yet. For example, in the media I can go to 'Programs and Events.' I can watch the morning worship and I'm on the 30th one but then it goes to the beginning of the list.

Love this app! It makes personal study so easy, especially when on the move or at work. Everything is condensed in to one little tablet üòä some things I would love to see in the future is more highlighting colors, and more bookmarks!!! Especially for the Bible, being limited to 10 has me constantly deleting/replacing when I find a new scripture I want to remember later. More bookmarks would be amazing üòäüòäüòä

I love this app and am so thankful for it. I was hoping for additional highlighting colors, and now they're are 2 more! Now I would love to see us be able to sign into an account so that our notes, highlighting, etc can be saved and used in multiple devices. I recently had to replace my phone and all of my hard work towards my personal study notes are now gone.

I have had the opportunity to use this app on many different devices (Amazon, Apple, & Samsung) & overall it's a great Bible teaching tool. There are some devices that have more trouble than others with it & FYI: Samsung Galaxy Tab E Lite has very little to almost nothing in the app in the way of publications, tracts, & media. So, I sold both those tablets. Always, before getting a new device, talk to someone who has it & ask how the app works on it. Otherwise, personally, I love this app.

We truly appreciate all the work that goes into this wonderful tool. However the app consistently crashes when pressing SHUFFLE on Programs and Events. I just got a brand new phone (android) and the same problem happens. I've uninstalled and reinstalled many times, with and without restoring a backup. Hopefully this helps with locating a bug that may be in this version. Thank you so much brothers

Ever since the last major update, the app is really buggy. The app has been freezing so many times, it's really awful. It's incredibly difficult to get anything done. I'll be on the app for maybe 5 minutes, and it will start to freeze. If i scroll, it takes a really long time to register, and sometimes it will highlight a huge section of text, like it registers a press and drag instead of me simply swiping. It's just really frustrating to use. I have to close the app and reopen it several times

It is an awesome app. I have all I need for meetings in one place. A few bugs that need work on would be....to make it easier to highlight text without having page move left or right. Being able to highlighting references & scriptures. Adding a feature where we can add notes to any place in the publication. Just a few suggestions. Thank you for your hard work!!!

The app is excellent! There's an issue when it comes to backup. I do my study and notes on the PC (Windows 10 Pro) and transfer to my tablet for the meeting. When hitting restore, receive an error message that it can't be applied. If I create a backup from the tablet to PC, it's successful. PC to tablet or phone, error message. Is there a solution?

Absolutely LOVE the app. I use it all the time. I love the I have my Bible available all any moment when needed, and I love being able to listen to all the music. Thank you, brothers, for all the hard work you do. The only issue I have is my phone keeps wanting to put the app into deep sleep because of frequent crashes, and it says it draining the battery faster. Idk if there is a way to fix that? Thanks again! Agape love to u all ‚ù§Ô∏è

Now that we have 1) instant access to many of the 20th century publications, 2) the article series, and 3) the new Life Forever book with its unique format intact, the only way this app could be any better is if there were an option for making playlists, so I could group video or audio files from different categories/languages together to listen to at once. Otherwise, perfection. The brothers never disappoint!

I really love the app, especially the music!!! But since the new "play all" buttons arrived, when the song goes from one to the next, the next song is very shaky and doesn't play smoothly. I have an Android Samsung phone, newer model. I look forward to being able to listen to many songs again without having to play each song to get it to play smoothly. Thank you for all you provide for us!!! Christian love.

Good morning brothers, thank you for all your hard work. We appreciate it more than words can express. üôè Please help fix one issue, with the recent update. When I'm playing a song and receive a call, the media player shuts down and it will not continue playing after the call ends. But in the notification bar, it shows a song with an ongoing counter, no music is heard and the button functions in the notification bar, do not work. Please fix. Thank you again. -Latest Samsung model S22 (android)

I was having a problem with the songs "skipping" and needing to skip the song to get the next one to be clear. Thankfully, that got fixed! (At least on my car radio) my only wish was that the songs were all at the same volume. It seems the older original songs are so much quieter than the newer songs. If an equalization could happen, that would be so lovely. Thank you so much friends!

Love the app especially the ability to make notes and be able to make a tag to find the note much easier. But I do miss the scrolling feature that the app once had of the Bible books with the Bible portion. Being able to scroll side to side at the top to get to a Bible book, made getting to scriptures faster and easier. Hope it can be brought back. Other than, LOVE LOVE THE APP!!

Updates keep making this app better and better. I really wish you could have the ability of having two languages displayed side by side. We can get that with the Bible in the side bar; but that is not the case for publications such as the watchtower study or book study. It only flips back and forth. As someone who is working towards transitioning from Spanish to french, I would love to be able to see both magazines/ paragraphs at the same time and hop from one to the other to highlight.

It's a great app! Everything works perfectly except for one thing. When I am driving, sometimes I want to listen to new videos or videos for the next meeting. However, when I have my phone connected to my car through Android Auto, the videos play with no sound. I have to disconnect my phone to have it play through Bluetooth instead. This isn't a huge problem in the slightest though. Thank you for your hard work!

Absolutely amazing! Although, I would appreciate it even more if the option to go back home or other options were available when reading a scripture. I tend to find myself clicking the back button several times to get back to the list of bible books. During a talk it's kinda difficult to keep up with the speaker after looking at one scripture then asked to look up another scripture in another book. More times than not, by the time I get to the next one it has been read already or half way read.

Plusses... Easy to navigate with multiple language options. I like the new banner of instant news. You can choose download size to save space. Downloaded items can easily be deleted if you no longer need them. App never fails to load and has very few bugs. Negatives.... The note feature is a bit frustrating because the article returns to the top of the page when writing the note. Also would like the option to open two apps side by side to read in two languages or compare articles when studying

I love this app. Talk about getting it right the first time. Very easy to navigate... And now highlight text. Only two things left to add notes and change fonts üòÅ. Loving these original songs!! ü§óüé∂üé∂üé∂ A sharing feature would be awseome. Share a scripture, a song (that links back to app or site), a highlighted part in publication or notes.

It is so great how much information is put in this app! Sometimes the App closes automatically while I am listening to music or reading though. A little bothersome especially when I have clicked on several links and cannot remember how to get back to the article I was reading. Other than that, great App! You guys are working so hard to bring this information to the 'tips of our fingers' - we really appreciate it.

The app is easy to use. Now that it has a note making option, it is even better. The notes can be backed up in the cloud. I did notice that if you down load notes from one device to another it replaces all the notes, does not add them to what may be there already. Since I know nothing about programming I do not know if or how this might be changed. Also since the notes are saved, are all the highlights saved as well? The programmers have done well. I am sure in due time, it will be even better than it is now. After all copper to silver and silver to gold. üòä‚ò∫

Love love love this app! Thank you for all your hard work in developing and updating it. Sometimes my audio has issues. If I download a couple songs, it won't let me stream the other songs in that category i.e. Sing Out Joyfully. So I either have to have all of the songs downloaded, or none of them and stream over wifi. Also, could just be my phone?

love all the essential study material on this wonderful app. However, upon startup on myChromebook, the app will often not open, instead, even though Ive cleared out all other open apps on my Chromebook, it gives me a "Wait" or "Close App". I'm trying to figure out why that's happening from my end. This is just FYI in case it may help.

I love everything about the app. The brothers always keep us so up to date. Even our older friends are getting familiar. I am having a problem with downloading publications, similar to what some have mentioned. I am a le to download some smaller publications (magazines, some tracts, some brochures). However, when I have tried to download some books, the app will not download. The cloud icon will go around as it trying to download, but then come back that the publication was not downloaded.

I love the app. I use it every day from the daily text o my Bible reading. It is very handy to show people scriptures and videos when out in the ministry. It would be wonderful if there were more highlighting options such as additional colors and underlining. It would also be nice to be able to see the highlights across multiple devices. I have left my tablet at home but have my phone. However, I did my lesson on the tablet. Thanks for an awesome app.

It is wonderful. Great for the ministry, meetings and personal study. All praise to Jehovah for such a tool. * Lately, the app won't open publication's I've already downloaded or if it does it's after a long wait. **7/17/19 App still crashingwhen I try to play audio media. I've sent feedback several times. Bros & Sis, please find a way to fix. Thank you for your hard work.

Although I am very thankful for the vast amount of information contained in the app, one problem still persists: my device insists on using it as the default app to open all mp3 files. (?!). Since the app obviously wasn't designed to be an mp3 player, it briefly opens and crashes every time I want to listen to something. There seems to be nothing in the settings to change it. Even when I select "open file with..." It still tries opening JW Library, then crashes. Unchangeable default.

I truly appreciate this app although I would love to be able to have a log in that maybe connects to my email so I don't lose all my notes and information if I move to a new device. I've recently lost three years worth of notes and talks and it's pretty disheartening to open the app and not having the many things I've saved there.

This app is the best with multiple languages, Bible's, lots of videos and literature to help with Bible Study. A friend in Canada, and myself, in USA, read Bible reading together, but both have been experiencing issues with listening to the Bible being read in English. Sometimes it restart at the beginning of a chapter when you are half way through the chapter. Sometimes it won't start at a selected verse, but will only go back to beginning. Can't find where to report bug issues.

Updated 04/12/25: SUGGESTIONS 1. A way to check off articles, magazines, books, and media that I have read or watched. For those of us with a poor memory. 2. An option to listen to the daily text. 3. Would love to be able to add my personal study notes to home screen favorites. 4. A way to set study/event alerts, like a pop-up in the morning that says,"Good morning. It's time to read the daily text." But I guess we can just use the native phone calendar alerts. Keep up the great work!

Great app! It makes it easy for you to to bounce around easily. I love that I can download many different things. Also love that it let's you listen to, and download media. You can access tracts, workbooks, articles, books, movies, audio readings, etc. It is a fantastic app to learn more about Jehovah, and teach others.

If you want to read the scriptures accurately, according to the original scripts, the access for learning is unprecedented. The massive digital library allows you to learn anywhere at any time, even without internet. The value of treasure you will store for the heavens is at your fingertips and even greater, eager kind and loving, and caring people who enjoy teaching others about the TRUTH. Even if you favor another church, the Bible is written well here and you can learn ever so much more!

To our dear developing friends and Jehovah, first, thank you for this gift. I wanted to make a couple of suggestions for additions to the app. One is allowing the use of tags and short notes in the bookmarks. Also, incorporating screen casting in the apps built in video player. So to cast a video to a television or other external display. Don't know if this the place to make suggestions. Hope you may consider adding these functions in future releases.

I personally love it for my personal study, and for both meetings. It saves a lot of time and I concentrate better in the matter not looking for the references in the paper books. Also I see the articles in different languages to compare and that helps me understand better. Thank you for your excellent work with a completely spiritual goal. I wish I could make visible marks like point an arrow or write a name in a specific place in the main text.

A great tool for learning from the Bible. You can download a few different Bibles in English, not just the New World Translation. This allows you to see how scriptures have been rendered into English in multiple ways. There are many videos, songs, research tools, and much more to help you come closer to God. Search needs a little improvement, otherwise I would give it 5 stars.

title: Daily Bubble
description:
Ready for the ultimate relaxing bubble merge puzzle? Daily Bubble is a wildly FREE and addictive bubble puzzle game that challenges your brain and relaxes your mind! Connect, merge, and blast through hundreds of mind-bending levels‚Äîanytime, anywhere, even offline. üî¢

üéØ Perfect for players of all ages, the goal is wonderfully simple: match bubbles with the same number and merge them into bigger ones! Whether you're relaxing before bed or enjoying a free offline game on the go, you'll find it easy to learn but hard to put down.

But don't be fooled by the simple rules‚Äîthis game is packed with strategic depth. ü§î Plan your moves, arrange the board wisely, and experience the breathtaking thrill of linking bubble after bubble into one LONG‚Ä¶ LONG‚Ä¶ LINE that clears the screen! Test your brain in this engaging brain-training merge puzzle! üòù

Join millions of players worldwide and start your own satisfying puzzle journey today! üöÄ

üåü How to play üåü
 ‚ÅÉ Slide to Merge: Connect bubbles with the same number by sliding them in any direction‚Äîup, down, left, right, or even diagonally.
 ‚ÅÉ Grow Bigger: Watch as merged bubbles evolve into higher numbers. How high can you climb?
 ‚ÅÉ Plan Your Strategy: Think ahead! Every move counts. Arrange the board wisely to create massive chains and clear it efficiently.
 ‚ÅÉ Experience the Thrill: Feel the incredible satisfaction of linking a LONG, LONG chain that clears the entire board in this relaxing bubble puzzle game!

üåü Key Features üåü
‚ÅÉ üß† A True Brain Trainer: Simple to learn but filled with strategic depth. Perfect for sharpening your logic and problem-solving skills in this merge puzzle game.
‚ÅÉ ü´ß Endless Puzzle Fun: Thousands of unique levels with no time limit. Play at your own pace, anytime, anywhere‚Äîa perfectly offline-friendly bubble game!
‚ÅÉ üìÖ Daily Challenge: Come back every day for a fresh bubble puzzle and special rewards! Build a streak and become the ultimate Daily Bubble master.
- üé® Vibrant Collection & Events: Unlock stunning bubble materials (Crystal, Wood, Iron etc.) and beautiful backgrounds. Join global Seasonal Events to collect exclusive holiday postcards!
‚ÅÉ üèÜ Compete with Yourself: Challenge your high score and see how long a chain you can create. The pursuit of perfection is truly addictive!

üéÆ If you're a fan of classic number games or merge puzzles like 2048 games, Sudoku block games, Crossmath, and Number Match, then Daily Bubble is the one you do not want to miss.

Come and immerse yourself in this relaxing daily bubble puzzle game and become a true master of Daily Bubble now! Don't forget to share the fun with your Family and Friends! üî•

üí• Download now and start your bubble-popping adventure today! üí•

scraped_reviews.content: Very Fun, but Far Too Many Ads. I play other games with ads, but nothing like this. Most of the ads are very long and multi leveled. I could handle them in between games, but not during the level. It's really very jarring and kinda ruins the enjoyment. I'll keep it around for the odd break from other games, but the intrusive ads will keep this from being a daily play.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there. To allow more users to play for free, we had to add some ads to the game. We will try to optimize the ads to bring a smoother experience to users. You can skip or close most ads after a few seconds. You can also choose no ads through the upper button "+". If you have any questions, please contact us via App-Settings-Contact Us.

scraped_reviews.content: I was REALLY enjoying this game at first, but NOW, in the middle of the game ADS pop up, and it doesn't let you skip the ad after 5-10 seconds anymore.... how you have to watch a FULL 30 second ad in the middle of your game and THEN it automatically brings up the PLAY STORE, wanting you to download it, so you have to close THAT, and then close the ad 2-3 times just to get back to playing the game you were in the middle of.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your feedback. Sorry for the poor experience. Advertising is a way for us to offer players a free game as we spent much time designing, programming, and perfecting it. After 5 seconds, you'll find an option on the top left to skip it. We also suggest you choose the Remove Ads via the "+" in the game. We appreciate your understanding!

scraped_reviews.content: This game is seriously addicting!! Before I know it hours have gone by!! It's a simple yet satisfying game with a little bit of strategy needed... It's got pop ups.. but they're usually less then 30 seconds(most are only 10-15 seconds) it's easy to keep playing,and level up without spending any money.. i Play this more then any of my other games. Definitely check it out.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much for such a positive review! We take pride in providing our players with the best possible experience, and it's great to hear that we were able to meet your expectations. ü§óüèÖ We are looking forward to hearing more from your side. If you have any suggestions, don't hesitate to get in touch with us via App-Settings-Contact Us.

scraped_reviews.content: I just started playing this game a couple of months ago and love it. I really like that it's not timed! The ads can be annoying, but they are on every game if you're trying to play without paying. And, I've noticed it gets better the higher in the game you get. Once you hit #20, your points and coins increase exponentially in every game. When I first started, I tried to find what a "high score" in this game was. No luck. So, for reference, a few months in I'm over 8.5 million for my high score.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, thank you for giving us such an awesome review! (‚óè'‚ó°'‚óè) Our team reads every review from our players and always stays humble to improve. Please continue playing and share your game experience! If you like our game, could you please give us a 5-star as encouragement? üòù Thank you very much!

scraped_reviews.content: used to be fun. now it's a headache. at level x583 it is near impossible to score a string of 6 numbers without watching several ads to buy swaps. frustrating as all get out. it has taken weeks to go from level 500 to 583. I'm tired of it now. all it's good for it is building frustration and anger and giving me a headache. ZERO STARS once you get past level 450. UNINSTALLED! PERMANENTLY!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Our game is designed to be challenging, encouraging players to push their limits and beat their best scores. You can use props when needed. We value all player feedback and will keep optimizing the game for a better experience. For any questions, feel free to contact us via app settings.

scraped_reviews.content: the game works smoothly and it's hard to lose a game, but if you're trying to get points for another game service like tapjoy, you have to try hard to lose a game so you can complete more games. lol. the one I was doing gave me points per game played.. not very fun if you have to lose to win.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi. This is a fun puzzle game to train your brain and pass the time. Every review matters to us. We will be glad to see that you give us more stars after experiencing more. If you have any suggestions, opinions, or questions, please feel free to contact us via App-Settings-Contact Us. Thanks for your support!

scraped_reviews.content: I really like the fact that it allows you to go back and rethink the connecting pattern you're gonna use. And, most importantly, there aren't a lot of FU ads every 5 seconds! And the JAZZ is FABULOUS! Is there any way to find out the name of the artist & the cut that's playing?

it's looks like is very exciting and fun game to play and it looks kinda matching and it sounds amazing to playing the game and it was having fun with the numbers and that's was fun is called daily bubble and it sounds great with the numbers which kinda match with all this number match and it sound good to me and that's why we play the daily bubble which all numbers and have fun just be careful when you're playing if it not you can try again so that ok you can play again if you want and have fun

title: Timestamp Camera
description:
Timestamp Camera can add timestamp watermark on camera in real time. Easy to take photos and videos.

‚óè Add current time and location when recording videos or taking photos, you can change time format or select the location around easily. Timestamp Camera is the only App that can record video with the time watermark accurate to millisecond(0.001 second). 
- Support 61 timestamp formats 
- Support change font, font color, font size 
- Support set timestamp in 7 positions: top left, top center, top right, bottom left, bottom center, bottom right, center
- Support auto add location address and GPS
- Support change timestamp opacity and background
- Support add altitude and speed on camera

‚óè Support display custom text and emoji on camera. For example, you can input "Good day at the zoo"
‚óè Support display map, you can change the map scale, transparency, size, position
‚óè Support display compass on camera
‚óè Support display custom logo image on camera
‚óè Support record video with or without audio
‚óè Support "Battery saver mode", the brightness of screen will be 0%~100% of normal when turn it on. Support double-tap to turn on the "Battery saver mode"
‚óè Support turn off the shutter sound when shooting
‚óè All of the time effects are real-time and can be used when taking photo or video 
‚óè Can change effect, toggle camera when recording
‚óè Support portrait and landscape 
‚óè Support change resolution
‚óè Support capture photo when recording
‚óè Support save photo and video to SD card directly, enable it in the advance setting

Some features may not be available on some phones due to hardware and network differences.

If you want to upgrade to the pro version, you can get the pro version from Google Play which costs $4.99. And you only need to pay for once and use it forever. Don't trust anybody that charge you outsides the Google Play.

Please mail us cybfriend@gmail.com if you have any problem or suggestions. Thank you.

summary: Add date and time watermark to photos and videos

scraped_reviews.content: I have been using this app for 6 months and I really like it a lot. It is very functional and does not try to reorganize the photo folder. It's noninvasive and does not run in the background eating processor/ram/data. The app gives some good options for putting information on the photo. It will also put GPS location if you want. When I want a photo without a date/time stamp, I just use the native photo app on my device. This app works well for photos. I have only used it a couple of times for video but I had no issues with either.

I do animal photography and got tired of having to look up the details and date info for ages of pets, somtimes years after taking the pictures. This app posts the date on the front of the photo wherever I need it. The font can be colorized and sized however you need it. No issue with zillions of ads. Only complaint is with the 'video' button, which I have to swipe multiple times to get it in the right place when changing to or from 'photo'. Pls work on that. Otherwise, I recommend it.

Zoomed images are very blurry. this is not the case with the Samsung stock camera app. the photo and video buttons are too close together and too close to the shutter button causing the video mode to be started when I dont want to. Also, sometimes it switches to video mode without touching the screen. Other then these issues, the app does a good job.

Great, but it could be better. I would like to be able to put my labels on top of the info, instead of lost into all the information. Even it would be nice if I can move it to other corners of the screen or use bold or larger fonts. I supervise multiple projects and take tons of pictures, and beign able to save my project numbers is perfect, but project numbers gets lost between the info. Please, bold letters or color choice for my labels at the top of the info.

Some clarity issues, sometimes with the sun and focus related, but other wise OK. I have an Android. The job I have, wants a time stamp. but the Android does take a much clearer photo. Time stamp is getting me by, not quite as good as I hoped for. Sometimes I get some good photos, overall maybe 75% of the time good enough.

This app used to be great,but as of a few months ago,I'm lucky if it will pull the correct address after I close and reopen it three times, let alone on the first try! I'm not talking about when I'm in front of the house,off to the side,or even closely set neighborhoods,I'm talking about standing on a porch where my gps/map app shows me perfect at the correct address.I will open the timestamp app & it pulls a house across the street,next door,two doors down more often than it gives the correct 1

I've just got a new phone and installed the free version as I'm used to it from my old one. I still like it, but the one annoyance so far is the date stamp placement on photos. The date would appear in the top right corner on my old phone, but I could change it to where I wanted it to be by just tapping the relevant edge of the screen. Now it seems I can only change it by going to the settings each time, which makes taking photos less spontaneous.
Delayed, especially flash mode and blurr of not careful. No shortcut option on one plus 13. need this app for work. why can't phone companys hqve an intergated time stamp into there camera?

Love this app but it's so annoying because I set the "altitude and speed" units to "nautical" and it swaps back to displaying miles per hour and feet the next time I open it. When I check it's "nautical" is still selected but mph and feet are displayed. The only way to fix it is select one of the other two options then reselect "nautical" and take the photo. But have to do this EVERY time.

Nice app, but especially on new phone sometimes starting extrem slow; could get the impression that the startup has been gotten significant slower since a bunch of updates ago... Handling has to get used to a little bit Unfortunately it seems to be that I now encounter the problem, when replaying a vid the scrollbar is out of the picture, only very small remnant visible... so I didn't got it managed to pause while replaying, also no pause/ stop button in the middle... maybe next update?!?

Good app, works well. BUT I'd like to know why, when I get to a customer's house at a particular location, this app picks up their old address from an hour away? (assuming off of one of the their devices) and then updates to the current on site address/location. Like how is this happening? And this happens all the time, not a one off. Taking locations from other devices is suspicious AF. What permissions are givin for this to happen? Is this a breach of privacy?

Thursday, November 6, 2025 Hello, Thank you for creating Timestamp Camera, it is extremely useful. One problem I would like to report is that if my Samsung Galaxy S8 phone gets too hot, it will shut Timestamp Camera down while it is recording, which causes the .mp4 output file to become corrupt and unable to be played. If possible, could you please modify Timestamp Camera so that it closes in an orderly manner if the device gets too hot? Thanks, Bobby

unbelievable. is far to expensive on my time. default location to read and store is camera on device. cant timestamp existing pics. does not read sd card. and you want money for this.. think not...

If the possibility of adding timestamp to pictures previously taken, pulling them from the gallery, is removed, I will change my review to 5 stars.

Love it for work as I noted longer have to type in information, which allows me to include more shots as I noted longer spend 10 minutes a photo inputting data.
