title: Lensa: photo editor & AI art
descriptionHTML:
Lensa is a photo editor tool for retouching portrait selfies. The app has many photo editing filters and techniques for pictures to get a sweet selfie, remove any blur background or do any other necessary editing. With its simple editing features and camera editor effects, you can make every photo perfect 365 days a year. Capture memorable moments and do the necessary photography editing to freeze each moment in time. You don't need a lab or dark room because within seconds your peachy selfie is ready.

SKIN REFINING EFFECTS FOR THE PERFECT YOU
Professional editing for pictures has never been easier with the skin editor feature that allows you to make each portrait selfie clearer, remove blemish, or apply any other beauty filters for pictures of your choice. Put the focus on your body where you decide.

- You don't have to be a photography pro to use this editing app. The Auto-Adjust editing will make your life easier, so you only need to focus on taking the photo;
- Different tools, premade photo filters and camera effects make it possible to edit all blemishes so you have the stunning effects;
- Adjust your selfie to let it stand out or use the functional camera editor for something more traditional;
- Lensa also has an acne remover that you can use to edit pictures.
- Specify the photo retouch editing you want and Lensa does the rest.

SHOW YOUR TRUE SELF WITH THE EYE CORRECTOR EDITOR FOR PICTURES
Your eyes are the windows to your soul, so let them shine. There is also an eyebrow feature to enhance contours on your face or do other changes the way you want. Make a before editing and after picture to see the result of your work.

- Be in full control of your eyebrows and shape them how you want with the eyebrow editor;
- Adjust dark circles around your eyes or remove eye bags to get the best version of yourself;
- Easily revert to the original photo to make new modifications.

ILLUSTRATOR PHOTO EDITOR FOR EVERY SHOT
Camera apps come and go, but with Lensa it's not just another fad. Its top-notch editing allows you to express yourself with high-quality photography that is ageless, special, and unique. You won't need to rely on your smartphone camera to get this done, because Lensa can do all the edits you can imagine.

- Lens correction adjusts all effects for pictures to get the perfect shot;
- Use the art photo contrast editor to adjust lighting and touch up any blur photo;
- Be funky, choose the style you want to change your hair color and show the perfect smile with the flawless teeth whitener editor.

BACKGROUND EDITOR SO EASY TO USE YOU'll NEVER WANT TO USE ANOTHER APP

- Backgrounds can be tricky, but Lensa is about making complex things easy. You can easily use blur for image background to put the focus on your special moment;
- Background changer editor to add motion to your selfie;
- Use the portrait mode as a photo enhancer.

EXTRA FEATURES
Lensa is the outstanding editing app for photos! It has a wide range of features and offers you the chance to express yourself through photography. Other editing apps may provide similar tools, but Lensa gives you the power of editing choice.

- Color intensity to jazz up photos that have bad lighting;
- Numerous art tools, camera filters and effects to edit pictures until you are satisfied;
- Different styles from art to vintage camera effects;
- Selfie editor to tune up each photo before posting to your favorite social media;
- Temperature tool to modify the look and feel of each pic photo;
- Block out unwanted details with fade effect editing;
- Handy saturation editing to add character to each selfie;
- Sharpness tool to correct blurry photos caused by shaking;
- Different tints to match your style and personality.

Are you still asking yourself if all my photos have a perfect editing? Let it go! Use an art editor and beauty background enhancer to make sure that your every shot is on the spot. Enjoy a photo editor experience every day!
summary: Portraits & pictures editor. AI photo enhancer: avatar maker and selfie camera

scraped_reviews.content: Deceptive I'm app. You can even try & they are already asking for $$$. I don't need avatars at all. Why should I pay full price for something that has useless tools. It is like buying a car that you haven't driven. Maybe it runs or or maybe broken. Maybe it's very quiet or maybe it makes a lot of noise. Maybe the seats are made of cardboard and covered with plastic. Maybe the engine falls off before you take it for a spin. But they advertise it as an Acura and as a great & pay half the price.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Dr K! We appreciate your feedback and understand your concerns about pricing. Lensa offers a range of features that many users find valuable. If you haven't yet, consider trying our free trial to explore the app further. If you have any questions about our plans, please contact us at fb@lensa-ai.com. Vlad

scraped_reviews.content: Lensa kinda sucks now. =/ Just a year ago, they had soooooo many ai filters that were unique, awesome, and fun to play with. I really felt like it was worth the price to be able to mess around with unlimited Anime and Cartoon filters, because a lot of the free ones just weren't as good. Now, you pay a BUNCH of money per week for LIMITED avatars that are sub-par... and the photo editing is absolutely nothing special. There are plenty of free or less expensive apps out there that are phenomenal.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Harmony, thank you for your feedback. We‚Äôre sorry to hear about your disappointment with the current offerings. We strive to provide unique and valuable features. Please contact us at fb@lensa-ai.com if you have questions about our premium plans or need further assistance. Your feedback is important to us. Vlad

scraped_reviews.content: Not a fan of the avitar and AI changes. I loved the old version. I would rather pay semi-annually than every month. Truthfully, it is not as fun to use as the older version and I may just download it occasionally and pay for one week, as I need it. It was awesome for some wedding photo's, but between the new version and the weekly charges...I will probably uninstall it.

I agree with those that tried it a while ago, was happy with the results, so tried it again only to receive awful ones that look nothing like me. The first pack I don't know how many months ago was awesome. The second which cost more are terrible. It also doesn't make it clear that after you pay for the year, you still have to pay on top of that but at the discount. So even with the subscription on sale, I paid $37 for 200 more avatars that look nothing like me. Very disappointed.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! So sorry that you didn't like the processing results :( We cannot fully control the work of AI so the final photos may contain inaccuracies, we warn users about this risk before creating avatars. Thank you for sharing your impressions! We collect feedback from our users for improving the AI work ü§ç

scraped_reviews.content: Downloaded to try it out. They ask you to pick 10-20 pictures, and only then, tell you you need to pay $8 to use the app for 50 avatars. They use sunken time loss (in selecting so many photos) to pressure user into purchasing more than they wanted. I wanted to try it out on one image, not 50. If anything let me purchase one, for like a $1 or give the user one free so they can decide whether it's worth investing money into.

It seems like there was a bait and switch at some point here. I paid for a year (with otherwise unusable Google pay rewards) on the off chance that the stuff I would like the app better in the full version. I didn't. Wouldn't recommend over plenty of the free options out there, let alone the better subscription services (which I also don't agree with in this context).
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thank you for your feedback. I'm sorry to hear that you had such an impression of our app. Could you please specify what exactly you didn't like about the paid version of the app? Please tell us more about your experience, your opinion is very important to us. You can send your feedback to fb@lensa-ai.com. Vlad

scraped_reviews.content: Advertisments make it seem easier to use than it actually is. I was made to believe I could just upload some photos and they would come out incredible. But you have to pay, and the more you pay the more photos you can upload. Good for if you have the time to mess around with filters and things, but I just wanted some fun photos, quickly. Not worth the time or money.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! So sorry you didn't like the app :(

scraped_reviews.content: It's okay - not a free trial like it says. So I installed this after seeing one of my friends pictures. I tried the trial but to create the "magic avatars" you need to pay. They come in packs so they offer 50 or 100 (and more) avatars to create for you. I uploaded clear up close selfies but a lot of the ones generated were kind of disturbing (i wear glasses and smile). You don't get the option to redo them and have to pay each time. Overall I walked away with a few nice ones. Not worth $$ though

The first 2 packs I bought were great. I really enjoyed the pictures and would have liked a little more variety in the categories between the 2 packs but i was happy with what I got. The 3rd pack however looks like they used someone else's pictures. They don't even resemble me. I paid for them and feel as though I didn't get what I paid for. Would love for the issue to be resolved, otherwise it would have been 5 stars.

Tried the trial, paid for the first Magic Avatar pack, and after about 40 mins found a few photos I liked. Decided I wanted to try again went through the process again except I selected the cheapest option this time. After selecting gender there was an error and it didn't work. Saw there was an update, got the update, and tried again this time with the medium option once more and once more it didn't work. Then I realized IT HAD TAKEN MY MONEY BOTH TIMES even though it gave me nothing in return.

I downloaded this for the avatars. (First, it takes forever.) Disappointed. I bought the $11.99 pack and the $7.99 pack and I liked about half of them. The problem is my daughter (who's biracial) wanted some so I spent $7.99 on hers and it was totally white-washed. Like bad... It made her blond with blue eyes and super thin. I'm confused, it didn't do that to me. I wouldn't leave a bad review if I had paid $5 for a subscription or something. Charge less if its not a sure thing, that's all.

App is cool. The photo editing part is very well done with tons of options and features to use and the 3 photo per day limit for free users is a good compromise. However the big pull to use this app was the magic avatars. Seeing peoples' versions pop up on social media convinced me to give it a try and when it wanted me to pay for them I didnt mind doing so. However once done I was very disappointed. I used pics of my gf and most if not all of them didnt look like her. 1 redo would've been nice.

The app description says it's a photo editing app. It prompted me to try the free 7 day trial for the professional version. I signed up. THE ONLY THING I CAN DO ON THIS APP IS THE MAGIC AI FEATURE, which has its own costs. I'm not mad paying for weird digital versions of my face, I'm mad I can't edit real pictures. Y'all need to change the description of this app, and remove the subscription option, because clearly it doesn't appy anymore.

After trying to make an avatar it prompts u to pay to see it. It also misleads u to believe that you can see it with a subscription and have infinite access with subscription. NOPE! I paid for sub and it only offers half price to make avatars. U can use the edit portion as much as you like but there is nothing in there that sets it apart from any other app. I sent them a request for refund withing 10 mins of purchase last night cause I have no use for this app now and they have yet to respond.

Purchased two separate packs the 1st with 100 photos turned out well. The 2nd pack of 200 was a let down 80% of the photos either show the back of an avatars head, the face is completely covered or they look like generic black women and bare no resemblance to me at all. If you decide to spend your money, stick with the smaller less expensive pack for the best results.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! We're sorry if the second pack was not of the expected quality :( As we cannot fully control the work of AI, the final photos may contain inaccuracies and artifacts, we warn users about it before the purchase. With each different set of photos, the result are generated unlike the previous one. We hope you'll give Avatars another chance ü§ç

scraped_reviews.content: This app is terrible, it does not tell you that you aren't going to get to pick the style you want, it does not let you redo any of the photos after it's processed them, it tells you nothing and spits out whatever regardless of what you want there is zero customization or even preference. Want all anime style photos? Too bad! Didn't like the style the program picked that one photo? Too bad! Better pay up with no guarantee it will be next time. This is definitely not worth it.

The 1st batch of pictures costs $5 for 50 pictures. They were vastly different styles and aesthetics, very fun to look at, about 30% were "good" (symmetrical, eyes looked normal, etc). So I ordered a 2nd batch of pictures, ($7 for 200) and literally 3 pictures were "good" they all looked like regular pictures except distorted. NOTHING like the 1st batch... 2nd batch of pics was atotal scam. I wish I could upload pics for you to see... not worth it at all. I want my $$$ back! I canceled.

It's pretty neat, but I would say that about half of the photos are messed up (eyes crossed, mis-shapen features, etc) and it takes away the "neatness" when I paid for 300 photos and almost half are unrecognizable. Therefore, I won't be buying more & will be canceling the subscription... but it was cool for what it was, I guess.

It's great, especially the A.I generator, i love it!! But I think it's bogus as hell that u gotta pay $39.95 to subscribe 2it & then on top of that, u still have 2pay more every single time u put new pictures thru it! That's ridiculous 2me especially when a free 1 is most likely just around the corner. I never would've paid the $40 if I would've understood it was still going to cost me each time on top of that. Get real! Especially w prices skyrocketing on literally everything else these days!

Total scam and steals your money! I signed up for the free trial, then it asked for me to pay for the avatars. My payment went through but the app said there was an error with my internet. I tried a different price and the same thing happened, then it said I had to pay for $1.99 a week. Tried that and it still didn't happen. It just takes your money!!!

This app feels a lot like a scam. It never even got close to working. It just kept asking for a subscription, which I did and also paid the extra for the AI avatar feature (conveniently omitted until initial subscription is established). The closest I got was attempting to load pictures and it alternated between telling me that 1 or 3 of my 15 pictures would not work. I attempted the same 15 multiple times.

I purchased the magic avatar package for $8 and about 2/3 of the images were cool. The others? Some didn't look like me at all and some has weird attributes like a third eyebrow. However, the 1 star review comes from my attempt to purchase a 2nd package, this time the $12 one - this is when the app crashed, but not before taking my money and giving me nothing in return.

Unusable I couldn't upload the photos I wanted to with with because their photo selection screen doesn't pull up any full folder. Furthermore the UI is deceptive. If you want to use their magic avatar feature, they make you choose all your photos for upload first, then they good their hands out for the money. Not criticizing the fact that they charge, but the way they charge could be presented in an upfront manner.

Purchased Premium Membership Package, figured I was going to use this app WAY more often, and I did. Didn't like the fact that you have to continue to pay each and every time something is renderred... But also, when I actually WAS WILLING to pay, half the time the app couldn't get past the Male/Female part when figuring out what it was going to render. It's very defective and frankly I am super disappointed... It worked the first 2 or 3 times, but now, it's not even doing anything...
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Magic Avatars is a paid feature, not included in our plans. We understand that you might have assumed it was part of the subscription, but it requires advanced AI and costly computing power. Annual subscribers enjoy 50% off and 4k resolution on them. If you have any questions, please update your review. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: Blocking bugs - paid and it doesn't work I'm extremely annoyed that I paid for a subscription and a package because this app is riddled with bugs. I can't make it do anything. It keeps saying "Error - you already own that package" when I try to go through the workflow to create avatars. I followed all the troubleshooting and FAQ steps and nothing works. Maybe it's better for iPhones, but don't waste your money! They need to fix this app before they charge for it.

I wanted to try the free trial and realized there were better apps to use. I canceled in play store but it must've been too close to cancel (the day before). THEN I requested for a refund a few days after. This was in DECEMBER. I want to say when I was going thru apps and making sure everything was updated. Couldn't believe I never even received a reply. Awful service. There are better apps to use. I deserved a reply to the two emails I sent just for how much I spent.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! We are sorry for what happened, we have found your email and provided a solution through that way -Kindly update your review to let us know if you received our email.

scraped_reviews.content: Seems like a cool app to edit your photos but really just grabs your money and runs. I signed up for the subscription after buying a cheap back and haven't been able to use the subscription ever since. Basically, I paid over $30 for the app to edit a handful of photos for me one time. And over half of them were deformed looking. Don't do it. Highly disappointed. I'm trying to get my money back, we'll see how that goes.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We're sorry if you didn't like the processing results üíî The final photos may contain inaccuracies, we warn users about this risk before creating avatars. Please contact us via the App's settings and attach some of the results we will check it with our team.

scraped_reviews.content: Paid for year membership, paid for "Magic Avatars" (which it did not reduce the price of) and get nothing. It just reloads the page for purchasing the avatars and then tells me it's an error I already own that item. The photo editing is terrible, so few background choices and doesn't do anything more than what snapchat filters do. I want my money back.

A scam on multiple levels. Got me to pay for a subscription, got me to spend additional money for the AI images, and cannot load due to multiple error messages. First said "service is unavailable", then "cannot upload photos", then keeps trying to get me to pay more money for AI, though I bought TWO packages... an absolute wreck of an app.

This app took my money and never generated my avatars. Real frustrating to be told that it will only take "one minute" but still have nothing generated hours later. Just stuck on "almost done" no matter what I do. I unsubscribed, restarted, uninstalled it, but still nothing. Just your average broken app that never seems to freeze or break when it takes your money. I want my money back, but I wont hold my breath.

App is buggy. Forces you to buy their programs, but then the programs do not work. I bought bother the 50 and the 100 image pack, and neither worked. It kept sending me back to the menu to purchase plans. If you're gonna make me pay for the tech, then make sure your app is working correctly. üôÉ I'll be disputing the charges, and I've already deleted the app. Don't waste your time and money.

I selected the Magic avatars option. Selected my phots and paid $8.50 my pack and still have yet to receive them. I've emailed them multiple times. They only solution they offer is to log out and back in (which I've done numerously). Now they reduced their prices for the packs but that doesn't change the fact that I've already paid twice the amount and still don't have what I paid for. I'm beyond irritated

The option is to pay. They give you the option to subscribe once the app opens and they give you the option to decline subscribing. Then you spend the time choosing the pictures you want, only to find out that in order to continue, you have to pay. You cant move forward without paying. Why make it a free app if you cant actually do anything without paying? Its a gimmick to suck people in thinkinging its free and then getting them to pay something. Its not worth the $12 it wanted me to pay

I mean it's a cool app and the price isn't too bad. I spent $17.11 on the app and got nothing lol. After selecting all my pictures I wanted to use then selecting the package, the app then took my money and said "something went wrong". I started the refund process but having to go back and forth to have something fixed like this is so tedious. I'm thinking want just charging it back and being done with it. Hopefully you guys have it together later.

Paid for the $12 bundle of 100 photos, app displayed loading icon for a moment then asked me to pay again. It's been abkut 30 minutes and there is still no indication that I paid for anything, absolutely zero progress bar notification. It's literally acting like I haven't purchased anything at all, and when trying to go through the process again I receive an error stating that I "already own this product". I expect a refund for this purchase.

I paid for the magic avatars, which also automatically enrolls you in a "free" subscription. I forgot to cancel the subscription and was charged more money. No big deal. I figure I will use the app for the year subscription and then cancel EXCEPT the subscription does not actually buy you anything additional. I can't do anything in the app without paying even more money. Total scam.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! The tsubscription include an unlimited number of photos to edit, all art styles, and saving videos without a watermark, but not the Magic Avatars.

scraped_reviews.content: Tried to use the Magic Icons feature and got to the payment screen, which is already ridiculous because when you start the app the first time, they make you consent to signing on for a subscription. On the payment screen, I selected the 50 pack of the 5 styles and "checked out" only to be brought back to the checkout page. When I tried to re-purchase the item, I got an error saying I already owned the item. I then tried the 100 pack only for the same to happen. Hopefully get a refund.

Over 100 distorted images, wasted money! I signed up for the trial and paid for 200 images. Most of them have wonky eyes or they are blurry. Most don't even look anything like me. It's like someone else's images. The ones that did come out great were the Egypt filter. I can't lie it was pretty cool. Yes I used good photos and high-quality images. Sadly it did not translate well. It truly is hit or miss! Good luck!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! So sorry that you didn't like the processing results :( We cannot fully control the work of AI so the final photos may contain inaccuracies, we warn users about this risk before creating avatars. Thank you for sharing your impressions! We collect feedback from our users and try to improve Avatar generation based on it ü§ç

scraped_reviews.content: Scammed maybe! Tried the AI generator and it was a lot of fun so wanted to try more and chose to subscribe. So after subscribing you still have to pay for the AI conversions (didnt know that but fine) but it's at 50% off. $1.99 for 50 instead of $3.99. Went back in today to generate more and it's showing the original pricing options ($3.99) but still telling me im getting 50% off as if the original for 50 was $7.99. Idk, either it's a glitch or I got big scammed.

The photo editing isnt anything you cant get with free apps. And the AI feature is hit or miss. The AI did well in capturing my husband's features but not in a creative way (i.e. it was his face on different colored background). My images were offensively way off base. Many of my images were a person from different race and others were just massive breasts (not kidding). Wish I got my money back. The AI has some kinks to work out. Its definitely not worth $$.

Two stars because of the money. You subscribe for 29.99 a year, but you get 7 days free but then you have to pay to get a set of pictures. So I bought a set thinking okay I've got my AI that I can use and then I go to do another set and they want you to pay again. And then 95% of the pictures didn't even look like me. It was cool but I can't give it three stars because of how much you have to pay on top of subscribing.

Enjoyed the ai portraits, though it feels a bit weird paying without at least the option to veiw watermarked samples, especially because all the fantasy portraits make me white, when I'm black. I understand there are limitations and biases involved with AI, but I think there should be a heads up beforehand that clearly states the AI will not work as well for darker skin tones. I'm a photographer, and used high quality images in good lighting, to be sure the AI could read my face.

I was really enjoying the app with the 1st set of pictures but I paid for 2 more sets and NEVER received them but the payments went through! So I'm probably going to delete the app before the 7 free days is up because who wants to pay for a membership, when I've already thrown money away for 150 photos, I'm yet to receive! I sent an email to "costumer service" and haven't gotten anything back! Not a refund or my pictures!

I dunno. Feels like another trendy hoax. I downloaded the app, started my free trial for the AI portrait thing, then immediately canceled and deleted once I hit that pay wall. I don't need to join the herd that bad. I just wanted to see how fun it might be. Why call it a free trial when you can't even try it for free! Lol nah I'm good. I'm not gonna pay for something before I know what I'm getting. Nice try though. Plus, some of these other reviews are less than stellar, to say the least.

I have heard really good things about this app and was hoping to try it out before considering a subscription. It takes FOREVER for the menus to load and then the same amount of time for it to 'apply' anything, only nothing ends up being applied. I end up with an error instead. I'm going to try the app again later in case it's a random server issue but I wouldn't pay for something that I can't even get to work in the free version...

Editing is the same as Free Samsung stock version. The fee is ridiculous for Avatars which is how I got here and reason for downloading. $30.00+ for something I can't even preview, and I keep seeing photos of others that dont even look like them, so... Moving along from another dumb trend that will come and go, unfortunate for those that will be out $$$ by paying a subscription,and then being suckered for additional features that should be included in the subscription charge...You are crazy.

Cool, but can't buy a second set of AI images? I bought one go for 3.99 for 50 ai created images which were interesting and then wanted to do a second person. I selected photos, choose gender female, choose 50 image again and it won't let me complete the purchase and says "Error, you already own this item" no further info. Frustrating!

Not worth it, and a huge waste of money. Accidentally purchased the magic avatars but figured I'd give it a try any way but was led to disappointment when it wouldn't recognize the package was bought so filed a refund. Later on bought it again and it worked but maybe 5 out of the 100 photos could be used or are of any similarity to me. Don't buy it. Especially if you have piercings in your face(I do)the ai has no idea what to do with them so on top of bad photos it puts random blobs on your face

I used lensa a couple years back and had excellent results. Many pictures were interesting, had great themes and still mostly looked like me. I wanted more of that, but was disappointed with the current state of the app. Though you are able to better customize the themes you're looking for, any realistic styles no longer look like me, and the cartoon styles looked more like me, but had the terrible AI-isms in it. Worse yet, now they're logo is plastered on the product you paid for...

scraped_reviews.content: Don't fall for the "7 day trial" lie. I figured I'd try this app and see what the fuss is all about and was very disappointed. Not only do you have to "subscribe" to the app to use the okay features, but you also have to pay again to use other features within the app! The 7 day trial is BS! I tried the app and attempted to cancel the SAME DAY and I am now being charged the $29.99 subscription and will be canceled NEXT year in December. Now I'm out 30 bucks and stuck with this average app.
